story:
As seen on:

 

 

Firebiner: Your everyday-carry survival carabiner.

We all love a good carabiner. We use them to clip our keys, our camera, our water bottle, or a myriad of other products to our backpacks, to shelves, to fences, to belt loops or to whatever we need at the moment. You want your carabiner to be strong, lightweight and maybe have some other functionality like a bottle opener.

We agree. The Firebiner is all that PLUS it has the ability to make fire easily with our patent-pending EverSpark technology. It has a titanium-coated stainless steel body construction rated for up to 50 pounds of gear (not for climbing or hanging anything with a beating heart). And, don't forget the small utility blade. We even designed in a screwdriver tip for the next round of prototypes.

 

 

 

 

The right design and the right material

  • Very strong stainless steel construction with up to 50 lbs capacity (we will keep you updated with final testing)
  • Extremely durable titanium coating
  • Lightweight, only 1 oz
  • EverSpark spark wheel technology to help start fires easily
  • Replaceable ferro rod, with extra rods
  • Utility/safety blade to easily cut paracord, fishing line, string and much more - stainless steel, replaceable
  • Bottle opener, for refreshment time
  • Hang slots to connect keys or anything else with an appropriate ring or clasp
  • Strong, thin, stainless steel wire gate that stays closed but is easy to open when needed
  • Screw-driver tip to be added on next round of prototypes
  • Patent-pending
  • 5 colors: Black, Blue, Gold, Silver & Red/Blue Metallic

The Firebiner is not a toy. Keep out of reach of small children.

The Firebiner isn't just for survival; It's for every day use. We are Outdoor Element, but you have our permission to go indoors as well. The Firebiner helps create fire, so be careful and responsible (you can thank our lawyers for that one).

Check out the Firebiner in action:

Since many of you asked if this would cut through a seatbelt, Mike decided to have a little fun. Yes, it does. Check out this video:

 

The Firebiner in action, with our custom USA-made paracord that is included in the Triple Threat Gift Pack:


The OE Lite Survival cord has 7 strands of nylon for 550 pounds of tensile strength, one strand of 10 pound monofilament fishing line, and one strand of jute for fire tinder.  The color of the OE Lite survival paracord may vary from what is pictured.

The Accessory Kit that comes with the Triple Threat Bonus and Gift Packs:

Look for future reviews (as we get more samples) on these great sites and more:

 

Outdoor Retailer Show 2016

We were able to show the Firebiner to several people at the latest Outdoor Retailer Show in SLC, UT in August. We went straight to companies whose product we love. Here are some of the comments we heard, and pictures to boot.

 

 

 

The Kodiak - a great complement to the Firebiner.

 

The Kodiak Survival Paracord Bracelet was funded on Kickstarter in 2013. Get one now at an incredible discount when you back the Firebiner.

Don't be fooled by cheap knock-off paracord bracelets. The Kodiak has the following features compared to other knock-off varieties:

  • Custom-made-in-USA survival paracord which contains braided fishing line, tinder and nylon strands inside the paracord.
  • #8 Bait fish hook braided in the bracelet
  • Much more durable buckle made from Delrin, a high-strength POM plastic.
  • Thicker, more durable ferro rod that will last a lot longer.
  • Shiny striker plate that doubles as a reflector.
  • Choice of 2 colors (OD Green & Red)
  • Choice of 3 sizes (SM, MD & LG) - see sizing chart below

If you don't have the yellow label at the center of the paracord, then it is not the real deal. Choose quality. Choose The Kodiak.

 

Kodiak Sizing Chart:

Firebiner Production Timeline

  • 35 days for tooling
  • 12 days for testing
  • 45 days for initial production
  • 40 days for transit
  • Begin shipping initial orders February 2017

We will share the USPS shipping costs with you.

 

Huge thanks to the following rock stars for their write-ups and help (click the name to link to the story):

  • Active Weekender
  • Gear Institute
  • Meanderthals (Internet Brothers)
  • Solid Works
  • Geeky Gadgets
  • Gear Hungry
  • Everyday Carry
  • HiConsumption
  • Skilled Survival
  • Cool Material
  • Scoooops
  • Legal Lifestyle
  • Baystreet.ca
  • Yahoo Finance
  • CBS News Channel 10
  • NBC Channel 12
  • Fox Channel 8
  • ABC Channel 9
  • Outside Magazine
  • (list goes on and on, but you get the idea)
  • “Great product idea. I just upped my pledge so I get the paracord as well. :)” Steve
  • “no doubt this will get funded. Good luck.” S
  • “If this turns out to be half as awesome as the Kodiak, it'll be money well spent. I fly in the backseat of the FA-18F for the US Navy, and every time I do, I wear the Kodiak. I have full confidence that if something ever happened and I found myself in a survival scenario, I'd be well-prepared no matter the environment I might find myself in. Thanks guys. Looking forward to the firebiner!” EH
  • “Thank you for this awesome piece for my EDC kit!” Tim “Can't wait to get my hands on it.” Chris
  • “Looking forward to seeing the finished item. Still wearing my Kodiak daily so this will be a nice addition.” Stephen
  • “I'm promoting it on my social media. Looking forward to seeing one of these when they're out of production!” Shawna
  • “Looks great. Thanks Joe! We’re proud to play a very small role in something so exciting.” Al
  • “Awesome little product you have there, and I hope its a big success for you. I'm more than happy to help spread the word! :)” Kraig
  • "I'm looking forward to receiving this awesome product:)” Yu
  • “Thanks for your help can't wait to get this. Good luck from Scotland.” Andy
  • “awesome company and the product looks fantastic ! :)” Sean
  • “This product is one of my ideal must haves. Always handy having a multi tool on you at all times. The fire lighter swung it for me. Had to get it!” Kiarian
  • “The thing looks awesome, such a simple concept and well executed.” Schaeffer

 

http://www.outdoorelement.com/product/firebiner/

story:
About us...

Hello world! Our names are Donny and Taylor Adams! We have been married for a little over three years now and live in beautiful Portland, Oregon.

A bit about Donny: I am aspiring to be a high school History teacher. I enjoy all types of music ranging from rock to classical, alternative and even jazz if the mood is right.  I read books and I play games with friends and family. 

A bit about Taylor: I'm actively pursuing my bachelor’s degree in early childhood education. I absolutely love children and am thankful for the opportunity to teach such amazing minds! 

Our Campaign: During the summer of 2013, we plan to participate in a short-term mission effort in Debrecen, Hungary, along with a team of adults and young people from the Metro Church of Christ congregation.  We will be teaching approximately 86 Hungarians about Christ, one-on-one, every day for two weeks. We will be teaching the students English by using the text from the Bible.

Although the church in Debrecen, Hungary only consists of 8 people, they are very passionate about spreading the word of God in their community! The area is very churched with the presence of Calvinism, Catholicism, Eastern Orthodox and a growing presence of Atheism. There is a need in this area and that’s where we feel God is calling us to go and help. 

 This is our first trip of this type, but our team will be led by seasoned teachers. In addition to teaching God’s word, we will be gaining valuable experience as we consider whether to become full time missionaries.

Our Expenses:

Expenses: We will need $6,000 to cover our expenses for our short-term mission trip to Debrecen, Hungary. The $6,000 will cover the following:

  • Round-trip airfare (about $1900x2=$3800)
  • Teaching materials ($50x2=$100)
  • Housing ($30 a night times 14 nights=$420)
  • In country travel and transportation i.e. hotels, buses, trains ($200x2=400)
  • All food and meals ($200x2=$400)
  • We have been asked to at least budget an additional $100 per weekend for other discretionary expenditures ($100x2=200)

The total for the above is $5320. Since we haven't locked down a price for our airlines tickets yet, the above price could go up (hopefully it goes down!) We're shooting for $6,000 just in case tickets go up or if someone in our group isn't able to reach their fundraising goal. 

If we don't reach our goal of $6,000, the funds that are raised will still go toward our mission trip to Debrecen, Hungary. If we exceed our goal (which would be awesome!) the left over funds will go to support our team members who have not reached their goals. If everyone has reached their goals, the remaining funds will go into the W.E.I (World English Institute) to continue to teach English and the Word of God to people around the world!

To learn more about W.E.I, please visit their website at: 

http://www.weiady.org/about%20WEI/about_wei.htm#MISSION

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help us financially, that is OKAY! Word of mouth is just as valuable! Please share our story on Facebook and make some noise about the work in God's kingdom that is being done!

Thank you so much for taking the time to read our story! Check out our perks for contributing!

story:
Short Summary & Impact Opportunity

Hi! My name is Erin Hendry and I am a Pastoral Leadership Major at Vanguard University of Southern California. In chapel during my first semester of college, our Global and Local Outreach Programs launched our mission opportunities for Spring Break and Summer, and San Francisco caught my eye immediately. I have served in San Francisco before, and I would love to serve there many times again! There are so many broken and homeless men, women, and children on the streets in San Fran; however, with brokenness comes an opportunity for healing, hope, and redemption. Through serving on our SFO team, San Francisco Outreach, I would be blessed with multiple opportunities to serve these broken people and share that there is always hope and life after the hardships and struggles. All in all, I have a huge heart for not only the city, but the homeless, lost, and broken, and I want to reach out and share that there is so much more in this world! By supporting me on my trip to San Francisco, you will help me not only achieve shelter, food, and all those necessities, but you will be a part of serving these people who deserve to know the Good News and deserve to be served by people who genuinely care about them and their stories. Here at Vanguard one of our theme statements is "your story matters," now it's my turn to share with those who need to hear it most, "your story matters too."

What We Need & What You Get

The entire mission trip to San Francisco costs $500, which will go towards my own personal travel, shelter, food, as well as towards the resources needed to serve the homeless - food, materials, etc. You will see that I have some perks for specific donations! If you are able to donate $25, I promise to send you a letter about my experience in San Francisco! If you are able to donate $50, I promise to not only send you a letter, but I will also send you pictures of my trip sharing my own experience with you! And lastly, if you are able to donate $100, I promise to send you a letter, photos, a video documentary of special moments and peoples personal testimonies and experiences while in San Francisco! If I do not reach my entire goal, the funds will still go towards my trip to San Francisco; I trust God will provide all that I need!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate, that is completely understandable! However, ways you could help are: First and always first, PRAYER! If you could please be praying for myself and the SFO team as we prepare and leave on our mission trip! We ask for God's guidance, and that His work is done wherever He desires! And we ask for prayer over the homeless we will come in contact with, that they will be blessed and open to allowing us to serve them. Also, if you could send this out to friends and family using the Share Tools that would be wonderful as well! Even if they too are unable to donate, prayer is always good and always needed!

story:
Did you know that thousands of gas leaks occur each year and dozens homes and businesses are destroyed by natural gas explosions? 

Did you know that if you turn a light on when there has been a natural gas leak , even a flashlight or your cell phone, you could trigger an explosion? 

What do you do if you wake up in the middle of the night and smell gas? How would you get you, your loved ones and your pets to safety?

There are dozens of other situations in which emergency light is critical - vehicle breakdowns and severe weather (hurricanes, blizzards, tornadoes, etc.) being just a few.

On March 5th of 2009, a natural gas leak caused an explosion in our home town of Bozeman, Montana. One woman was killed and several homes and businesses were destroyed. It is believed that she turned on a light in a business after natural gas had been leaking all night. When that happened, my team and I decided that enough was enough and set out to create a solution for this problem.

After years of searching for a great solution and prototyping, we have what we think will be the next standard safety item for homes and businesses.


Utilizing standard glowsticks and a patent pending case that serves as a light-guide and UV-protection, we've created an emergency light that:

  • Lasts longer and is more reliable than batteries;
  • Is self adhesive so you always know where to find it;
  • Has a phosphorescent strip so you can find it in the dark;
  • Is non-toxic and easy for children to use;
  • And, is the ONLY type of light that's totally safe to use in the presence of natural gas. 


In addition to being great for having around the house, consider these uses:


We made it absurdly easy to find and use, even in pitch blackness.


Help me bring more safety to your life and get some affordable peace of mind!

The particulars:

My team and I are going to get you your lights as soon as we possibly can. They will be creamy white in color so they blend in with other things that go on your wall (light switches, thermostats, etc.).

Timeline:

End of February - Kickstarter Ends

Early March - Mold Design Finalized

Mid March - Mold Prototyped, Testing Commences

Early April - Glowsticks Arrive, Mold Finalized

Late April - Production Begins

Late May - All Parts on Hand, Assembly Begins

Mid June - All Lights Shipped to Backers


Budget:

We have grown up in a country blessed with opportunity and autonomy. As a result, we may not be aware of many of the troubles people in Nicaragua face on a daily basis. These troubles can be eased, but it takes a collective effort to do so. That is why I am asking you to please be generous in donating to this fund. By donating, you have the chance to help me help the less fortunate. 

Let's do this together!

story:
Kite Hydrofoil 600km/370mi/330NM with PRO DRYBAG

Indian Ocean SUP crossing with with PRO DRYBAG

4x German kite champion about PRO DRYBAG

SUP World Champion about PRO DRYBAG

PRO Freeskier about PRO DRYBAG

3x French kite champion about PRO DRYBAG

IKA Kite World Champion about PRO DRYBAG

Wingsuit Pilot about PRO DRYBAG

Photographers Product testing PRO DRYBAG

 

Risks & Challenges

SUBTECH SPORTS has several years of experience within product development, marketing and sales of retail products in the sport industry. After successfully launching multiple products, our team is well prepared to foresee and mitigate risks at all stages of a product development and launching campaign.

With that said, we also know that theory and practice are two different things and as a startup, with limited resources, you should communicate frequently with your customer about the situation, available resources and the plan to deal with challenges now and ahead.

We are not new to crowdfunding and given our recent campaigns, PRO DRYBAG 45L and PRO DRYCASE, we learnt a great deal from it. Crowdfunding is a relatively new format between customers and creators and it raises the bar in product development since a significant part of the process happens ”LIVE”. But the challenges can at the same time be used as advantages and given that both parties collaborate with an open mind, great things can be achieved.

For this campaign we have already fully developed the PRO DRYBAG 2.0 Series so this time around we have already moved directly in to production so we can make sure we get these awesome bags out to all you valued backers as quickly as possible.

story:
Being from Switzerland, it is in my genes to care about precision, quality and attention to detail, and I will make sure I personally check and supervise the whole manufacturing process step by step in Switzerland, to offer you a final product of the best quality possible. 

Be the first to order your new micro carbon Octopus noseclip, at a great discovery price!!! Delivery will be by July this year at the latest, as the production mould is this time already built!

Huge thanks for your support!!!

See you in the blue!

Pascal

 

Is this noseclip going to replace your previous model ( the classic model)? Definitely not! We will have from now on these 2 different noseclips as they are complementary size-wise and in a different price range. 

 

Can I replace the pads later on if needed ? Yes, extra pads at 3 EUR per pair will always be available in our webshop! But usually the pads have a long lifespan and don't need to be replaced often, maybe every few years.

 

How big is this new carbon model compared to your classic model ? In this drawing and picture you get the clear answer: 

 

 

Will this carbon noseclip fit my nose perfectly? There is no 100% clear answer to this question unfortunately as every nose is so different (shape, cartilage, flesh)... We can say that this carbon noseclip will fit most of "extra small" to "medium large" noses, while our classic model launched in 2017 (always available in our webshop www.octopusfreediving.com)  fits slightly bigger noses but is a bit too big for "extra small" noses...

 

 

Is is delivered with a neck leash? Yes of course our top quality leash will be mounted on it! 

 

When is the delivery planned? As the mould is already produced we will send the noseclips straight away at the end of the crowfunding current July!

 

 

What are the available colors? As the structure is carbon charged, it can't be technically colored and will always stay black. So this time we added 6 different pads colors: white, grey, red, lime, light blue & deep blue.
story_txt: Being from Switzerland, it is in my genes to care about precision, quality and attention to detail, and I will make sure I personally check and supervise the whole manufacturing process step by step in Switzerland, to offer you a final product of the best quality possible. Be the first to order your new micro carbon Octopus noseclip, at a great discovery price!!! Delivery will be by July this year at the latest, as the production mould is this time already built!Huge thanks for your support!!!See you in the blue!Pascal Is this noseclip going to replace your previous model ( the classic model)? Definitely not! story:
What is Qube ?

Qube offers  a quick pitching time of less than 2 minutes ,out of the bag to fully pitched and ready to go meaning you’ll have that drink in your hand quicker than ever before.

Unlike other quick pitching tents in fact like many other tents in the camping world you can stand up in all our variations from the 2 person right through to the 4 person so no more stooping over or doing the dying fish while you try and get your jeans on !

The Qube is as easy to pack away as it is to set up so you won’t need to be an expert in origami to try and get it back into the bag when you’re ready to come home.

One of the major issues with standard tents is being woken up by the sun blaring through the tent wall when it comes up at 5 am so with the with Qube tent we have added  a black lining to our material to block out the sunlight so you won’t be woken by that early morning sun anymore.

Specifications 

Our  extensive ventilation system makes for a cool environment inside 

The material is PU coated and rated to a hydrostatic head rating of 4000 meaning you’ll keep nice and dry moderate rain conditions in addition is it treated in accordance with CPAI84 Flammability standards 

A heavy duty 300D Cotton Oxford material means this tent is strong and robust.

A removable ground sheet means you can have extra comfort underfoot and makes the tent easier to clean when you pack it away.

The key to the  Qube’s is that they are easy to erect and offer you a great space inside , in addition we have a few extras  that will make this tent in a class of its own..

Connect with your Friends 

Unlike other tents you can connect together any Qube to another Qube in any size so the 4 person  will connect to a 2 person or 3 person using the universal tunnel meaning you can build your own bespoke set up of interconnected tents.  On every Qube you can connect on every corner meaning the possibilities to join are endless.

 

Just image the fun your group of mate can have connecting together at a festival securing you very own Party area , You can use a Qube just to hang out it when the weather turns bad ,

Sizes & Dimensions 

As part of this campaign we are offering a 2 Person , 3 Person  and 4 Person version of the tents and in Blue , Red , Orange , Green & Black colour options

 

Add On's 

In addition as an add on  we are also offering you a solar panel that can be slipped inside the window of the Qube to store power  into a 13,000 mAh battery pack .  

 

The solar panel  simply unfolds  and slips into the pocket behind your window and plugs directly into the battery pack to store this free energy.

 

This battery pack has a huge capacity and will charge a mobile device to full power 5-6 times from one stored charge.

 

This pack can then be used to charge your smart phone or smart device or in fact anything with a USB connection  or it can be used to power the ultra cool  LED lighting strip that will offer a soft lighting inside your tent.

We are offering this LED light strip in white or if you want your tent to be the party tent then the colour changing version is the one for you. Each Strip comes with a Storage stuff bag and fixings to secure your strip inside the tent. 

Technical Specifications 

Manufacturing Experience 

We have been developing the Qubes for the last 6 months and have finally signed off a sample that we are happy meets all of our strict quality controls and so we now need your help to meet the  materials and production costs to bring this product to market..

We have learnt a lot about manufacturing and quality control while manufacturing the Pods and so are confident we have all the processes and relationships in place to deliver great quality on this project and with our existing distribution network that already covers then UK , Europe and the USA we know we will get this product to you on time.

Risks 

We’ve put together some amazing packages for you to pledge on all we need now is you to help us bring our vision to life with your pledge .

Like any overseas manufacturing it comes with risks but we have minimized these risks by selecting professional factories with the ability to scale up volumes and still deliver on time.

A second factory visit will be conducted by our team prior to order placement to ensure that our high quality and process standards are fully understood and adhered to .

The team we also visit the factory a 3rd time and spend 7-10 days prior to the shipment leaving the factory inspecting and ensuring the product have been manufactured in accordance with the standards established in visit 2. We will not be outsourcing this inspection process it will be our team who do this as they know the product inside out as they have lived and breathed it for 12 months already.

We have 6 years experience in dealing with overseas partners and how to deal with them so this isn't our first experience in doing so.

We have an established supply chain thanks to our Pod Tent brand that means we have vast experience in shipping products directly to the USA from China and then on to U.S customers and the UK operation deals with all UK and European deliveries from our UK warehouse. These European shipments are shipped then directly from the UK via established distribution partners.

All of this means we don't have to get these often complicated processes in place for this project as they will simply slot into our established process.

FAQ

  • What are the sizes and dimensions ?

​ 2 person Qube - Set up-  W 195cm ( 6.39ft) x  L 195cm ( 6.39ft) x H 215cm (7.05ft)
                                 Packed -W 21cm (8.27") x L 154cm (5.05ft) x H 21cm (8.27")
                                 Weight 14.8 Kgs ( 32.65 lbs)  - Updated  to - 17 Kgs 

3 person Qube - Set up-  W 210cm ( 6.89ft) x  L 210cm ( 6.89ft) x H 225cm (7.38ft)
                                 Packed -W 21cm (8.27") x L 157cm (5.15ft) x H 21cm (8.27")
                                 Weight 15.1 Kgs ( 33.3 lbs) - Updated to 19 Kgs 

4 person Qube - Set up-  W 240cm ( 7.87ft) x  L 240cm ( 7.87ft) x H 250cm (8.20ft)
                                 Packed -W 21cm (8.27") x L 178cm (5.83ft) x H 21cm (8.27")
                                 Weight 15.8 Kgs ( 34.8 lbs) - Updated to 20.7 Kgs

  • How do the cope in the wind ?

The tents have been tested to a Beaufort scale 3-4 which is winds up to 20 MPH , They are not a flat surface and are in fact 4 triangular shapes that come together at a point on the pull out area. Once this is connect to the guy ropes and is under tension the tent surface is relatively  strong.

  • Will one tunnel connect all variations ?

​Yes the one tunnel is universal and will connect all size variations

  • Are they Water resistant  ?

​Our tents have a PU coated material which has a Hydro static Head rating of 4000 and we have fully taped seems so yes our tents are water resistant 

  • Why aren't you shipping to my location ?

​We initially launched the campaign in regions where we have an established supply chains so that we can deliver on time. If your location is not listed it is because the only way to ship it to you is as a single part shipment and on the tent this works out very expensive making the total value of tent + delivery uneconomical. 

  • Can i change my order ?

​Yes you can change your order however the only way to currently do this on Indiegogo is to cancel the pledge you have made and do replace it with a new pledge.

  • Can i cancel or return my item 

​​Once the campaign has ended you can no longer cancel your order and as you are backing a crowd funding campaign you back this project on the understanding that items cannot be returned.

  • What happens if i don't see a package that includes the items i want ?

​If you don't see what you want then please just contact us and we can build you a bespoke pledge to include.​

 

Additional colours added to campaign following customer requests 

 

As Featured on

story:
In May 2013 Chip Moreland left behind a lazy life in California for a position as a Peace Corps volunteer in Moldova.  Since then, most of his time has been spent teaching English to kids during his tenure in the former Soviet Block nation.  Through his own initiative, Chip has assembled an all-star team of young Moldovan students who have created a smart-phone application with far reaching implications for folks living in areas where potable water is rare, and pathogen and contaminated water dominates much of the water supply.   (Please see the above youtube video to learn more about the app.)

Their application was entered in the "Technovation Challenge", an international competition for young female programmers.  Of over 800 entries, eight were chosen to travel to San Francisco: Chip's team with their ApaPura app. are one of those eight teams. 

While his students' airfare and lodging are paid for by the competition, Chip, as an adviser and chaperone, goes unfunded.  Furthermore, Chip and his students will be spending eight days in one of the most expensive corners of the world: San Francisco.  Most of these girls have scarcely left their village of pop. 2,000 in their life time--our hope is that they can afford to leave their hotels and experience one of the greatest cities in the world. Our goal is to garner enough support from all of you lovely people to allow these intrepid young gals to not only arrive in San Francisco from half-way around the globe, but to be able to experience all of the culture and educational opportunities that should accompany a life-changing trip such as this.  

Your contribution will be put directly towards the Moldovan girls' experience while in San Francisco.  From seeing the red woods and having their minds expanded at the Academy of Sciences, to helping with transportation and paying for a few meals while out and about, every dollar up to our goal will directly provide for a more dynamic experience for these talented students.  Any funds received that exceed the $1,000 goal will go directly towards Chip's airfare for which he is scrounging about to cover.   Anything beyond that will be donated to the girls' school in Moldova.  

This is a community fundraiser for a special experience for deserving individuals.  All donors will be rewarded with a signed and numbered photo from the girls' trip, and a well deserved sense of self satisfaction.   

Thanks to everyone for helping out.  Your spirit of community support will be carried from San Francisco to the other side of the globe, and that's pretty rad.

story:
Did you know that we spend close to $6.6 trillion on –travel expenses every year?! At the same time, people at our common tourist destinations often struggle with poverty and all the daily challenges that accompany it . What if there  was a way to amass our tourist wallets and contribute to  the betterment of the people at our destinations?

This is exactly what we want to do! We want to enable tourists to support local organizations that have a unique understanding of local problems but often lack the means to solve them. We’re striving  to create a fun, inspiring, and interactive online  platform for tourists to not only support local organizations at their destinations, but also learn more about the local communities. 

And this is how we plan to do it: We aim to develop a technical platform that will enable tourists to make a small donation to a local organization at their destination when they book their trip online, by phone, or at a travel bureau. At each destination, the tourist will have a variety of local organizations to choose from,  such as those that work within the fields of human rights, education, gender equality, sustainability, etc.  As this platform will be integrated into the booking systems of travel agencies, Destination Compensation will be a  selection in the booking process - just  like  choosing to rent a car at your destination or  ordering a specific  meal on your flight!  The donated amount will be added to the total price of the journey and paid through the travel agency’s booking system. 

Once the tourists have arrived at their destination, they will have the opportunity to actually visit the organization that they have supported through Destination Compensation.  As a result, they will gain a better and  deeper understanding of the challenges facing local communities . If at that point  one wishes to make  a further donation,  one will be able to do so during the trip or even after returning back home.  Also, all tourists  who choose to support a local organization through Destination Compensation will receive regular updates on the progress of that organization.



So what is so unique about this?

As  of today, there are no similar services on the market. Some travel agencies offer their customers the option to donate money to big and well-established international organizations. Some travel agencies offer their customers packages  in which  tourists can work for an organization during their vacation. And yet still other travel agencies and actors offer their customers the  opportunity to make a donation to offset their carbon footprint. 

We offer everyone,  regardless of where one travels and for what purpose, the  opportunity to support local communities by donating a selectable amount of money to local, small organizations working with socially related issues. We strongly believe in the power of small local organizations, as they operate within the communities themselves and thus often have a comprehensive understanding of local issues and challenges. They also often have great solutions, but most of the time depend totally on donations and funding. And this is where Destination Compensation and tourists can contribute and make a huge difference.



To ensure that all donated money reaches local organizations across the world, the donations will be forwarded to organizations through the Unify for Good Foundation. This means that the tourist will pay for the trip and the donation at the end of the booking process. The donated money will then be directly transferred to Unify for Good Foundation, which will make sure that the donated money reaches the right organization and that the donations are used accordingly. 





We truly believe that Destination Compensation can make a positive change in the world: it can give tourists a chance to become more aware of what the reality is like at our tourist destinations and allow them to contribute to a positive change. At the same time it can help local organizations  contribute even more to their local communities and bring about more positive, durable and sustainable changes! 

.

How far have we reached?

In the spring of 2014, we participated in Chalmers Innovations StartUp Camp in Gothenburg, Sweden. Over the course of 10 weeks we had a unique opportunity to test and validate our idea, and the response was great! So great in fact that we are now testing a very simple version of Destination Compensation with two travel agencies: Kenzan Tours and Tag Along. And people do donate money! 

During the fall of 2014, we will continue to test Destination Compensation with even more travel agencies, and most importantly, we will develop a more advanced and user-friendly version of Destination Compensation. In the beginning of next year, we will start to approach some of the largest travel agencies on the market that have already given us great input and shown interest. 




So who are we - the people behind Destination Compensation? 

Anna Urombi
Co-founder

Anna has a masters degree in global studies and has worked for, amongst others, the UN and as a volunteer in Sweden and abroad. Her intercultural background has nourished her curiosity for cultures and interest for social issues.


Malin Jungerstedt

Co-founder

Malin has her background in international sales and has worked as a successful salesperson at one of Sweden's biggest companies within IT solutions. She has great interest for social and environmental issues, as well as passion for travel and helping others.


What We Need

We already have a driven, experienced and ambitious team and a great idea that has been validated and is now being tested live. We now need contributions to be able to develop a more advanced, integrated and interactive digital platform that we can roll out on the market by next year. And this is why we need your help! 

But why should you support this campaign? There are so many other campaigns to support! Well, if you love to travel, realize that you belong to the 15% of the lucky portion of the world population that can afford a trip every now and then, and if you are aware of the fact that more than haft of the wold population live on less than 2,5 dollars a day, maybe you feel like doing something about this. And soon you will be able to!  Please join us on our journey by supporting us and become part of a solution that will make a huge difference at your destination!

can contribute and make a huge difference.

world, the donations will be forwarded to organizations through the Unify
for Good Foundation. This means that the tourist will pay for the trip and
the donation at the end of the booking process. The donated money will then be
directly transferred to Unify for Good Foundation, which will make sure that
the donated money reaches the right organization and that the donations are
used accordingly. 






We truly believe that Destination Compensation can make a positive
change in the world: it can give tourists a chance to become more aware of what
the reality is like at our tourist destinations and allow them to contribute to
a positive change. At the same time it can help local organizations  contribute even more to their local
communities and bring about more positive, durable and sustainable
changes! 


.


How far have we reached?


In the spring of 2014, we participated in Chalmers Innovations
StartUp Camp in Gothenburg, Sweden. Over the course of 10 weeks we had a unique
opportunity to test and validate our idea, and the response was great! So great
in fact that we are now testing a very simple version of Destination
Compensation with two travel agencies: Kenzan Tours and Tag Along. And
people do donate money! 


During the fall of
2014, we will continue to test Destination Compensation with even more travel
agencies, and most importantly, we will develop a more advanced and user-friendly
version of Destination Compensation. In the beginning of next year, we will
start to approach some of the largest travel agencies on the market that have
already given us great input and shown interest. 





So who are we - the people behind Destination Compensation? 


Anna UrombiCo-founder
Anna has a masters degree in global studies and has worked for, amongst others, the UN and as a volunteer in Sweden and abroad. Her intercultural background has nourished her curiosity for cultures and interest for social issues.




Malin Jungerstedt
Co-founder
Malin has her background in international sales and has worked as a successful salesperson at one of Sweden's biggest companies within IT solutions. She has great interest for social and environmental issues, as well as passion for travel and helping others.


What We Need
We already have a driven, experienced and ambitious team and a great idea that has been validated and is now being tested live. We now need contributions to be able to develop a more advanced, integrated and interactive digital platform that we can roll out on the market by next year. And this is why we need your help! 
But why should you support this campaign? There are so many other campaigns to support! Well, if you love to travel, realize that you belong to the 15% of the lucky portion of the world population that can afford a trip every now and then, and if you are aware of the fact that more than haft of the wold population live on less than 2,5 dollars a day, maybe you feel like doing something about this. And soon you will be able to!  Please join us on our journey by supporting us and become part of a solution that will make a huge difference at your destination!

story:
What is LassoTag?

LassoTag is a Bluetooth 4.0 device combined with an iPhone application (Android in development) used to tag all those things you want to keep in range. The LassoTag when attached to an item will call your iPhone app when it gets out of your range, so you can lasso it back in before it becomes lost!

LassoTag will allow you to keep up to seven of your valuables within a 50 foot range of you and your smartphone, making it nearly impossible for you to lose them, leave them behind, or make them susceptible to theft.

How Does it Work?

LassoTag is the first of its kind to utilize an Apple approved application with Bluetooth 4.0 technology. The smartphone application can keep tabs on 1 to 7 items that are tagged with the LassoTag hitch.  All of us are busy and have items we leave behind: backpacks, laptops, keys, diaper bags, and cameras filled with memories!  Wouldn’t it be nice to take the monitoring of these items off our minds and onto our phones? Not only is the technology smart, the app is smart too. It reminds you to turn on the wireless tags you want to track each day. It’s simple, cost effective, and the possibilities are endless.    

LassoTag and the LassoTag hitch

LassoTag is the app and the LassoTag hitch is the device. Our LassoTags are lightweight and small. They are just the size of a domino so you can easily attach it to anything.

How many items have you, your kids, or your significant other left behind that were either temporarily lost or stolen?  Think of everything that could have been avoided if your phone had called and notified you that the very item was leaving your personal area. Just think of the time you spent looking, the memories and the moments you might never recover, not to mention the cost of replacing the actual item.  In most cases, these items would still be in your possession had you known they had left your side.  

Sometimes in life we need simple reminders. We are so busy trying to keep track of things and our time is precious.  What if there was a simple, cost effective device available to help us remember the items left behind or mistakenly taken before it is too late?

The Idea - "Wouldn't it be great if my bag called my phone!"

The idea was born in December of 2011. By January 19, 2012 the company was established under the name Radius Alert Systems, Inc.

Enter LassoTag, a concept, company, application, and device born from just one of many possible scenarios.  For the owner and founder of LassoTag, Dennis Lineberry, it was the call from his son while visiting a zoo last December on a family vacation.  His son Cole had left his camera bag behind. He recapped the story with his father and what resonates with his father to date is “wouldn’t it have been great if my bag had called my phone."

It’s easy to imagine, his son, Cole, with wife and two children in tow on an amazing family vacation filled with memories.  One day they stop to visit the local zoo. His 4 and 6-year-old are thrilled with the gorilla show as dad and mom watch on with equal interest.  The gorilla’s calm down and resume resting patterns and the family gathers their stuff, off to see the next adventure.

Sadly the camera bag is left behind. Hundreds of photos from this trip and many more taken over the years that simply never made it to computer. Not to mention the Nikon Digital SLR series camera that needs replacing.

What if scenarios like this didn’t have to happen? What if we didn’t have to waste time and energy searching for lost items or kicking ourselves for being careless? What if we could create a tag with Bluetooth technology that worked with our smart phone to alert us whenever what ever it is that we “tag” is left behind or outside a close parameter of us?

About Our Project

Up to this point, our idea has been self-funded and heavily invested in sweat equity by family, friends and colleagues. We are now looking to you, our friends, to help us make the leap into the marketplace, and hopefully beyond.

We are setting our goal to raise $35,000 in order to offset the costs to produce the tags and to get the required certifications.  

We've developed the app; we're Apple approved, now we just need to get the device into production so that you, our supporters, can be the first to claim your LassoTag.

About the App

Simply download the app, attach a LassoTag hitch to whatever item you want to keep in range, open the app and the phone will instruct you on all the rest.  

We purposely made this first product version without a geo-locator because we wanted to get it down to a price point that would enable our customers to “LassoTag” many items and not feel frustrated if they accidentally misplace a device.  We also wanted to make the experience simple yet effective, like the devices restaurants give you when your table become open. 

LassoTag will alert you when an item is out of range and before it is lost for good.  And the LassoTag hitch is under $40, not $150, which means if for some reason it disappears you won’t be overly devastated.  

The iOS application has been approved by Apple and will launch in September 2012.

Did we mention the app will be free?

Project backers have multiple options to get these LassoTag hitches for less so check out all our reward levels and start tagging your stuff.  

Why LassoTag? 

With LassoTag you can leave your worries behind because we give you peace of mind.  Let LassoTag keep track of your prized possessions so you don’t have to worry about them.  

LassoTag is lightweight and affordable so you can have multiple tags for multiple possessions. Get a tag for each or attach the tag to the item or items you want to track that day.

It's almost like having eyes in the back of your head. You'll never waste time searching for a lost item or fretting about something important to you. And you'll avoid spending money replacing those lost or stolen items. Not to mention the time you will save by not leaving something behind that you now have to go back to get.  

LassoTag gives you the sense of calmness that something – LassoTag – is watching over your stuff so you focus on other things.  LassoTag is on the job.

                 Life is distracting. Tag the things you want to keep in range.

                                                LassoTag it forward

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please share our web site with your friends www.Lassotag.com .
  • Like us on www.facebook.com/LassoTag
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Go to marketing@lassotag.com and tell us your story of lost items and how LassoTag can help with your daily activities. Let us know your profession so we can customize our product to fit your needs.

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
INDIEGOGO COMMUNITY

 WHAT IS INDIEGOGO?

Indiegogo is a crowed funding site that individuals, inventors, entrepreneurs, or start-up companies can present projects or campaigns to raise money by offering "Perks". “Perks” are discounts on a "Pre-sale" opportunity, or some other tangible item or recognition.

Most of the funding comes from family, friends, colleagues, investors, companies, or any individuals from around the world who would like to take advantage of a discounted pre-sale opportunity.

 

Thanks so much for checking out our project.

If you feel that this App is a useful tool, for just $10 you can show your support. You will receive the APP, also it assists us by showing the interest and need for our future related project developments and potential investors. 

We are not asking for you to invest, (but if you would like to, let's talk:) we are just asking you to take advantage of this pre-sale opportunity, that can benefit you and your family.

 

 

ABOUT THIS PROJECT

What is the TRAKET GPS Mapping APP? 

TRAKET allows a Parent, Caregiver, or someone with a relative who may have Alzheimers/Dementia, or Autism, to locate their loved one in a matter of seconds, via our TRAKET GPS Mapping APP, as long as they have:

  • an IPhone, Android or Smartphone on their person
  • a GPS enabled vehicle
  • a Cellular GPS Watch or other GPS device.

In today's society where there are so many reports of the elderly wandering and child abductions, a a caregiver or parent will have more comfort in knowing the whereabouts of their loved one, at anytime. 


Through partnerships with the University of Advanced Technology, agreements with a Software and Graphic Design company, and a major worldwide Cellular Service provider, this concept is finally becoming a reality.

"The control panel depicts an initial layout draft"
 

 

What makes the TRAKET APP different?

Does your GPS device have the option or function that allows you with or without a 3rd party to locate your device via a map application? If so, most of those GPS Tracking APPS will simply allow you to bring up a mapping system and then it will show the location of that particular device... That's it!

***JUST IMAGINE***

*You come home from work to an empty house. Without calling all of your kids to see where they are, you calmly walk over to an Android Tablet or an IPAD that you may have mounted on the wall or on the counter. Click on the TRAKET Icon, and within seconds, the individual locations, up to five devices at a time, identified with a picture of your family members, pops up on a Google map. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

* JUST IMAGINE... You can tell if they are at a specific location,  on the move in a vehicle , the direction and the speed they are going, or jogging or walking. You can even text them from the TRAKET APP, to let them know that you are home, or what time dinner will be ready. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

* JUST IMAGINE... You know your daughter is about to get out of her gymnastic class, you're in the middle of preparing dinner, and you notice your son is in the area. You can notify him via text message from the TRAKET APP to swing by and pick your daughter up. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

* JUST IMAGINE... Your child is in distress, flat tire, car broken down, injured etc., so they activate an SOS alert from the device they are using... All of a sudden, an alarm goes off on your cell phone, the wall monitor, or any other device associated with your secured APP. Instantly, the TRAKET APP is activated and the location of your child, indicated by a flashing red beacon, appears on the map. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

* JUST IMAGINE... Someone mistakenly takes your cellphone or your vehicle...Reality check! Someone steals your cellphone or vehicle. You can contact the police, and in real time, give them the location of where it is located the direction of travel, speed or where it has stopped. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

* JUST IMAGINE... Your child is about to take their first class trip out of state. You now can rest easy knowing that at any time you can see their exact location via google maps. GPS devices can be used anywhere in the world, including cities, deserts, oceans, lakes, mountains, or anywhere else a disoriented individual or adventurous traveler may find himself.

* JUST IMAGINE... Athletic Training Mapping- when you come back from your 3 mile run, you can print out the route you took, distance, time and speed. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

* JUST IMAGINE... Your child decides to hitchhike,  or ride his bike across the country. You would be able to follow them and see their location at any time through the TRAKET APP. You can program the TRAKET APP to notify you when they reach pre-determined checkpoints, or if they don't reach those locations by the expected time. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

* JUST IMAGINE... You may have someone with Alzheimers/Dementia or Autism who's at risk for wandering. You can set up virtual boundaries around your house or neighborhood, set to activate at predetermined times. If  your loved one goes outside the boundary when it's activated, the TRAKET APP alarm is activated, and the location of your loved one, indicated by a flashing red beacon, appears on the map. (CAN YOUR APP DO THAT?)

Our Motto is: "IT CAN BE DONE"

We refuse to accept notions of "It can't be done" or "We can't do it". With today's technology and talented people, we can accomplish anything... And that's where we need your help to finish the final software development and application.

NOW YOU NO LONGER HAVE TO IMAGINE IT!

How does the TRAKET GPS MAPPING APP work?

The TRAKET GPS Mapping APP will allow the caretaker or parent to:

• Find the location of the person with a GPS enabled device at anytime, without having to contact a call center or 3rd party. But if you need assistance, we are here 24/7 to assist you.

• Click on the TRAKET icon which will take you to a secured site. Enter your password and your registered GPS Device page will come up with a Google map showing the location of the GPS device. On the profile page, you will have the option of entering information to include; a picture of the user, physical description, medical information, address, emergency contact information, etc. This information can be useful in an emergency situation.

• Monitor multiple devices at the same time, on the same page.

• "LOCATE NOW"- Click on their picture on the control panel and their present location will appear.

• "Bread Crumbs"- Click Bread crumbs and the the route they took during a pre-determined time period to their present location will appear. This can be set up in 30sec, 1min, 5min, 10min, 30min or 1hour intervals.

• The TRAKET page is also where you can set virtual boundaries. You can put a box around your house, neighborhood or even school on the map, and when the wearer leaves that box, a text message is sent to you. 

Customer Service, Emergency Assistance and Warranty.

• Customer satisfaction is very important to us. We will be providing a 24/7 year round Customer Service line to assist you with any questions or technical assistance regarding the TRAKET GPS Mapping APP.

• We also offer an Unprecedented Emergency Assistance service. Is your loved one missing but has a registered GPS Device with them and you are not sure what to do? If you are unable to or don't have access to Google Maps to locate him, we can do that for you. We will also assist you with contacting your local Law Enforcement Agency, Search & Rescue agency and cooperate with those agencies until you and your loved one are reunited.

• 90 Day Warranty- Should any technical defect occur due to improper materials or workmanship, the same shall be made good at NO cost to Owner.

Indiegogo Community

We are so excited and we hope you are too. Our TEAM has worked long and hard to design from conception, research and conducted surveys on the most usable features to get to where we are today. We have included some very generous rewards, because we want you to be part of the success. We're not a big manufacturing corporation with deep pockets but rather, like you, a hard working team of people who want to make this world a safer place. We are at the stage of software development, applying the concepts, and writing the codes, to formulate everything into an APP which will be the link between the device and our servers. This is an expensive task that we have taken, but with you taking advantage of this pre-sale opportunity, we will be able to complete our project to make our TRAKET GPS Mapping APPavailable for everyone.

 We look forward to tweeking it with your help and suggestions along the way in order for you to take advantage of those refinements on the first run.

Thank you so much Indiegogo Community

 

QUESTION: Why is the amount on the "Early Birds" the same as "The Package but the Perk is different?

ANSWER: When the "Early Bird" was written, the amount was wrong. Since we put it up and someone pledged that amount, we can't change, delete or correct it. The faithful pledger will receive the same perk as "The Package".

If you are unable to or don't have access to Google Maps to locate him, we can do that for you. We will also assist you with contacting your local Law Enforcement Agency, Search & Rescue agency and cooperate with those agencies until you and your loved one are reunited.
• 90 Day Warranty- Should any technical defect occur due to improper materials or workmanship, the same shall be made good at NO cost to Owner.
Indiegogo Community
We are so excited and we hope you are too. Our TEAM has worked long and hard to design from conception, research and conducted surveys on the most usable features to get to where we are today. We have included some very generous rewards, because we want you to be part of the success. We're not a big manufacturing corporation with deep pockets but rather, like you, a hard working team of people who want to make this world a safer place. We are at the stage of software development, applying the concepts, and writing the codes, to formulate everything into an APP which will be the link between the device and our servers. This is an expensive task that we have taken, but with you taking advantage of this pre-sale opportunity, we will be able to complete our project to make our TRAKET GPS Mapping APPavailable for everyone.
 We look forward to tweeking it with your help and suggestions along the way in order for you to take advantage of those refinements on the first run.
Thank you so much Indiegogo Community
 
QUESTION: Why is the amount on the "Early Birds" the same as "The Package but the Perk is different?
ANSWER: When the "Early Bird" was written, the amount was wrong. Since we put it up and someone pledged that amount, we can't change, delete or correct it. The faithful pledger will receive the same perk as "The Package".

story:
The Kickstarter community continues to amaze us with their enthusiasm, feedback, and support. With your help, our Trailhead Adventure Pants quickly became the most-funded technical pant, ever. Here's what people are saying about our best-selling pants:

 

 

We’re bringing you the same comfort, versatility, and functionality of the Trailhead Adventure Pants--now in shorts! We've listened to your feedback and upgraded the fit and features of these best-selling pants to bring you functional, stylish, and durable Trailhead Adventure Shorts, in men's and women's designs.

 

You choose the style and color. You'll be able to make your selections once the campaign ends. 

You choose the style and color of the shorts and pants. You'll be able to make these selections once the campaign ends.

We've upgraded the style and fit of our famed pants to create new sizing for the Trailhead Adventure Shorts. With three colors to choose from and styles for men and women, you can be sure there's a pair for you!

Sustainability is behind everything we do. By working only with bluesign® approved facilities, we consider our environmental impact in every step of production, minimizing our impact in design, testing, manufacturing, distribution, and shipping.

The Trailhead Adventure Shorts, like the pants, are constructed from a combination of ripstop nylon and polyester mechanical stretch, both made from recycled materials. Surplus yarns and plastic bottles are smashed, melted, and spun into new fibers that are woven together to create this innovative fabric.

Our factory partners are working towards zero emissions through green initiatives such as gray water recycling, energy-saving ventilation, solar and energy-efficient lighting, on-site wetlands and green spaces, and much more.

Conventional manufacturing methods use toxic chemicals, produce hazardous waste, and contribute significantly to carbon emissions. We work only with facilities that are bluesign® approved, ensuring the highest standards are met in efficiency, safety, and clean manufacturing.

Our hangtags and packaging are printed on recycled paper with post-consumer waste content, keeping trash out of landfills and preserving our forests.

 

 

Who We Are

Coalatree designs eco-minded gear and apparel for the adventurer in everyone, from athletes and photographers to your average city folks and weekend warriors. It’s our passion to bring elements of the outdoors and the city life together. Whether you’re summiting the tallest peaks or lounging around town with friends, our products are practical, stylish, and functional. Being ready for anything is what we’re all about.

Greet the Outdoors

To us, a MTN2CTY lifestyle is one of adventure, freedom, and ease. We wake up early to catch sunrise on a ridge before seamlessly transitioning into the office. We’re out on the town on a Friday night with friends then up for dawn patrol on powder days. To Greet the Outdoors is to be ready to pack our bags, hit the road, run the trails, and explore.

Our Giveback

Each year we use surplus fabric to create warm blankets for the homeless in our hometown of Salt Lake City, Utah. We also partner with local organizations to maintain the hiking and biking trails we frequent and to protect the integrity of our watersheds.

story:
Once upon a time...

Allow us to introduce ourselves and our story: We are a group of best friends born and raised in Rotterdam. We set up this fundraising campaign in order to fulfil a great dream of ours: To participate in the Mongol Rally, the greatest motoring adventure on the planet and the biggest charity rally worldwide.On 21th of July 2019 we will travel as tem “the rotterdam rally “crew” for over 16000 km through Europe and Asia to raise money for the charity Coolearth in a Toyota starlet (We call her Toos). There’s no backup, no support and no set route; just you, your fellow adventurists and a tiny car Our party is composed of the fitness coach and womanizer  Jesse (Yes-R), the goofy biologist and eager sheep saver Rick (Rick without morty), a whacked out of his mind finance student Xander (Kanon)  and a sound technician and local strongman Pieter (DJ P-Rex). The four of us know each other for a long long time. However, now we are all at the end of our studies and about to enter after-college real world. In order to battle time and all forces that try to drive us apart, we decided to do one gigantic awesome great trip together. We have already invested a great deal of our time, effort, and money to ensure our participation in the 2019 Mongol Rally. Now we need your help with the last bits!

Our charity 

We support Cool Earth. Cool Earth is a non-profit organisation that works alongside rainforest communities to halt deforestation and climate change. Cool earth saves the world's rainforests by directly working with the communities living next to the rainforest; one of the most effective ways to halt forest destruction. A local trust which they support with education, employment, and volunteers to protect the rainforest. They are doing an amazing job and have already saves 901679 aces, protected 216402960 trees and stored 234436540 tonnes of co2! If you want to know more about them you can just visit their website: https://www.coolearth.org/

Help us

This trip requires a massive amount of planning. We will be driving through extremely harsh environments starting from the well organised and relatively safe highways of Europe through the difficult and rocky mountains of Kazakhstan to the dry and completely uninhabited planes of mongolia. Mongolia the land of eternal Blue Sky and  Ghengis Khan. In this land with no roads we shall combat the freezing nights and the harrowing heat of the desert in our fight for survival. Mind Bear Gryllis would not stand a chance in this environment. To calm are mothers down, we decided it would be a great idea to increase our chances of survival. In order to do this and reach the finish line  we will need many different things. Anything from donations of food, equipment, tools, lodging, and anything else you can think of would be greatly appreciated.

You! Yes, you can help us in at least two different ways. First of all, we would be really grateful if you could make us a donation to let us live our ultimate roadtrip-fantasy. Secondly, please tell everybody you know about our amazing journey. Tell your parents, your sister, brother, grandpa and grandmother. Your closest friends and your biggest enemy. Spread the word to the dentist, the man on the street, that creepy person who sits across you in the train. Tell your neighbors and your bridge club and your yoga class or soccer team. GET THE WORD OUT and show this page to them. The more people we have on board supporting us the closer we are to realizing our dream and helping to save the rainforest and the bigger the chance you will get one of those awesome souvenirs. Please help us!

(This is Toos, a 1,3 litre-benzine cookie jar. This beautiful and gently metal beast , with all her grumpy sounds, will roar during our trip. She will not be tamed by the rocky roads of Iran. She will carry us up the high mountains of  Kazakhstan, even Pieter who is 2 meter and almost 100 kg. We will give her the time of her live and let her be free on the planes of mongolia, while we suffer in the heat because she has no air condition. We believe in her!)

story:
Over View

Portability and ease of use are two of the key phrases we bore in mind throughout the whole process of developing DIVA, as we see how drones are getting more integrated into our daily life. Nevertheless, DIVA’s performance is not compromised by its compact body, as we gave it the vision of a 4K aerial camera and a battery life of 26m. Built upon our rich experience in industrial design, DIVA is streamlined to very minimeter. Meanwhile, the aerodynamic body was enhanced by strategically positioned lines and bones so each DIVA drone is built to endure and last.

 

 

DIVA indoor testing video

 

GIMBAL & EIS  SHAKE-FREE SHOTS

Equiped with a two-axis gimabl and strengthened by our EIS stablization system, DIVA minimizes the screen jitter during flight and achieves superior stability for cinematic shooting.

High Quality 4K Camera

Striving for the best image quality, we choose 4K HD lens with 1200W effective pixel for better photosensitivity and color fidelity. It has a maximum frame rate of up to 60FPS (1080P), which can be compressed in 60Mps with a field of view at 80° to share on social media platforms.

  • Image Sensor: 1/3 inch;
  • FOV: 80˚ wide lens;
  • Aperture: F2.0

It has maximum frame rate up to 60FPS (1080P),  allow sharing on social media platforms and stream compression rate up to 60Mps with field of view at 80°.

Video taken from DIVA

 

 

Campact & Portable

When folded, DIVA is almost as small as a regular smartphone. It is a drone that you could actually carry around and use on a daily basis, just like you phone.

26-mins Flight Time

DIVA’s compact body does not compromise its performance. For instance, it sports a high density battery with a life of 26 minutes, affording you enough time to capture every dazzling moment of your day.

Easy To Use Fun to Fly

Take off/landing has been made as easy as one-key control. Some other control methods are customizable to better fit you way of flying.

Exclusive Remote Controller

DIVA’s detachable joystick control is as ergonomic as the drone is aerodynamic, giving you the most comfortable grip. The real-time image transimission range between the drone and the goes up to 2KM, so you can enjoy flying completely free and unconstrained, as flying is supposed to be.

iOS & Android App

We created an app, both iOS and Android compatible, specifically for DIVA. It has multiple flying scenes built in, and controls the drone with precision. Get ready for the simplist and most intuitive flying experience!

Flexibility in controller mode setting can be set according to usage habits through DIVA App.

Map Setting

You can easily swich DIVA’s map between 2D and 3D to accurately display the position and direction of the aircraft in real-time.

Autonomous

On the mobile app, you can draw a flight trajectrory with Geofencing. DIVA will fly according to the designated trajectory. Set up to 40 points for the flight path. Hold and press the single navigation point and drag to modify its coordinate position; Quick press a single navigation point to set the heading direction of the navigation point.

Make beautiful scenery through the flight path feature.

 

One Key, Shot Wonderful

DIVA is your personal 24X7 professional photographer. Available modes include Dronie, Rocket, Circle, Follow Me, Helix. These modes will get you started quickly. So just relax and enjoy the fun of flying and filming from up above.

  • Dronie：DIVA will climb and retreat at a certain speed
  • Rocket：DIVA climbs vertically at a constant speed,
  • Circle：DIVA takes the current position of the aircraft as the center of the circle, moves back to the set radius, starts recording and circles.
  • Follow Me：DIVA automatically aims the lens at the target position, keeping the current relative position and heading to follow the shot.
  • Helix：DIVA rotates 360° in place at a fixed angular speed to automatically start recording.

 

Timelapse

Time-lapse photography brings out the most dynamic visual effects. It’s like watching time flies right in front of your eyes. DIVA has two time-lapse modes of difference frame rates, which create different visual effects.

 

AI Gestures

DIVA can receive commands with simple gestures and movements, opening up new controls for take-off, landing, and shooting.

 

First Person View

FPV (First Person View) intelligent somatosensory control mode can bring a more real, more exciting pilot perspective. You can feel the world of immersive flight.

 

Share

With DIVA you can not only make Hollywood blockbuster like videos or professional photographs in one click, but also share them anytime anywhere with just a single click. Our app support most social platforms. So just click, sit back and watch likes and comments flood in.

 

DIVA utilizes GPS and optical flow to cross check its positioning. A big collection of sensors, such as the ultrasonic wave and barometer, make sure it flies more steadily and hovers more stably.

Safety is priority. DIVA is packed with safety features just so you can enjoy flying without any concerns.

  • All-Direction Mode: DIVA flies in headless mode. When the joystick is pushed forward, DIVA always flies according to the user's front.
  • One-button Return: DIVA will automatically record the return point when taking off. When you press the return button, DIVA will automatically fly back to the starting point.
  • Auto Pilot: DIVA will automatically return to the designated return point when communication is lost during flight.
  • Low Power Returrn: when DIVA reaches the low power, it will also automatically fly back to the designated return point.

Special thanks to: Ryan, Chris, BC, 4K, Shawn, James, Alex......

 

Every detail, no matter how small it is, we make sure it will receive our full attention.

Now more than ever, we are connected to social media and love to share our travels, weekends, and everyday life events with our friends and family. With DIVA, you can experience everyday moments using the highest quality camera of any drone out there, and then share your amazing photos and videos with others!

Be rewarded with 10% commission of every dollar you help raise for our campaign!

 

Let's review the DIVA again

 

 

 

 

Why DIVA Drone？

Hi, I'm Jason. I'm very excited to share about DIVA Drone with you on Indiegogo and hope to hear from you on it.

In 2018, Funsnap team developed iDol Drone , we were thrilled and grateful. We received a lot of suggestions from enthusiastic backers and included them in the final production. The product was well received.

Because of this, we continue to engage our users to explore their real needs. We improved on the stability, made the product intuitive and give our users immersive flight experience. We are confident that DIVA will be on a whole new level.

Our campaign is to bring DIVA to more enthusiasts and gather more suggestions to make DIVA perfect.

At present, the project has entered the initial production phase, and backers who support us will be the first to fly DIVA.

 

FAQ


1 Where can I use it?
Either indoor or outdoor is ok.


2  What is the flight time for DIVA?
The average tested flight time for DIVA is 26 mins, but the actual time would depend on its specific environment and weather.


3  Can I swap batteries easily?

Absolutely, remove the empty battery, plug in the full one and you're back in flight.


4 Where does it ship？
DIVA is available ship to most of the countries. If you cannot order in your region, please contact us in time, we will find a suitable forwarder to open the region asap.

5  I'm interested in becoming a DIVA distributor. What can I do?

We've received dozens and dozens of inquiries about distribution opportunities, and we'd like to say how much we appreciate the interest! Please email us at hello@fun-snap.com if you're a retailer interested in distribution. Thanks again!

6.how long does it take to full recharge battery?
 It takes 40 minutes to fully charge.

7.what sensors it have to avoid hitting front/back/down obstacle?​

 DIVA maintains hover and has stable flight performance through the use of a combination of GPS, optical flow, ultrasonic sensor and barometer.

8.Do I need to register this drone?

Yes. Follow the rules of your local civil aviation authority for safety registration.

9.what's the max hovering time? 

Maximum hover time is 26 minutes.

10.what's the max wind speed resistance?

29 - 38 kph

story:
Calm, by CrittEar, is the first of its kind. Calm is a patent pending, in-ear Noise Blocking & Hearing Protection for dogs!  Calm is made of a special formulated memory foam and veterinarian approved.

It was created for dogs that have noise phobia, noise anxiety from thunderstorms, fireworks or other loud noises, and for dogs that are in situations where they will need noise blocking & hearing protection.

It has a shape that is specifically created for a dog’s ear canal that fits dogs from chihuahuas to great danes! 

  • Noise Blocking

  • Hearing Protection

  • Dogs can relax and be calm

  • Easy to use and effective, 31 NRR

  • Comfortable & stays in place 

  • Veterinarian approved

We all know dogs can hear better than us.....5x better! They live in this same, loud, world with us. We protect our hearing when in places that could damage our hearing, and now we can do the same for our loyal companions...our dogs! 

Provides Protection Against:    

  • Fireworks

  • Thunderstorms 

  • Private Planes and Helicopters

  • Loud, public spaces, ie: Concerts, city noises, traffic

  • Every dog shape, size and breed!

Including all: Therapy dogs, working dogs, Military dogs, Law Enforcement dogs, and Search & Rescue dogs!

 

It’s so simple! The training to accept Calm is as easy as teaching them to sit, roll over, or stay! All you have to do is gently pull up on the dog's ear to elongate the ear canals. Insert Calm until it is flush into the ear canal opening and then release the ear.

See how easy it is to do this!

 

                                                   

It’s as easy as training your dog to sit, shake or stay! 
Each dog is different. It can range from a day to a few days. Just keep working with them. Keep the training sessions short and sweet. 5 minutes to start.  (treats are always good incentives, too!) Soon they realize you are helping them and will accept them with no problems.

 

 

CrittEar Pack:

We all came together because of our love for dogs! We all wanted to solve a very common problem. We want to keep dogs safe. We all knew that current solutions, like medications and isolation weren’t really solving the problem. We knew that together, we could offer a safe alternative that would make dogs, and their families, happier and safer. 

Who Created Calm by CrittEar? 

Like you, I am a dog lover – I have four!

Over that last few years, I’ve noticed my older golden retriever becoming more and more sensitive to sounds and loud noises. I tried everything; cotton, people foam ear protection, tight shirts, over the counter medication, seclusion, & more, but nothing worked. I felt helpless! I also noticed that it wasn’t just my dog. I need to help these dogs! 

The light bulb went off! I HAVE AN IDEA!  The rest is history and Calm by CrittEar was born! 

 


 

100% Production, Manufacturing, Logistics!

We want to be able to get all the sizes made during the campaign. We want to help all the different fur family members we can help!  With your help, we will do it!

 

 

 

 


Don’t Have Dogs? Can’t Contribute Right Now? You Can Still Help In A Big Way! 

If you love Calm, by CrittEar, but can’t financially back us at this time, we would love it if you would please take the time to share with your network on your social media pages. It would really help us out.
story_txt:
Calm, by CrittEar, is the first of its kind. Calm is a patent pending, in-ear Noise Blocking & Hearing Protection for dogs!  Calm is made of a special formulated memory foam and veterinarian approved.It was created for dogs that have noise phobia, noise anxiety from thunderstorms, fireworks or other loud noises, and for dogs that are in situations where they will need noise blocking & hearing protection.It has a shape that is specifically created for a dog’s ear canal that fits dogs from chihuahuas to great danes! 
Noise Blocking
Hearing Protection
Dogs can relax and be calm
Easy to use and effective, 31 NRR
Comfortable & stays in place 
Veterinarian approved
