story:
Your personal aerial photographer and 4K video recorder.

We aimed at designing a simple, user-friendly and affordable drone for everyone and everywhere.

The Moment’s collapsible and lightweight design allows you to fold it into the size of a notepad. This space efficiency makes it very easy to take on the go.With 4k camera and the user-friendly smartphone app, you can take an aerial shoot easier than ever.

Moment drone features high-performance camera that delivers 4K UHD 25fps video and 12-megapixel images. Not to mention it offers multiple shooting modes: Sweep Panorama mode, Continuous capture mode, Delay capture mode. The Moment will become your personal Self-Flying photographer!

Using visual detection technology, the Moment drone can track your face or body and accompany you on every step of your journey. It can auto follow you and taking videos, just turn on the auto-tracking and put your smartphone into the pocket to enjoy a ‘hand-free’ flying experience.

Moment features one optical flow sensor and ultrasonic sensor, together with SLAM 3D technology, it can hover and clear shot every time.

 

With electronic stabilizer, which is built to withstand turbulence and reduce the rolling shutter effect, Moment can give you blur-free footage and images. The initial design focused on the drone stabilization alone; we have further optimised the original design with the electronic stabilizer, making Moment one of a kind on the market.

*Actual shot from Moment Drone

 

 

Moment drone can return to its home point automatically with sufficient GPS signal. If the battery gets too low, the connection is lost, or you hit the Return to Home (RTH) button, Moment flies back to the present home point.

 
 
Outdoor precise localization: Features dual-band GPS, Moment knows exactly where it is, even you don’t.
 
 
 
Moment features a 4-inch tri-blade propellers powered by the 1906- brushless motor. Powerful propulsion offers steady flight even with strong wind up to 11 mph (18 kph). It comes with three different flight modes (Low, Medium, High sensitivity mode) to meet individual needs. With such an advanced flight control system, excitement and immersive experience are guaranteed!
 
 
 
Uncompromised flight time: With a fully-charged battery, Moment gives you a flight time up to 15 minutes, which is unbeatable in the drone category.
 

 

Easy launching & landing, even on the palm of your hand: Unlike other drones, Moment Air Camera features enclosure protector. You could safely grab and release it with your hand, perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

Protective Design makes it safe for all-ages and flying indoors: Safe plastic enclosures protect your fingers and allow hassle-free indoor flight

Easy carry:  Weighing only 400g, Moment can be folded into a size of a tablet that easily fit into your bag; allow you to capture your moments wherever you go.

 

Your photos and videos immediately sync to your iPhone/Android storage. Moment app features automatic editing templates and an array of filters. You can quickly edit videos and share them straight to social media.

Moment features a 2,900mAh high capacity battery, and the charging dock can be connected to the main power through a DC adapter, USB-C port or type C cable charger. This means the battery can easily be charged with a wall/car charger or with a power bank.

Here are some review videos shot by a 3rd party, you could check it out (These testing samples are not the final version, we are still updating the firmware to improve the performance of the Moment Drone):

Moment Drone Unboxing video by DroningOn

Moment Drone Flying test video by Alert Kim

The free iOS and Android app are easy to set up and even easier to use. It only takes you 30 seconds to learn how to fly Moment. Search "moment air-selfie drone" to download the app from App Store and Google Play store.

Just Connect and Fly

With Three simple steps, Moment is incredibly easy to use

See what you get in the Moment Drone Pack:

Three color options

Rose Gold (Left) Champagne Gold (Middle) Black (Right)

 

We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their Moment drone from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.  If you have any question regarding to the shipping, Please contact hello@momentdrone.com

Orders placed now will begin shipping in October 2017
*Actual ship dates may vary. we will keep you notified of your product ship date.

We are offering the exclusive early birds discount on Indiegogo. And we are able to ship worldwide. And free shipping for most of the regions of the world. Please see perk details for the shipping cost that applies to you

Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Moment Drone community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

story: Soy Daniel, vengo de Uruguay y actualmente estoy estudiando en UWC Dilijan, Armenia, con una beca completa que me ha permitido desarrollarme personal y culturalmente en muchas de mis áreas. Lamentablemente, esta beca no cubre los vuelos de tickets, y con mi actual situación económica familiar, me es imposible cubrir los gastos que representa. Mi familia es el pilar fundamental de mi vida y me gustaría poder pasar las vacaciones junto a ellos. Es por eso que estaría eternamente, si me ayudas a volver a casa en este verano.

story:
Bring the Love of God and the Fight against Hunger to Matagalpa

We are a church group from Liberty Baptist Church in Newport Beach, California. Throughout the years we have supported the efforts of Missionaries and Ministries devoted to helping individuals and communities through both direct outreach with soup kitchens and assistance for the poor, and through spiritual outreach with counseling and Christian based teaching.

Our church supports nearly one hundred missionaries around the world and occasionally we send a group of members to the mission field to help our missionaries directly.


This campaign will directly help the group we are sending by reducing the overall cost of the trip. Without this much needed opportunity we may have to lessen the amount of people that can go, and thereby reduce the effectiveness and assistance we can render to the people of Matagalpa in Nicaragua.

With your help we will bring, not only the light of God and his love, but also the fight against hunger and the hope it provides to the poorest of the citizenry. Through your contributions, you will be sending assistance directly to the soup kitchen where local citizens get a warm meal, among other things, to help keep them healthy and happy, and show them the love of a stranger.

The donations you send will directly help our team members by lowering the overall cost of the trip. This includes: Airline tickets, local traveling expenses, food, lodging, supplies needed during the outreach programs, etc.

Showing our gratitude...

As a token of gratitude for your willingness to help with our cause we will be giving unique and heartfelt perks, such as: Pictures of the team with the local populace signed and inscribed with their thanks, t-shirts showing your support of our noble cause, and no matter how much you give, every one of our contributors that donates will get a personalized thank-you on our Facebook page and church website to broadcast their generosity!

But what if...?

Regardless of how much we raise, your contribution won't be in vain!
Using Indiegogo's unique "Flex Funding" campaign, you can be sure that your donation will go towards aiding our missions trip, even if we don't raise the full amount!
Why?

Your money is valuable, we understand that. You want to make sure that your donations go to help people, and not into someone's pocket.
Well, we agree with you.
When you donate to our campaign you are putting that money into the hands of a poorest citizens of Matagalpa through the local soup kitchen. When we are in Matagalpa we will be working directly with the local missionary, not just with local outreaches, but with real-life programs designed to help the locals with the most basic needs, such as food, so that they can thrive!
Can't donate but want to help?

GREAT!
Word of mouth is just as important to our campaign as the dollars we raise!
With your help we can get the word out and let others know that they can join us in this noble and just cause.
Simply share our campaign on Facebook © or Twitter © and you can be a part of our campaign, too!

story:
To make a long story short: Y'all know who I am, what I do, and how much I love the game. Boise State can't attend World Cup 8, but I want to show a what's up to the haters in the United States that we got game. Time is running out, and this is my last chance of the season to do so. 

For those who don't know my story: I've been in the quidditch community for three years, and have yet to attend a world cup. Before my team was competing as an official team last year, I picked up the love of snitching at Western Cup IV. Since then I've snitched at a dozen tournaments, and with every game try to incorporate a bit of style. I'm ranked gold (the highest rank obtainable by snitch runners, and done so one handed) and my average game exceeds the first multiple handicaps.
 "If you follow your heart, all your wildest dreams will come true." -Napoleon Dynamite

perks to come

For those who don't know my story: I've been in the quidditch community for three years, and have yet to attend a world cup. Before my team was competing as an official team last year, I picked up the love of snitching at Western Cup IV. Since then I've snitched at a dozen tournaments, and with every game try to incorporate a bit of style. I'm ranked gold (the highest rank obtainable by snitch runners, and done so one handed) and my average game exceeds the first multiple handicaps.

story:
Why Buy?

The QuickStove Cook Kit was designed to be an affordable emergency preparedness kit that has everything you need to stay warm, boil water, or cook food when your car gets stranded in a blizzard, when you get stuck at work because of a tornado or when the power goes out at your house for a week. 

Now is the time to get your house, car and office ready for the disaster you never think will happen. 

This campaign gives you, our supporters, the opportunity to be the first to receive the Cook Kit at exclusive pricing. 

Even though Christmas is a mile away buy a few extra kits for Christmas presents for loved ones. Christmas will be here before we know it, just like the next disaster will be here before we know it. 

What You Get - Cook Kit (Ships April 2017)

  • Custom Branded Stainless Steel Pot
  • Cube Stove
  • 2 Fire Starters

The Pot

  • Holds the stove and fire starters for easy transportation as a self contained kit 
  • Has a sturdy handle that locks the lid down for secure transportation
  • Lid can be used as a cooking pan, eating plate or flipped upside down while cooking with the pot to be used as a double boiler
  • Great for cooking cakes, loafs, boiling water, heating up food 
  • Holds up to 7 cups of water (1.65 Liters)

The Stove

  • Made of Aluminized Steel with an electrostatic surface which reflects heat better than stainless steel or other comparable surfaces.
  • 4" tall x 4" square, folds to 2.75" tall
  • Can be used with the QuickStove pot, or any other cooking pan, pan, or cup
  • Weighs less than one pound
  • Made in the USA
  • Can be used again and again, unlike other disposable stoves
  • Accepts multiple fuel sources (Fuel Tablets, Sterno Can, Wood, Charcoal, Alcohol Burner, Fire Starter)
  • Boils water in 4 minutes
  • No assembly required

The Fire Starter / Fuel Disks

  • Made of cedar and highly-refined wax 
  • Made in the USA 
  • Each fire starter can burn 30 to 45 minutes 
  • Waterproof. Easy to light even when soaked in water 
  • Can be stored indefinitely 
  • Burns at over 1,000 degrees within two minutes
  • Can use the fuel disk as a stand alone fuel source or just use it as a fire starter and feed the flame with sticks and wood 
  • Leaves no residues or toxic chemicals behind
  • Exclusive to Kickstarter - The Deluxe Cook Kit
  • The Deluxe Cook Kit include everything in the Basic Cook Kit plus waterproof matches, utensils, food storage sample, and LED Solar Panel Keychain Flashlight. 

The Impact

The QuickStove Cook Kit will make a significant impact to the most important people, your family and loved ones. We will give you the peace of mind that you and your family are prepared in an emergency. We have been providing this assurance for years and now it's time to make our impact even greater.

Risks and challenges

We have already purchased the inventory needed to fulfill the orders we get from Kickstarter and the inventory is arriving April 2017. We are doing this campaign to get orders and money to fund the next order of inventory as soon as possible. We have an amazing product and we have completed the designing, prototyping, manufacturing and shipping. No need to worry about not getting your product. It has already been ordered and is on its way.

In exchange for your help, we are offerings exclusive pricing. As a bonus, we are also offering a limited time deluxe cook kit.

If you do not have the means to contribute, we would love you to spread the word. Please share our campaign on social media and reach out to at least 3 people you think want an awesome emergency survival kit!

story:
The Voyage Pillow's unique design features a unique construction that combines a comfortable microbead pillow with a multi-purpose poly/spandex tapered band. This signature spandex band allows for extreme versatility when finding that perfect sleeping position.

The overall design of Voyage Pillow packs in numerous beneficial features while maintaining it's compact and minimal form factor.

  • Microbead Pillow: Thousands of tiny microbeads fill the Voyage Pillow to adapt to any sleeping position for a custom and comfortable rest 
  • Multi-Purpose Band: Attached at each end of the pillow, the multi-purpose band allows you to use the Voyage Pillow in endless possible ways for a comfortable rest
  • Tapered Eye Mask: Block out unwanted light over your eyes when sleeping with the low profile tapered design 
  • Poly/Spandex Fabric: Fit almost every head size with the stretchy spandex exterior fabric
  • 2.5oz Light Weight: At only 2.5oz, you'll almost forget that you even have the Voyage Pillow in your luggage
  • Soft Plush Fabric: Enjoy the softest plush fabric across the interior of the Voyage Pillow
  • Compact Design: Save the space in your luggage with the Voyage Pillow's compared to a traditional U-Shape travel pillow

Traditional travel pillows are bulky and take up far too much precious space in your luggage. The Voyage Pillow is designed to allow you to maximize the available space within your luggage when packing either a carry-on or checked bag. 

At more than 50% smaller than the traditional U-Shape Pillow, save the space you need to bring more of the things that will help make your trip memorable.

Ditch the cumbersome size and shape of traditional travel pillows for the discreet form factor of the Voyage Pillow when running to catch that connecting flight. 

The compact size and pillow construction allows the Voyage Pillow to weigh only 2.5 oz. Simply grab and go with your luggage at the airport.

Effortlessly attach the Voyage Pillow to your carry on luggage when racing to catch that connecting flight through the airport!

 

Everyone has a different go to sleeping position when traveling. The Voyage Pillow is able to adapt to your preferred sleeping position while allowing for flexibility to shift around and change positions with ease without the pillow slipping or falling out of place.

Place the Voyage Pillow over your eyes, on the side of your head, around your neck, under your chin, around your hand, behind your back, between your legs, or whatever else might work so you can get the best sleep possible!

Never lose the Voyage Pillow on the go, easily drop is around your neck when you wake up from a nap and dash off to board the plane.

When you are stuck with that dreaded two hour delay on your connecting flight - take out the Voyage Pillow, sprawl out, and take a nap in the terminal.

 

One of the main goals when I was developing the Voyage Pillow was to find fabrics and materials that felt amazing to the touch, complimented the functional design, and looked great as a final product. After testing and experimenting with different fabrics and combinations, the perfect balance of these attributes was found.  

The Voyage Pillow features a polyester/spandex blended fabric exterior for flexibility and comfort in any sleeping situation. This allows for the pillow to comfortably fit almost every head shape - large or small. The heather fabric design adds a touch of style and depth to each colorway available.  

The interior is finished with the softest plush fabric for a gentle feel against your skin while your sleep. The solid colors create a visually appealing two tone design.

Lastly thousands of microbeads fill the Voyage Pillow to perfect sculpt to your unique sleep position. This construction allows the pillow to adjust to the pressure of being used while snapping back to retain it's shape at the end of that perfect nap.

 The Voyage Pillow is also machine washable!

As an early backer, you will lock in exclusive Indiegogo discounted pricing of the Voyage Pillow before it is launched to the general public and in retail stores. Choose the number of Voyage Pillows you are interested in to support this campaign - the more you buy, the more you save!

You will be able to select the colorway for your rewards after the campaign has been completed. You can choose from the three colorways available: Midnight Black, Ocean Blue, and Sunrise Red.

 A few key influencers have been taking the Voyage Pillow on their trips and can't get enough!

 

 

 

 

 

After years of traveling all around the world to New York, Paris, Stockholm, San Francisco, Montreal, Dominican Republic, Lake Tahoe, Chile, New Zealand, and more - I was absolutely hooked on traveling but hated actually getting to the location and losing a day from horrible sleep on the plane. I became determined to find a better solution for sleeping on the go. 

I found that traditional travel pillows on the market were bulky and designed for only sleeping in one particular position. So in May of 2016, I began sketching designs, cutting up pillows, and sewing my own creations. Once I had developed my initial prototype I began looking for a manufacturing partner to bring the Voyage Pillow to life. 

Different sample designs allowed me to test various fabrics, pillow densities, pillow fill materials, size, shape, and more. I spent the next four months working closely with a leading travel pillow manufacturer tweaking the design until it was absolutely perfect.

Once the final design was chosen I hopped back on planes, trains, buses, and taxis to put in some miles on testing the final pre-production design. On these trips I began studying airport displays to develop eye-catch packaging and picturing the Voyage Pillow on their shelves!

Lastly I wanted the final delivery of the Voyage Pillows to our backers to be just as beautiful with custom poly mailers!

Have a question, interested in featuring the Voyage Pillow, or simply want to just say hi?! Send an e-mail to info@sondretravel.com!

 

    

After months of planning, designing, and testing the Voyage Pillow, I am extremely excited to be finally launching the Kickstarter campaign for the backers. This timeline helps show the path that led to this launch as well as the next few months after the campaign when you can expect the rewards!

 Be the first to get your hands on the Voyage Pillow and back the project today!

story:
Help Support Makayla's Dream of Competing at The Summit!

Makayla's All Star cheer squad has received an At Large Bid to the 2014 Summit, in Orlando Florida. The competition will be held in The ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex at Disney World. Her squad will have the chance to compete with the best squads in the nation!

Makayla began competing for Express shortly after her 7th birthday. It quickly became her passion. She spends no less than 6 hours in the gym, each week perfecting her craft and countless hours watching cheer videos. In her spare time she cheers for The Little Elm Area Youth and Sports Association.

 

                    

                                                 How Can You Help? 

Your donation will help to provide the following:

  • Plane Tickets ($367/pp)
  • Hotel Accommodations at Disney ($500/pp)
  • 3 Day Hopper Passes ($215/pp)
  • Competition Fees
  • Dining Expenses

If you contribute a minimum of $25.00 to Makayla's campaign she will send you a signed picture of the squad at The Summit. Every contribution gets her a step closer to her dream. Makayla would like to thank you in advance for all of your love and support.

 

Thank you,

 

Adrienne Rogers

story:
What's the idea?

->Tagging your belongings without disclosing sensitive personal information! 

We provide unique QR-coded tags that can be read with any available QR-Scanner for smartphones anywhere in the world. Each scan of a QR::TAG is tracked and visible to the tag owner on the website.

QR:TAGs are reasonable priced and durable to stay on the tagged item for a long time. The prices contain all you need to pay, there are no additional fees for anything on the site!

Upon activation, you can freely choose whatever information you want to provide to the potential finder. You can f. e. provide images, telephone numbers, e-mail addresses or any other information you wish to convey. 

Finders need not to have a QR-Scanner, there is an option of entering the code number manually at our website: http://www.planetbarcodes.com

If you don't have a scanning app on you phone, you can our PlanetBarcodes app for free in the Apple and Android app store.

What are the benefits?

-> Get your belongings back as fast as possible if lost!

No detour at lost-and-found offices, no keys travelling around in mailboxes, no fees for getting your stuff back!

We tested different items in several environments and got an unusually high response rate of more than 90%. This is because it's much easier for the finder to contact the owner directly rather than going to lost-and-found departments, vets, or other administrative services.

Naturally you need an honest finder! But this is what you need in any case and it is a good idea to make it for him/her as easy as possible to inform you!, right?

What could I use it for?

-> KEYS, FOBS and REMOTES for home, office, cars

Whoever's  lost one of these items, knows that this is a very unpleasant experience. If a finder can instantly get back to you through your QR::TAG you save a lot; f. e.

- daylong searches until you get your keys back
- ridiculous amounts of time for opening your home, car, office
- getting spare keys and/or replacement keys
- costs for getting fob replacements and new programming
- worries about home security because your key/fob is lost

-> IDs/PASSES for work and leisure

Ever lost your company ID or access-card? Delayed access to your building, unpleasant visits at the admin-office and similar are avoidable through iQR-Tags. 

The same with things like annual passes for skiing or other activities. Get them back fast when people scan the QR-Code and instantly get back to you!

-> PETS

Your dog got lost in the park? Your cat doesn't come home?

When someone picks up your pet carrying a QR::TAG he/she will scan/enter and get back to you directly and comfortably. No frightening transport for your pet and wait in the animal shelter - no fees! Maybe a small present for the finder! :) 

-> BAGS

You forgot your bag on public transport? Lost your bag on airline-travel? People wherever can scan your QR::TAG, see the information you provide them and get back to you instantly. No annoying airline hotlines or the lost-and-found to get your bags back - and no fees!

-> CHILDREN'S BELONGINGS

Your child came home without the new bought coat or valuable sports equipment? You normally start asking and investigating. If you QR::TAGgged important things most likely you will get them back without much effort - people care and like to be helpful!

... and MANY OTHER THINGS like

... umbrellas (who does not forget those always), sports- and outdoor-equipment (f. e. snowboards, helmets, goggles, snowshoes), musical instruments, auxiliary medicinal items (f. e. crutches).

How can I get and activate it?

> 1. Choose your preferred QR::TAG-Pack on the right.

> 2. When you get your tags delivered, go to www.planetbarcodes.com, choose TAGS, sign in and follow the instructions to ACTIVATE.

> 3. Enter your message to the finder.

Encourage the finder to contact you right away via your cell-number, e-mail, address, or whatever!

What you get & what we need!

You get a properly working and easy to use product and service that will save you time and money for sure! Please choose your QR::TAG-Package size.

The the activation and use of our database is included in all packages for all times - no renewal fees or anything like this.

Assuming that you only get one item with a value of $100 back within a year that otherwise would have been lost forever, it is a good deal even if you invest in the Family-Pack. 

If you think you'll never lose anything: Congratulations, we'll keep our fingers crossed for you!

We would appreciate more funds to develop and improve our website and design more varieties of this useful product.

Who are we?

We are a small group of tech-savvy inventors that think of ways to make QR-Codes more useful in everyday life.

We have created some interesting ideas around QR-codes and one of them is the QR::TAG which we find is a very helpful product for everyone.

If you want to get to know more ideas please like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/PlanetBarcodes

Thanks for your interest and "Happy QR::TAGging"!

Your PlanetBarcodes-Team

story:
Cool Refreshment Anytime, Anywhere
 

Nothing is better than a cold and refreshing beverage during a long drive or while traveling, camping and other on-the-go adventures.

But the old-school cooler that we all grew up with hasn’t improved in decades. It requires lots of ice, doesn’t keep beverages cold for long, and turns into a messy box of sloshing water quickly. Those old coolers are also inconveniently bulky, garishly coloured, and stylishly outdated.

That's why we made iFreezer Go20, a true dual-zone portable cooler and freezer with incredible performance and astonishing design. It is simple to use, energy efficient, and provides reliable refrigeration and freezing to keep your food and drinks cold & refreshing.
 

   


 

 

  • Fridge And Freezer 

It’s a fridge, a freezer or both at the same time! With the Independent Dual Zone design, iFreezer Go20 offers two independently controlled zones to ensure extended preservation of your fresh foods and beverages. Use the App to set your zones and get cool.
 



  • Precise Temperature Control

Precisely control and monitor temperature +/-1.8°F (-1°C) via digital display and touch operation. Ensure food and drinks stay within the appropriate temperature range. Advanced refrigeration technology from Germany to refrigerate or freeze up -0.4°F (-18°C).

  • Dry & Clean

No more melted ice in bulky coolers. You can keep your fridge dry and clean! Featuring removable dividers for optimal organization and an independent dual zone design, you can store your ice creams and beers in the SAME fridge at the SAME time! It’s totally a space saver and a game changer!

  • Ready To Party

iFreezer Go20 maintains accurate temperatures from 50℉ (10°C) to 0℉ (-18°C) with a 20L storage space. It’s able to hold 9 bottles of red wine (25 OZ / 750mL), or 29 cans of coke (12 FL OZ / 355mL). Or any delicious combination of food and fun!


 



All truly great products consider form as well as function. iFreezer Go20 was designed differently to reflect the modern lifestyle – using a sleek minimalist design and a style that complements today’s automobiles combined with the latest technology for versatility, convenience, and performance.
 

 

Great Design Meets Great Functionality

 

  • Portable & Compact

Unlike previous generations of car coolers that are bulky and heavy, iFreezer Go20 weighs just 10.8KG and with comfortable, built-in handles, it is easy to load and stores easily in any sized vehicle. 

  • SECOP (Danfoss) Compressor

The type of compressor we are using is SECOP (Danfoss) BD1.4F-VSD. The compressor we used is 60% smaller than its rivals and weighs in at only 2.3 kilos. With 42 Ip class and 5W (12V) fan, it is enabled to provide energy efficient, sustainable and smart performance. This specially designed compressor ensured maximum efficiency and reliability for iFreezer Go20. The optimized, low noise motor ensures outstanding performance for iFreezer Go20 when we need that extra degree of luxury on the move.

  • Smart Control

For ultimate convenience in the palm of your hand, iFreezer Go20 can be controlled and monitored by smartphone. The helpful iFreezer App also suggests the proper temperature settings for different foods and beverages so that all your refreshments remain at the perfect temp with just one-click!

 



 

  • Plug-and-go

iFreezer is easy to operate. Simply plug it into your car’s 12V cigarette lighter power point and hit the road. Forget going to the store over and over again for ice. Just begin driving and begin cooling. Concentrate on the fun not the cooler for your next adventure.



 

ICECO, the company behind iFreezer has been manufacturing portable freezers for decades. We have service centers in the US and Europe and offer a 12-month product guarantee along with friendly customer service.

  • Supplier to Luxury Cars

ICECO is proud to be a Mercedes Benz qualified supplier and also cooperates with other luxury car makers. In addition to the trust of our luxury brand partners, iFreezer Go20 is quality tested for worldwide use and meets the stringent safety and quality requirements of the IATF certificate, ISO9001 and ISO14001.
 

 

  • 12-month Guarantee & Local Service               

We care about our users beyond the sale. iFreezer comes with a 12-month product guarantee. For information or help with our product, you can contact us directly for warranty or local service in the USA and Europe.

 
  • Safe For You, Safe For Your Car 

iFreezer has built-in safeguards for you and your automobile. It utilizes a 3-stage battery protection system including ECU program for low voltage battery protection, Current overload protection, EMC anti-electromagnetic interference and anti-shock functions for safe use anytime.

 

  • Sustainability in Mind

iFreezer Go20 provides two cooling modes for more flexibility. Max mode for fast freezing lets you quickly reach and sustain subfreezing temperatures. Reach 32°F (0°C) in less than 15 minutes after turning it on. For less demanding cooling requirements, go into Eco mode for energy efficiency and savings.

 


 

  • Well Insulated

Regardless of the outside ambient temperature, iFreezer keeps cool efficiently with a heavy insulated construction that keeps the cold in and the hot out! The insulation also provides quiet operation during cooling cycles.

  • Interior Light LED

iFreezer Go20 equipped with an energy-efficient interior LED light, perfect for camping and overnight activities.


 

The iFreezer Go20 for super early bird backers is ready for shipping now!

iFreezer is easy to operate. Simply plug it into your car’s 12V cigarette lighter power point and hit the road. Forget going to the store over and over again for ice. Just begin driving and begin cooling. Concentrate on the fun not the cooler for your next adventure.
 

ICECO, the company behind iFreezer has been manufacturing portable freezers for decades. We have service centers in the US and Europe and offer a 12-month product guarantee along with friendly customer service.
Supplier to Luxury Cars
ICECO is proud to be a Mercedes Benz qualified supplier and also cooperates with other luxury car makers. In addition to the trust of our luxury brand partners, iFreezer Go20 is quality tested for worldwide use and meets the stringent safety and quality requirements of the IATF certificate, ISO9001 and ISO14001. 

 
12-month Guarantee & Local Service               
We care about our users beyond the sale. iFreezer comes with a 12-month product guarantee. For information or help with our product, you can contact us directly for warranty or local service in the USA and Europe.
 Safe For You, Safe For Your Car 
iFreezer has built-in safeguards for you and your automobile. It utilizes a 3-stage battery protection system including ECU program for low voltage battery protection, Current overload protection, EMC anti-electromagnetic interference and anti-shock functions for safe use anytime.

 
Sustainability in Mind
iFreezer Go20 provides two cooling modes for more flexibility. Max mode for fast freezing lets you quickly reach and sustain subfreezing temperatures. Reach 32°F (0°C) in less than 15 minutes after turning it on. For less demanding cooling requirements, go into Eco mode for energy efficiency and savings.
 
 
Well Insulated
Regardless of the outside ambient temperature, iFreezer keeps cool efficiently with a heavy insulated construction that keeps the cold in and the hot out! The insulation also provides quiet operation during cooling cycles.

Interior Light LED
iFreezer Go20 equipped with an energy-efficient interior LED light, perfect for camping and overnight activities.
 


The iFreezer Go20 for super early bird backers is ready for shipping now!

story:
THE MOST ADVANCED LONG-RANGE TRACKER

The only tracker that makes it incredibly simple to locate everyone in your group at the push of a button when nothing else will.

 
 
 

REAL-TIME DISTANCE AND DIRECTION THAT ALWAYS POINTS DIRECTLY TO YOUR PEOPLE

Forget navigating complicated maps and dropping pins. Real-time display shows the distance & direction of every group member at all times.

 
 
 
 
 

FIND YOUR PEOPLE INSTANTLY

Lynq features at a glance
 
 
 

THE ONLY LOCATION TRACKER THAT WORKS WHEN NOTHING ELSE WILL

 
 
 

SET A HOME BASE OR SAFE ZONE

Give your people the freedom to roam with assurance they'll find their way home, or set a boundary to know if young kids, those with special needs or Alzheimer's leave your area.
 
 
 
 
 

EXPERIENCE THE MOMENT, FIND
YOUR PEOPLE LATER

Whether it's friends, children or family, pets, or individuals with special needs or Alzheimer's, Lynq gives the people you love the freedom to explore.
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

GLOBAL CONNECTION THAT'S COMPLETELY SECURE

Lynq uses algorithms that blend GPS, long range, low power radio communication, with a custom antenna for connection anywhere under an open sky.
 
 
 

WEATHERPROOF, WATERPROOF, MILITARY-TESTED DURABILITY

Lynq goes anywhere you do, no matter the terrain.
 
 
 
 

SUPER SIMPLE ONE-BUTTON INTERFACE

No complicated process, instant location. 

 
 
 

PARTNERS

 
 
 
 
 
 

LYNQ IN ACTION

 

TAKE LYNQ EVERYWHERE

Easy-clip carabiner snaps onto virtually anything for a secure hold or can be slipped into a pocket, pack or pouch.
 
 

 

A LYNQ FOR EVERY STYLE

 
 

 

SET UP IN SECONDS

The single-button interface makes setup incredibly simple. Just a few steps with at least two Lynq devices, and you're ready to go.
 
 
 

DURABLE. RELIABLE. ACCURATE.

 
 
 
 

LYNQ IS SHIPPING TO BACKERS!

 
 
 

 

LYNQ SHIPPING

 
 
We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.
 
 
We plan to ship the product in to United States to our in-campaign backers in June 2019. International backers can expect shipping to begin in July 2019. InDemand perk orders will begin shipping for the US in on the same timeline, with international orders coming after. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.
 
 
Lynq will never be offered at these discounts again. By backing now you'll also be one over the very first to get and use Lynq. 
 
 
 
 

SHARE #LYNQME WITH FRIENDS!

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! We can't do this without you.

 
 
 
 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 
 
What is it? Lynq finds your people when nothing else will. A tracker that gives you direction and distance that works up to 3 miles without phones, maps or connectivity.
Who created it? Lynq was created by a group of tech & outdoor enthusiasts in Brooklyn NY.
Why should we use it? It's one button simple and begins to feel more like a sixth sense than a device. Lynq is the first location device that works without phones and connectivity and it's also the most secure and reliable one available.
How much does it cost?  MSRP retails at 2 units for $249. Early bird pricing is $154 for 2 devices, a 40% discount off of retail.
Where can we buy it? You can pre-order Lynq on Indiegogo.
What do we get when we order? Lynq devices, USB cords, quick setup card, registration card.
Why are you crowdfunding? Lynq has manufactured units for testing alongside business partners to ensure we bring our consumers a product that’s ready for market. We chose crowdfunding since it provides us the opportunity to work with early adopters first - those that love what we’re creating almost as much as we do.

 

What features are available? Up to 3 mile (5km) range; no need for phones, connectivity, maps, infrastructure; safe zone for parents; waterproof; rugged; up to 3 day battery.
What colors do you offer? White with black button for 1st model, additional depending on campaign raise.
What sizes do you offer? Lynq comes in one size: 4"x2"x1"
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet? Unobtrusive, small enough for a child to wear and easy to attach to clothing or gear with built-in carabiner or lanyard.
Does Lynq work by itself? Yes, the 'home' feature directs anyone to a location, meet-up spot or landmark of choice. 2+ units required for full feature set.

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology? Lynq is the only technology that provides peer-to-peer, real-time, location without phones or connectivity - working when nothing else will.
What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge? Up to 3 days of mixed use. Charge via micro USB.
What are the dimensions and weight? 4"x2"x1" in an hourglass shape
How does it work? Proprietary algorithms and communication protocols that leverage GPS, long range, low power radio and a custom antenna.
What kind of sensors are you using?  None.
Will there be updates to it in the future? Yes. Additional features are already being developed and available via downloadable firmware update.
How does it integrate with other connected devices?  Lynq does not require connection to any other connected devices, though future updates will allow *optional* connectivity.
Is it waterproof? Yes.
Where is it designed & manufactured? LynQ is designed by our team in Brooklyn NY and manufactured in Dongguan China.

 

How do I set it up? Via a single button and long press / short press interface.
How do I turn it on and off? Via a single button and long press / short press interface
How do I control it? Via a single button and long press / short press interface
What is the care and cleaning of it? Please us a damp cloth to wipe down and clean Lynq.
Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable? No. 
Does it have an expiry date? No. 

 

What are the recommend ages? All ages (from young kids to elder care).
Where can I use it? Anywhere in the world under open sky.
Is it safe? Yes.
What certifications do you have? LynQ is FCC and IC certified.
How durable is it? Lynq is waterproof, rugged and works under extreme temperatures. Our units have been tested by the military.
How is my privacy protected? Frequency hopping algorithms paired with encryption provide unprecedented security and privacy. Lynq does not keep/host any your location data.
How secure is it? "Hopping" / communication protocols prevent interception once devices are paired.
Can someone watch or listen to me? No.
Are there any risks associated with use? No.

 

When does shipping begin? August 2019 for in-campaign backers from the US. 
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? LynQ will begin shipping to our US backer community in August 2019.
Where does it ship? Globally
How much is shipping? We're offering free shipping in the US. Please see the flat fee pricing for your country within your perk.
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Please contact us.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Yes. Your pre-order on Indiegogo does not include VAT/GST.
What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today? Tools are complete and ready to fulfill orders after delivery of components.

 

Is there a warranty? Yes, 12 months, normal wear and tear or manufacturer defect.
What is your refund policy? Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. If the device is defective, a replacement will be sent.
What is your return / exchange policy? Returns & exchanges are processed on a case-by-case basis. Please email contact@lynqme.com to speak to our team.
How do I choose more than one reward?  To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information. You can also email us at contact@lynqme.com
I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester.  Units have already been beta tested with commercial partners, though further testing in extreme environments is welcome.
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? You won't need to wait long. Lynq has already manufactured units, allowing us to choose a August delivery with confidence.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? contact@lynqme.com

 

LynQ is for consumer use only it is not to be used for commercial purposes. For commercial licensing inquiries please contact LynQ at sales@lynqme.com

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
GREAT FOR PCs

Whether you’re traveling to an eSport event, a BYOC, LAN party or any other situation where you're needing to transport your entire rig the GTR-1 is idea for mid-towers and anything smaller. 

 

GREAT FOR DRONES

Our hardshell case option provides ease of mind and simple transportation for your drone or other technical gear.   

FOR BOARD GAMES

Finally you can carry all your tabletop games wherever you're traveling! The massive internal bay supports tons of games. With the 23"X23"X11" main internal bay there's plenty of room for super-sized games, did someone say Gloomhaven? 

DOES MY [INSERT THE NAME OF YOUR BIG STUFF] FIT?

Whether you're carrying camera equipment, video gear, or maybe even the kitchen sink the GTR-1 is ready to transport and protect your large gear. 

 

FEATURED AT

FIVE OTHER REASONS WHY THE GTR-1 IS PERFECT FOR YOU AND YOUR SUPER-SIZED GEAR

1. IT’S THE ONLY BACKPACK LARGE AND SECURE ENOUGH TO CARRY YOUR LARGE GEAR - It’s a backpack in its own class, the 95L rucksack. Large enough to hold any gear up to 23 inches (58cm) tall by 23 inches wide (58cm) by 11 inches deep (28cm) and support up to 70 pounds (31.75 kilos) of weight. Additionally, each backpack comes outfitted with our innovative cube system, or get upgrade to the hardshell for even more protection. The two-inch interior nylon strap securely locks the interior shell to ensure you’re gear is extremely secure during transportation.

2. CARRIES ALL YOUR GEAR, ACCESSORIES AND THEN SOME - Yes, the primary compartment is gigantic, but we’ve also added four other compartments to carry your other gear from cords to peripherals to clothes and pretty much anything you may need to transport, there’s room for just about everything including the kitchen sink. This includes: two front pockets, a large middle pocket. Finally, behind the primary compartment is a small sleeve to hold thin lined items such as laptops, tables, or magazines.

3. ERGONOMIC AND COMFORTABLE - We realized that carrying large gear could be awkward, to offset this we’ve positioned the straps and added plenty of cushioning to provide an ergonomic design that contours to your shoulders and back. Additionally, we've added a chest and waist strap for added support.

4. BUILT TOUGH - We know your gear has to be protected, period. The entire backpack is constructed of military-strength 900D Nylon that is tear and water resistant, and able to hold up to 70 pounds (31.75 kilos). We’ve padded the primary compartment, lined the interior with fleece and added a specialized rubber base to provide waterproof protection. Finally, we know you’ll be zipping and unzipping a lot, which is why we’ve installed premium, seamless SBS zippers for a smooth open and close every time.

5. CUSTOMIZE, MODIFY, MAKE IT YOURS - We wanted to offer a bag that has the ability to extend beyond just the backpack and be customized to fit your personality and needs. This is the primary reason we decided to create a backpack that leverages military-style Molle tactical loops and Velcro strips. The Molle system allow you to add extra components to extend the functionality and storage of your GTR-1. Additionally, customize your GTR-1 backpack to your liking by adding your favorite Velcro patches.

  

DETAILED SPECIFICATIONS

Size/Weight Specifications:

  • Overall Width (unstretched): 23" / 58cm
  • Overall Height (unstretched): 23" / 58cm
  • Overall Depth (unstretched): 14" / 35.5cm
  • Overall Width (stretched): 24" / 61cm
  • Overall Height (stretched): 24" / 61cm
  • Overall Depth (stretched): 20" / 51cm
  • Total Capacity: 95L
  • Primary Main Pocket Accommodates Up To: 23"X23"X12" / 61cmX61cmX35.5cm
  • Middle Interior Pocket Accommodates Up To: 22"X23"X8"/ 56cmX61cmX20cm
  • Front Top Pocket Accommodates Up To: 22"X8"X4" / 56cmX20cmX10cm
  • Bottom Front Pocket Pocket Space Accommodates Up To: 22"X10"X4" / 56cmX25cmX10cm
  • Weight without anything in the backpack: 6 pounds / 2.7kg
  • Weight capacity: 70 pounds / 31.75 kilos

Backpack Material Specifications:

  • Primary material: 900D military-strength, water-resistant nylon
  • Interior primary compartment lined with durable fleece
  • Seamless SBS zippers at all openings
  • Wick-away, mesh padding material on back and shoulders
  • All straps made of reinforced nylon

Interior Cube Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 23"X23"X11" / 58.5cmX58.5cmX28cm
  • Exterior material polyester nylon
  • Padded walls
  • Interior lined with with durable fleece
  • SBS Zipper

Hardshell Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 23"X23"X11" / 58.5cmX58.5cmX28cm
  • Exterior material ABS Plastic
  • SBS Zipper

PERK LEVEL DETAILS

GTR-1 - with Soft Shell Packing Cube - The perfect backpack for transporting your gear with the added protection of the interior cube. You can customized the interior softshell cube with the included velcro divider set. Looking for more than one? Check out our 2-pack perk level.

GTR-1 - with Hardshell Case & Softshell Packing Cube - The perfect backpack for transporting your gear with the superior protection of the hardshell case. You can customize the hardshell space with the included pick and pluck foam set. Looking for more than one? Check out our 2-pack perk level.

MEET THE CREATORS

SHIPPING 

We have established a relationship with a reputable fulfillment center to handle both domestic and international shipments to ensure they make it to their final destination quickly.

WARRANTY ON THE BACKPACK 

WARRANTIED FOR ONE YEAR - If your backpack ever breaks down during its first year of its life, just ship it back to us. We'll either repair it or replace it, and return it to you. It's our guarantee to you. ...BECAUSE WE’RE THAT CRAZZIE. Please note, Crazzie does not warranty the contents of the Crazzie Backpack. 

PRESS/CONTACT

  • Access our Press Kit
  • Contact us at team@crazziegear.com 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We've finalized the GTR-1 Prototype, but moving to the full-scale production phase requires significant capital and scale. We need your help to finance the required tooling and manufacturing to meet minimum order quantities. We've spent months and months working out the smallest and largest details of this backpack, and are very excited about finally having the opportunity to bring this Crazzie idea to life. Indiegogo is a proven start-up platform, whose community of “early adopters” vets, funds and helps refine new products and services in an efficient, timely manner. The traditional retail model involving distributors, middlemen and retail outlets is costly and adds little to no value. In fact, it is a major impediment to entrepreneurs, who want to see their vision for a new consumer product. Therefore, we highly value the Indiegogo community and its role in supporting innovation and hope that together we can launch the Crazzie Pro Gear GTR-1.

Backpack Material Specifications:
Primary material: 900D military-strength, water-resistant nylon
Interior primary compartment lined with durable fleece
Seamless SBS zippers at all openings
Wick-away, mesh padding material on back and shoulders
All straps made of reinforced nylon
Interior Cube Specifications:
Dimensions: 23"X23"X11" / 58.5cmX58.5cmX28cm
Exterior material polyester nylon
Padded walls
Interior lined with with durable fleece
SBS Zipper
Hardshell Specifications:
Dimensions: 23"X23"X11" / 58.5cmX58.5cmX28cm
Exterior material ABS Plastic
SBS Zipper
PERK LEVEL DETAILSGTR-1 - with Soft Shell Packing Cube - The perfect backpack for transporting your gear with the added protection of the interior cube. You can customized the interior softshell cube with the included velcro divider set. Looking for more than one? Check out our 2-pack perk level.GTR-1 - with Hardshell Case & Softshell Packing Cube - The perfect backpack for transporting your gear with the superior protection of the hardshell case. You can customize the hardshell space with the included pick and pluck foam set. Looking for more than one? Check out our 2-pack perk level.MEET THE CREATORSSHIPPING We have established a relationship with a reputable fulfillment center to handle both domestic and international shipments to ensure they make it to their final destination quickly.WARRANTY ON THE BACKPACK WARRANTIED FOR ONE YEAR - If your backpack ever breaks down during its first year of its life, just ship it back to us. We'll either repair it or replace it, and return it to you. It's our guarantee to you. ...BECAUSE WE’RE THAT CRAZZIE. Please note, Crazzie does not warranty the contents of the Crazzie Backpack. PRESS/CONTACT
Access our Press Kit
Contact us at team@crazziegear.com 
RISKS & CHALLENGESWe've finalized the GTR-1 Prototype, but moving to the full-scale production phase requires significant capital and scale. We need your help to finance the required tooling and manufacturing to meet minimum order quantities. We've spent months and months working out the smallest and largest details of this backpack, and are very excited about finally having the opportunity to bring this Crazzie idea to life. Indiegogo is a proven start-up platform, whose community of “early adopters” vets, funds and helps refine new products and services in an efficient, timely manner. The traditional retail model involving distributors, middlemen and retail outlets is costly and adds little to no value. In fact, it is a major impediment to entrepreneurs, who want to see their vision for a new consumer product. Therefore, we highly value the Indiegogo community and its role in supporting innovation and hope that together we can launch the Crazzie Pro Gear GTR-1.

story:
Review

https://the-gadgeteer.com/2019/09/11/pocketool-review/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX2IHd-2GfE&feature=youtu.be

 

PockeTool is a super-functional emergency multi-tool with 10 essential functions built-in, perfect for quick fixes and crafty save-the-day moments. The compact design of this palm-size everyday carry tool can fit comfortably in your pocket, on your keychain or even in your wallet for easy access. Equipped with a carabiner that you can also easily attach it to a belt or a backpack strap etc. It has many common practical features than any-other traditional tools. Unlike other bulky multi-tools, PockeTool can be easily carried around wherever you go and can be used in your everyday life. Moreover, PockeTool is TSA approved and airline safe that you can even take this handy tool with you when traveling around the world.

 

Though you hope a situation never calls on emergency actions, being prepared is always the right decision. Therefore multi-tools can be a useful problem-solving tool for some unexpected situations in everyday life. However, the usual multi-tools are sometimes too large in size and heavy to carry them with you in your pocket or in your bag every day. This is why you need PockeTool. This handy necessary tool can perfectly manage its task, despite its small size. Giving you everything you are likely to need; including: 

 

 

 

 

 

Designed for outdoor, PockeTool is useful whether you are cycling, skateboarding, camping, fishing, mountaineering, survival and any outdoor activities. Take, for example, it can be used as a spoke key to adjust or replace the spokes of your bike wheels. Adjust or replace the spokes of bicycle wheels with the 3.5mm and 4mm spoke key. Starting a campfire by partnering with a magnesium rod. Tighten the screw of a fishing pole or cut a fishing line. It can also be used when putting up a tent, for measurement and as a carabiner when climbing, etc.

 

PockeTool is equipped with a special tip to scrape off scratches, remove tacks and staples, open letters, etc. Also, it is equipped with a bottle opener that can open any stubborn cap in a pinch. And with the center hole located at the top of the tool, it can be attached to anything you want, such as a keychain or strap.

 

PockeTool features a new patented screwdriver head that can be used as Spanners 5.5 / 7 / 8 / 10 / 12, a Philips screwdriver and a flat-head screwdriver. The unique geometry design allows the maximum usage of any given screw types. PockeTool is a good example of how to do simplicity right with maximized features.

The semi-circle at both ends of the tool provides a groove for fitting the wire, in order to pinch cut the wire/rope or bend a thick wire easily.

PockeTool is equipped with a 5cm ruler. This versatile measurement tool allows users to have a handy measuring device for a quick check.

PockeTool is capable to open a standard metal paint can in multiple sizes. The geometry of the tip is designed to fit under the lid and pry open the can easily. 

 

 

Made of high-quality 420-grade stainless steel with a stonewash finish, PockeTool is extremely rust and corrosion resistant and hides minor scratches. It is strong, reliable, durable, lightweight, and can stick to any magnetic surface which makes it really comes in handy. The beauty of the stonewashed finish complement the wonderful precision grinds on your PocketTool.Make it more appealing. As well, the safe design with a smooth surface and obtuse angle edge prevent cuts and protect yourself from getting hurt while using it. Make it comfortable to use and offers an outstanding holding capability with excellent performance.

story:
The Freedom to Move Your Boat Cleat Anywhere!

No more frustrating knots or fixed cleats in the wrong place!

With the patent-pending Freedom Cleat, you will have the ability to put a boat cleat anywhere you need immediately! With our 250lb-grade heavy-duty suction cleat, you can place your fender anywhere on the boat with ease.

  • Heavy Duty Freedom Cleat works when wet
  • Large Carabiner that can attach to any fender
  • Quick-switch clip, allowing for multiple use cases for the cleat and instant adjustment
 

Our Freedom Cleat is no regular suction cup. Able to hold up to 250lbs and including an attached D-Ring, it is perfect for hanging fenders over the boat, holding wet boat ropes out to dry, as well as carrying any other boating products. 

The Freedom Cleat Adjustable Fender System features an auto-adjust clip and cinch for easily adjusting the height of your fender.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently seeking to raise $10,000 to help market and advertise the Freedom Cleat and put the finishing touches on our website and packaging. Our prototype is complete with the model done and product on the way. We are launching on Indiegogo to get the Freedom Cleat in the hands of all boaters by September 1, 2021.

If you choose to contribute to our campaign, you will receive a full Freedom Cleat Adjustable Fender System as well as a bonus Freedom Clip and Freedom Dock Line Holder to hang up all your wet dock lines, so they no longer mold!

 

So Many Uses for the Freedom Cleat

Not only is the Freedom Cleat the best way to attach a fender to your boat, it is also perfect for:

  • Hanging up wet dock lines to dry
  • Holding your life throw, which is typically buried under some seat when you need it
  • Keeping a waterproof bag with your valuables always in reach and ready to access

 

Stick it. Lock it. Let it Hang

Our team loves boating. We created the Freedom Cleat out of a necessity for a better way to use fenders on a boat. It always seemed that wherever we needed a fender, there was never a cleat in the place we needed it. We developed the Freedom Cleat to be the easiest way to use a boat cleat. Just place the Freedom Cleat. Lock it into place, and let your fender hang over the gunnel, per usual. That is it.

We tested method after method and prototype on top of prototype of ways to secure and adjust a fender, and we believe we have developed the best way. The Freedom Cleat is the tried and true ultimate cleat and fender system.

story:
Immersion in Russia

 

Our company has the ambition to break down the barriers that exist between Russia and you. We start by designing new authentic, immersive, and eco-responsible tours in Russia. Most of our trips include the Russian train as we believe it is the best way to dive into the Russian soul, and learn while travelling across this immense country.  

Our mission is to convince foreigners to come discover Russia, far from clichés, so they can enjoy Russia's incredible natural and cultural highlights. We have trips that go to the Far north, in search of Northern Lights, to Baikal Lake, Altai, Caucasus, and even to Vladivostok. With us, your guide will also be a  Russian teacher, it means that you will get an initiation to the Russian language during the journey. We work a lot to make these offers accessible for all, and to have the most unique experiences available.

 

A travel company in love with Russia

 

 

 

Olya, Jérémie, Guilhem and Frédéric created Immersion in Russia to share their love of the Russian culture, language and astonishing landscapes.

 

 

 

Our Values 

Immersion in Russia is a startup founded by a Russian-French team sharing the same astonishment towards the immense eurasian territory, culture, and population living there. We have a strong desire to promote tourism in these regions with respect for environment and local traditions.

That is why Immersion in Russia proposes a new way to travel. We have decided to benefit from the Russian railway network, one of the longest track in the world being the Trans-Siberian railway. This type of transportation guarantees authentic travel and low impact on the environment.

This approach led us to rethink the concept of travel where the means of transport - boat or train - become a part of the whole journey, a part of the fun. It allows the traveler to dive into cultures and traditions, meet with locals, and take time to observe the evolution and diversity of landscapes while moving forward.  

 

 

 

Help us conquer the Russian territory

Because Russia is full of surprises, unexplored places, hidden gems and marvelous cities we need your support to offer you many more original, crazy and ambitious adventures. For instance, we would like to take you to Baikonur, to meet with cosmonauts and attend to the launch of a rocket to space, for an affordable price. We would also love to design new programs to neighboring countries, such as Uzbekistan, Georgia, or Azerbaijan to explore even further this fascinating region. 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute it doesn't mean you can't help us!

Get the word out and make some noise about our crowdfunding campaign and share this page!

 

Check out our website: https://immersion-in-russia.com

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

1. Decide how many towels you would like then click the button that says "GET THIS PERK".

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. We receive your color & size choices and get your shipment out in April 2019.

 

Space comes at a premium, when we go out. The towel is an essential part of our everyday life. By not giving it importance, we are sacrificing our hygiene standards. The most common reason is lack of space and regular towels are too bulky to carry along. When in doubt, we leave it out. Other options available in the market may be compact in size but are made of petroleum-based unnatural fabrics, like microfiber, which may be less absorbent and does not feel good on the skin.

We are bringing a most versatile personal towel made of 100% Natural Cotton, for you.

Toliya is a full sized yet compact, thin, lightweight, quick drying, incredibly absorbent and soft bath towel designed for people who travel or love to go camping, who sweat it out in a gym, do yoga, swimming and enjoy a sunny day on a beach. Bundling all these amazing features to make your bathing experience exceptionally pleasant anywhere. Unlike ordinary bulky bath towels.

Toliya, your personal go-to towel is a space saver as it’s lightweight makes it easy to slip into your backpack, handbag or any bag.

It doesn't matter whether you are camping outdoors, working out in a gym or yoga class, a frequent traveler or backpacker, You can use Toliya towel to soak up water after a shower or sweat during workouts with 100% satisfaction.

It Makes Your Life Much Easier on Camping, Stay dry!

The Most Comfortable Towel to Carry into Your Yoga Class

Ride More and Stay Light & Dry

Enjoy Your Backpacking Exactly as You Like it, Carry Toliya

Are you tired of mediocre towels, which does not absorb? Try this Ultimate Sports Towel

Toliya towels are specially designed to be lightweight which makes them breathable and quick to dry. This reduces the chances of growing microscopic bacteria, which are found on regular towels that stay wet for hours. It gives a personalized experience and meets your hygiene standards, wherever you go.

 Conceiving an idea

Being avid travelers & sports enthusiasts, we always felt the need for a personal towel that can be carried easily without taking up extra space. All the options available in the market were, either too bulky or made of synthetic fabric like microfiber or polyester. This need converted into the idea, to develop a towel, which would be made of natural fabric, compact, lightweight and absorbent.

Resourcing

Finding the right fabric was not difficult, because when it comes to being skin friendly and absorbent, all time-tested fabric is “Cotton”. However real challenge was to find artisans who can weave cotton into an incredible towel to match our specifications. After consulting with experts from textile industries, we were directed to India, where handloom weaving, especially of cotton fabrics is as old as humanity itself. It has been a craft handed down from generations to generations. With the arrival of modern machines, this glorious art is dying and left with few families only which is hard to find. We were lucky enough to trace them and discuss our project concept.

Product Development & Internal Testing

From Oct 2017 onwards, our team started working closely with highly skilled artisans to create prototypes. In total 11 of them were created and tested over a period of 9 months, Testing was performed to control weight, volume, absorption, drying time, comfort, and durability. Out of 11, 3 samples were close to our expectations. With few further improvisations, we had the final towel design with us, ready for validation.

(Left) Prototype failed in durability test (Right) Improvised Prototype, durability test passed

 Prototype Validation​

Starting July 2018, we distributed about 100 pcs not only to our friends and family but in the local flea markets, to obtain unbiased end-user feedback. All the users were very much satisfied with the towels.

To honor master weavers of India, we have named it “TOLIYA”, derived from the Hindi language which means a Towel.

Toliya towels are ethically produced and we pride ourselves on our socially responsible and sustainable business model.

What People are Saying

"This towel has proven to me multiple times that it is durable, light, and effective. I love that I'm using something that is gentle on my skin, and the environment. I was not aware of the synthetic, harmful materials some towels are made of, until I met the makers of this one of a kind towel. I'm glad I made the switch to these soft, colorful towels! " - Elif  (Medical Practitioner)

"I am in love with this towel, I go camping and outdoor quite often. These towels are large enough for my body and absorb until the last drop." - Ricky, (Co-Founder,Timber Feeling)

"This is the Ultimate towel. I’m an avid fan of natural products. It feels so comfortable on my skin ,Toliya is my favorite towel now. My clients are loving them as well" -Fateema (Founder, Esthetics Spa)

"Ordinary towels are too heavy, bulky, take up too much space and have a long drying time. I am looking forward to the launch of this product! Good Luck Guys!" -George (Blogger, Globetrotter and Cyclist)

Colors 

Currently, Toliya is available in three exclusive and trendy pastel shades that are  

1) Peach  

2) Gray  

3) Green  

Sizes

Toliya towels are available in two different sizes 

Bath Size: Perfect Size for Bath, Travel, Camping, Outdoors etc.

Yoga Size: Perfect Size for Yoga Mat Topper

You can machine or hand wash in normal cold water. DO NOT bleach. DO NOT use fabric softeners. We recommend hanging your towel to dry; it is better for the environment. You can also tumble dry them on gentle or low cycle.

story:
Brick Distribution started as an idea in the mind of Jon Constantino. Looking to get back into the workforce after being a stay at home dad, the job horizon was looking rather bleak and none too kind. With an entrepreneurial spirit, the decision was made to see if he could pool together some resources' and thus Brick Distribution LLC was born with the help of childhood friend, Aaron Smith. Now with an official company in place, Brick Distribution is looking to take it the next level! 


Having been involved with skateboarding/the skateboard industry and having worked for several different companies over the past 30 years in sales and managerial roles, this seemed like a perfect fit and a natural progression for Jon. It also presented opportunity for him to work within a community he's loved since he was a kid. Brick Distribution is now looking to get funding to make our first purchases. We currently have 5 skateboard brands wanting to fly under the Brick Distribution banner. The brands were all started by long time friends that have been professional skateboarders and well respected industry veterans that have recently started their own companies with the same entreprenurial spirit. We are not looking to carry every single brand under the sun. Rather, we're looking to be more exclusive and that will reflect in the brands we've chosen. It's a family affair and we're stronger working together. 

The money raised will help us make our first purchases from each company that we will be distributing. Each company would certainly be considered a "small" company in relation to some of the bigger companies that we've worked with or were even sponsored by. Thus, having a lot of working capital can be hard to come by. The amount specified will help us purchase the products (boards, shirts, hats, bolts, etc), have them shipped to us, help us buy supplies to ship them out ourselves after they've been sold to skateshops (i.e. board boxes, shipping supplies, maintaining UPS/Fed Ex accounts), phone lines, website, and generally help keep us afloat during our initial run. In the event that we aren't able to raise the entire amount, the money raised will still be used for the same things. Only, the initial amounts we would be purchasing would be in smaller increments. Thus, it would take a little longer for us to get to a point of stability, but nothing we couldn't manage. Also, with the Agenda Tradeshow coming up in July, it would be in our best interest to attend the show and introduce ourselves and the company to buyers, shop owners and possible future collaborators.   

One of the things that we also want to put an emphasis on is that as the company grows, we're looking to hire local kids from the skateboard community and give them opportunities and perspectives that they may otherwise not be exposed to. In many cases, with the people we grew up with, skateboarding became the thing that saved them from going down the wrong path in life. It gave them a sense of purpose and community that they were otherwise lacking. Many of these friends went out to become professional skaters and have/had very successful careers. Many of them also now work within the skateboard industry. We want them to learn that despite whatever circumstances they come from, they have it within themselves to make their lives better. And skateboarding can become the catalyst for that as it was to many of us and our friends. 

We're looking forward to working with everyone to see this come to fruition!
story_txt: Brick Distribution started as an idea in the mind of Jon Constantino. Looking to get back into the workforce after being a stay at home dad, the job horizon was looking rather bleak and none too kind. With an entrepreneurial spirit, the decision was made to see if he could pool together some resources' and thus Brick Distribution LLC was born with the help of childhood friend, Aaron Smith. Now with an official company in place, Brick Distribution is looking to take it the next level! Having been involved with skateboarding/the skateboard industry and having worked for several different companies over the past 30 years in sales and managerial roles, this seemed like a perfect fit and a natural progression for Jon. It also presented opportunity for him to work within a community he's loved since he was a kid. Brick Distribution is now looking to get funding to make our first purchases. We currently have 5 skateboard brands wanting to fly under the Brick Distribution banner. The brands were all started by long time friends that have been professional skateboarders and well respected industry veterans that have recently started their own companies with the same entreprenurial spirit. We are not looking to carry every single brand under the sun. Rather, we're looking to be more exclusive and that will reflect in the brands we've chosen. It's a family affair and we're stronger working together. The money raised will help us make our first purchases from each company that we will be distributing. Each company would certainly be considered a "small" company in relation to some of the bigger companies that we've worked with or were even sponsored by. Thus, having a lot of working capital can be hard to come by. The amount specified will help us purchase the products (boards, shirts, hats, bolts, etc), have them shipped to us, help us buy supplies to ship them out ourselves after they've been sold to skateshops (i.e. board boxes, shipping supplies, maintaining UPS/Fed Ex accounts), phone lines, website, and generally help keep us afloat during our initial run. In the event that we aren't able to raise the entire amount, the money raised will still be used for the same things. Only, the initial amounts we would be purchasing would be in smaller increments. Thus, it would take a little longer for us to get to a point of stability, but nothing we couldn't manage. Also, with the Agenda Tradeshow coming up in July, it would be in our best interest to attend the show and introduce ourselves and the company to buyers, shop owners and possible future collaborators.   One of the things that we also want to put an emphasis on is that as the company grows, we're looking to hire local kids from the skateboard community and give them opportunities and perspectives that they may otherwise not be exposed to. In many cases, with the people we grew up with, skateboarding became the thing that saved them from going down the wrong path in life. It gave them a sense of purpose and community that they were otherwise lacking. Many of these friends went out to become professional skaters and have/had very successful careers. Many of them also now work within the skateboard industry. We want them to learn that despite whatever circumstances they come from, they have it within themselves to make their lives better. And skateboarding can become the catalyst for that as it was to many of us and our friends. We're looking forward to working with everyone to see this come to fruition!

story:
Do you love to travel? Are you planning (or dreaming of) a trip to Southern Europe and want to get some background information? Or are you an interesting person that likes to hear about stories and experiences from all around the world?

If you fit the criteria, then you definitely don't want to miss out on my reportage in Spain, southern France, and Italy this March. A reminder, the deadline is in only a few days - get the perks while you still can!

Short Summary of My Campaign

Hey, I'm Dominik, a 17 year old Canadian student from a less well-off family. I'm very passionate about writing, history, politics, music, different cultures, people, and art of all kinds! 

This March Break I will hopefully be going on an extensive journalism trip that will be an amazing, unique opportunity for me, and you can be part of it. 

Beginning in Madrid, Spain, I will be travelling through Barcelona, southern France (Provence and the French Riviera), as well as the cities of Pisa, Florence, Assisi, and Rome in Italy. A quick glance on the perks to the right will show you what I will be sharing to my contributors.

More details 

(For those brave souls that dare read long paragraphs of text)

For a few years now it's been my goal to write and get to travel to Europe to study its culture and people - the land of Hannibal and Caesar, Michelangelo and Da Vinci, Machiavelli and Descartes, Beethoven, Debussy, Napoleon Bonaparte, and how that relates to modern times. Thousands of years of history which were instrumental in creating the great world we live in now. Additionally, now with the recent migrant crisis I'm interested in observing it firsthand.
From March 9 to March 20, 2016  my school is organizing a trip to Spain, Southern France, and Italy. Beginning in Madrid, it will go through Barcelona, Provence, Nice (the French Riviera), Pisa, Florence, Assisi, and Rome. It is a chance to finally visit Southern Europe and learn about it firsthand, but it comes with a hefty price tag that is very hard to get in my situation: $3450.

Reporting


Europe is one of the most beautiful and fascinating places in the world. It is also undergoing a definite crisis or at least, a critical moment in 2016 - both within the European Union and with the onset of massive immigration.

I will be writing on numerous topics. My key focuses will be: 
1) History of the Region (this includes art and architecture) 
2) The Legacy and Remnants of the Roman Empire
 3) The Migrant Crisis
 as well as major attractions, interesting things I see, custom reports of my donors, and any unplanned topics I might feel compelled to write about. 

The Pont du Gard, a 2000 year old Roman aqueduct and bridge:

With the trip fully funded I will be able to fulfill my vision, practice my journalistic skills firsthand, where I will be exposed to a completely different reality, while you will get the opportunity to participate in my trip through the perks, getting great insights, professional reports, and fascinating photography from Southern Europe.

What We Need & What You Get

To be confirmed on the trip, I need $3450 by early February 2016 paid to EF Tours. $2500 of that I hope to raise through crowdfunding. Any funds over the limit will be used for trip expenses not included in the trip price such as lunch, attending special interesting events, and paying for souvenirs and associated costs for my donors.
I will do my best to give the most value that I can for your funding. 
Depending on the perk you choose, you have the options for some or all of the following:
  • un-copyrighted HD photos of the architecture, landscape or culture
  • a Travel Journal - the concise, illustrated report on the places I visit
  • some or all of the following reports: Migrant Crisis, Roman Empire, History of the Region
  • Daily E-mail featuring Photo of the Day and Fun Fact of the Day during my trip
  • custom report on anything related to the parts of southwestern Europe I visit
  • a souvenir
  • Post Cards sent from Barcelona, Nice, and Rome
  • travel guide - what to visit and where to eat
Examples of souvenirs: shot glasses, figurines of landmarks,etc.

Gaudi's at times comical and fantastical architecture is a key feature of Barcelona:


The Impact                                

Funding my trip will allow me to go on an extraordinary journey and be able to practice my journalistic skills. Travelling will give me a better understanding of the world which I will then apply in all my future undertakings. I think travelling could benefit anyone anywhere.

Best of all, it will give you an awesome experience as well - photos, comments, and reports on the entire region.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't pitch in even $3, I would really appreciate it if you could spread the word and share.

Equipment

For photographs and videos I will be using a Canon T3i. For daily e-mails and notes I will be bringing a laptop and associated materials.
