story:
Check out our press feed - Click here

 

 

 

 

The proprietary molecules are attracted to the bacteria and break the cell walls thereby‭ ‬destroying the bacteria before it can reproduce‭, ‬ensuring your clothing‭, ‬linens‭, ‬and gear stay cleaner‭, ‬body-odour-free‭, ‬&‭ ‬antibacterial‭, ‬longer‭.‬

 


 

 

 

 

The freshback campaign was created and promoted by the Cory Group.

 

 

 

freshback‭ ‬is more than just a laundry treatment‭, ‬it's a lifestyle‭. ‬It keeps you odour-free as you go about your day‭, ‬whether you are spending time with your family‭, ‬playing football with your mates‭, ‬hanging out with your friends or traveling‭. ‬

freshback ‬has you covered so you can focus more on enjoying yourself and less on what you smell like‭. ‬We are devoted to eliminating body‭ ‬odour to give you a new level of cleanliness and‭ ‬odour protection‭. ‬

 

freshback's advancements in laundry treatment ushering in a new era of sustainable washing that will significantly decrease waste in all aspects of consumers’‭ ‬laundry routine‭, ‬including water usage‭, ‬effluent pollution‭, ‬plastic waste‭, ‬gasoline consumption through shipping‭, ‬landfill excess‭, ‬electricity/natural gas use in homes‭, ‬and recycling costs‭.‬

Together with consumers‭, ‬freshback™‭ ‬is poised to redefine everyday sustainability efforts on a massive scale that will help to ensure that our earth’s health is supported throughout the coming generations‭. ‬We want to combat the effects of global climate change as efficiently as possible‭. ‬

With your support‭, ‬we can achieve our goal of bringing long lasting body odour protection to the world‭!‬

Do you know someone who would love freshback™‭? ‬Share our campaign with your friends and family‭. ‬Use our hashtag on any social media platform‭ #‬freshbacklifehack.


 

Interested in being a distributor of freshback in your country? Drop us an email at gilad@freshback.com with your offer and we will get back to you as soon as our campaign has reached its goal!

 

Why is there no US shipping?

Unfortunately, at this time, our revolutionary freshbackTM product line is available only outside of the United States and Mexico because we don’t have franchises in these countries. We appreciate your support, and we’ll keep you posted if you sign up for our newsletter, HERE.

 

How do I wash my clothes and linens after they are treated with freshback?

Clothes and linens that have been treated with freshbackTM can be washed and dried normally, even together with untreated items. Regular laundry cleaning won’t wash away the freshbackTM treatment. Its effect will remain on the fabric for up to 1 year, keeping your clothes free of body odour!

 

What can I do if freshbackTM didn’t work on my clothing/linens?

In rare cases, it’s possible that freshbackTM may not work completely.

Here are some reasons why:

The freshbackTM Premium Detergent was not fully rinsed out of the clothes before the Freshener and Bonder were added. If this happens, the Bonder will actually bind to the soap residue instead of the Freshener. To fix this, simply repeat the treatment, making sure to rinse the clothes thoroughly after washing them with the Premium Detergent.

With the proliferation of new, high-tech fabrics, you may find that some fabrics resist being treated. This is extremely rare. With these clothes, freshbackTM actually still works, but the effect tends not to last as long (usually 3-5 washings). If you come across an article of clothing that won’t stay fresh after treatment, please let us know. We are always learning, and you can help us improve our product for everyone.

Please contact our customer support line if you need assistance with replacing a packet for retreatment, or if you would like a refund.

 

How much can I wash at once?

We recommend washing a load of 3-4 kg of clothes on the medium setting. If you want to clean more than this at a time, simply use two freshbackTM kits at once, effectively doubling the amount of clothing and freshbackTM you use for each step in the instructions.

 

What is the difference between the different perk packages?

A slightly different formula has been developed for each freshbackTM product, designed specifically to treat the kind of wear and the needs of the wearer. For instance, the Baby Collection consists only of the Freshener and the Bonder with a special hypoallergenic formula; the Sports Collection includes a concentrated formula of the Premium Detergent, as well as a Freshener and Bonder, tweaked to treat athletes’ gear, providing extra odour protection to shield against sweat for up to 1 year. Our Home, Fashion, and Teen products are under development as we fine-tune our formulas to create the most effective products for every customer. All products are designed around our patented, 100% natural ingredients and include no harsh chemicals.    

 

Do I need to wear gloves to use freshbackTM hand wash?

FreshbackTM does not contain any harsh chemicals & there is no need to wear gloves while applying it. If you prefer to use gloves during any part of the process, you may without any adverse effects.

 

If you still have more questions, please visit our website: freshback.com

story:
"LANTERN is a powerful (1000 lumens), multifunction flashlight that appeals to the audience that places reliance on their gear in harsh situations. From the bike packer to the camper to the emergency prepper, this flashlight should appeal to all of you guys." --Shouldersofgiants.com

"In the great outdoors, getting more out of a single tool means a better time at camp and less gear and weight in your pack...the Lantern's flat bottom and diffuser let you stand it up on the ground, table or other flat surface in lantern mode, and the included strap and carabiner let you hang it off a branch or tent ceiling."  --Gizmag

 

  • Innovative handsfree lantern lights ANY space.
  • Powerful 4000mAh battery backup that quickly charges ANY device.
  • Rechargeable LANTERN battery allows for up to 72 hours run time. 
  • Mount to your bike for 700' (240m) beam and pulse.
  • Durable, lightweight, and compact design.
  • SOS strobe for emergencies.

 

CAMPING & BACKPACKING: Light up your tent or campsite, charge your phone or GoPro. Sturdy, water & shock resistant for outdoor action. 

 

CYCLING & BIKE-PACKING:  Includes a 360 degree bike mount. 3 brightness settings ranging from 180-1000 lumens, lighting your path up to 700 feet away. Pulse setting for daytime riding. Water and shock resistant to IPX-6. Charge your phone en route, perfect for long rides.

 

AROUND THE HOUSE & DRIVING:  Be ready for any situation, with power to spare. Fits easily in the glove box in case of a roadside emergency. A great emergency light and power source around the house. An awesome lantern for family barbecues and outdoor fun.

 

PHOTO & VIDEO SHOOTS: Casts bright and even lighting, perfect for taking photos and video. Many of the photos on this page were lit using LANTERN. 

 

IN THE FIELD & AT WORK: Durable and functional. LANTERN is small with hands free options, variable settings, USB power, water and shock resistant. Perfect for the tool kit.

 

EMERGENCIES: The perfect tool to have around in an emergency. Charges any USB device, lasts up to 72 hours between charges, recharges quickly, SOS strobe to help you be seen.

 

"The coolest component of the light though is the lantern light diffuser. The diffuser design really turns the flashlight into a wonderful lantern that illuminates your immediate camping area, your tent or a room in your house if you lose power. We love this design." --Shoulders of Giants

"If you're going camping with your bike you would be hard pressed to find a more suitable light."      --ilovecycling.com

 "The idea of a swiss army knife of lighting is intriguing." --Empowered Adventure

"In addition, its rechargeable battery lasts up to 72 hours between charges, and it acts as a power bank that offers mobile energy for your smartphone, camera and other USB devices." --Gadgetsin

 

exploded rendering showing all of LANTERN's key components

Pulse, 180 lumens, 400 lumens, 1000 lumens, Emergency Strobe & diffuser.

 

LANTERN is packaged in a custom, reusable EVA foam case. The case is designed to keep all the components together and safe so you can take LANTERN with you wherever you go.

 

 

 

 

Rolling Enterprises, developers of LANTERN, believe that all people should have the opportunity to have outdoor experiences that are fun, full of adventure, and safe. In our first year of building the fund, we will partner with organizations that connect as many people to the outdoors as possible. 

2% of all sales will go to the LANTERN Fund, managed for us by the Place2Give Foundation.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team has been working very hard to develop and deliver the highest quality product. To do this, we have partnered with an experienced manufacturer with a proven track record in producing high quality products. We have already completed the full design, tooling and moulds for the flashlight component and we have fully functional prototypes that we have been testing for several months. All that is left is to complete the moulds for the Lantern diffuser and move to bulk production.

Even with all the due-diligence and pre-planning we have completed, some issues with manufacturing do occasionally happen that are unexpected. These could delay our delivery, but we are confident that the likelihood of this is minimal.

In our first year of building the fund, we will partner with organizations that connect as many people to the outdoors as possible. 2% of all sales will go to the LANTERN Fund, managed for us by the Place2Give Foundation. Risks & ChallengesOur team has been working very hard to develop and deliver the highest quality product. To do this, we have partnered with an experienced manufacturer with a proven track record in producing high quality products. We have already completed the full design, tooling and moulds for the flashlight component and we have fully functional prototypes that we have been testing for several months. All that is left is to complete the moulds for the Lantern diffuser and move to bulk production.Even with all the due-diligence and pre-planning we have completed, some issues with manufacturing do occasionally happen that are unexpected. These could delay our delivery, but we are confident that the likelihood of this is minimal.

story:
It all started when we saw "Humans of New York" pictures of Iran and people's comments on them. We were shocked at how little people knew about Iran, a 2500-year old civilization with 24 world heritage sites, diverse natural attractions from hot deserts to snowy mountains, the world's largest water cave, and the most hospitable people in the world. 

That's when we decided to make a change! We built 1stQuest to promote and facilitate travel to lesser-known destinations. So far, we have helped more than 20,000 travelers to plan and book their trip to Oman and Iran. And now, we want to expand to three new exciting destinations: Azerbaijan, Uzbekistan, and Armenia. 

To make all that happen, we need you to back us up!

 

We all have missed the days we could travel around, but it's coming back again . Many countries have  already opened their borders and we believe this summer almost all countries will be open to travelers.

By participating in our campaign, you get to travel to any of our marvelous destinations and have experiences you can't have anywhere else. Our perks include tailor-made private trips (not group tours) for any date you choose. You buy the perk, plan and book your trip with our experts and  then jump on the plane and start a memorable trip to a lesser-known country with authentic culture, people and local food. If you need further details, contact our support at Crowdfunding@1stquest.com.

 

 

1- To expand our services to 3 new destinations

We will add Azerbaijan, Uzbekistan, and Armenia to our website and connect their local travel service providers to our platform.

2. To develop an awesome Trip Planner Tool!

Imagine you could receive a customized plan made by AI that matches your trip budget, time and preferences in a few minutes! Sounds magical? Because it is!

 


By contributing to our campaign, you take an active role in promoting tourism to lesser-known destinations. You help us grow our activity, and through this, also support dozens of local businesses and passionate individuals in each of our five destinations. Your support means more awareness about these amazing places, their history, their culture through quality contents and tailor-made private trips.

On the other hand, with your participation, you can visit one of the destinations on our list as a reward. See with your own eyes the rich culture and genuine hospitality of their people, which can’t be found in top tourist destination.

 

 

Share our story with your friends and family and help us reach more people. To share our campaign, just use the following buttons.

We count on your help.

Thank you

story:
Choose from the following 4 color options below:

 

 

Designed with the outdoors in mind, we wanted to create a product that could be utilized by anyone, anywhere. 

From the avid adventure seeker to the family who spends summer nights at the park, the simplified design can be taken full advantage of with it's 3-in-1 capabilities. 

From hammock to beach blanket to rain fly within seconds, the TREEO is the Swiss Army Knife of hammocks.

The real magic behind the TREEO is the Quick Draw Cord System inspired by the simple draw-string backpack. By pulling the cords tight on each end, it creates the hammock function which then attaches to the tree strap and carabiner.

The guy lines hang the TREEO high above to escape sun or rain.

And finally, by pulling the cords apart and staking each corner down, the TREEO can be used as a beach blanket or ground cloth.

 

 

  • Made from Ripstop Nylon Material known for being lightweight, durable, and waterproof 
  • Triple-Stitched & Taped Seams preventing any rips or tears 
  • Paracord that holds up to 500lbs
  • Attached Stuff Bag to keep your valuables at your side when in use

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We've tested and re-tested the functionality and durability of the hammock. You name it, we've done it - from cramming every single family member inside to traveling from the backwoods all the way to the beach. The TREEO performs against every element ensuring the highest standard of design.

Thanks for the support, we take pride in the products we make. WE OFFER THE RANGE TRAVEL GOOD GUARANTEE.

Follow our journey on social media and our website:

Instagram: @rangetravelgoods

Facebook: Range Travel Goods

Website: www.rangetravelgoods.com

story:
What can you see with powerful binoculars?

 

What makes binoculars better for stargazing?

More Comfortable: Stare for hours instead of squinting for seconds

Sharper: Fix vision problems like astigmatism

Wider: Find things quicker and easier with a 2.4 degree wide field

Brighter: Swift = 9-11" telescope, Drifter = 12-16" telescope

 

Two Sizes

As seen on

 

"Having been a professional astronomer all my life, Analog Sky's wonderful binoculars promise to have me joining the amateur ranks for the very first time.  I can’t wait to receive my kit. Bravo!"
Frederic Chaffee
Director Emeritus
W.M. Keck Observatory

 

How big are giant space binoculars?

Our binoculars gather a huge amount of light for bright images

Easy Assembly with Beautiful Instructions

The Swift comes with easy-to-follow instructions illustrated by Hugo Award-winning sci-fi illustrator Julie Dillon. You can start building the Swift on a Friday evening and be observing Saturday or Sunday night. As you build, you'll also get our tour of the sky's most beautiful treasures, written by Sky and Telescope magazine editor Jerry Oltion. 

 

"This is the future of telescope making."
Mel Bartels

 

Swift Features

 

"Analog Sky dramatically revamps the grab and go observing experience with its powerful, portable and thoroughly ingenious designs."
C. Anderson, super-early bird

 

Swift Specifications

  • 6” (153mm) f/4.5 primary mirrors
  • >93% reflectivity primary, secondary, and tertiary mirrors
  • 24mm 68 degree Explore Scientific eyepieces (28x magnification, 18.4mm eye relief)
  • Aluminum frame
  • 1.25” single-speed focusers
  • 1.25" filter cartridges (use any 1.25" filter)
  • 15 lbs (7 kg) OTA
  • Collapsible struts
  • 33% secondary obstruction
  • Full-length durable fabric shroud
  • Standard Losmandy dovetail mount connection
  • Alt-az mount with 3/8" thread tripod connection included
  • All stainless steel hardware 

 

"As an engineer, entrepreneur and amateur astronomer, I know a disruptive technology when I see one; this is going to change astronomy forever."
Jim Cox, super-early bird

This is the kit for most people. Complete Kit Includes: 

All parts included for assembly (including all mirrors)
24mm Eyepieces (28x magnification)
Red Dot Finderscope
Alt-Az Mount
Printed instruction guide and .DXF/.STL digital files
Limited Edition glowing Swift T-Shirt
Limited Edition Analog Sky poster
Hex wrenches, mirror silicone, luminous paint, and most tools/supplies included

See add-ons below for more options

Note: If you don’t own a photo tripod rated for 30 pounds/15 kg with central column, add a tripod to your cart at checkout

This is the kit for 3D printing enthusiasts--over 70 components to 3D print! Customize the look and feel of your Swift! 3D Printing Kit Includes: 

All parts EXCEPT 3D PRINTED PARTS included for assembly (including all mirrors)
24mm Eyepieces (28x magnification)
Red Dot Finderscope
Alt-Az Mount
Printed instruction guide and .DXF/.STL digital files
Limited Edition glowing Swift T-Shirt
Limited Edition Analog Sky poster
Hex wrenches, mirror silicone, luminous paint, and most tools/supplies included

2.5 kg of engineering-grade filament required (PET-G or better)
7"x7" minimum print bed size

See add-ons below for more options

Note: If you don’t own a photo tripod rated for 30 pounds/15 kg with central column, add a tripod to your cart at checkout

This is the kit for people who want to CNC/laser cut their own frame and source their own components. This kit minimizes shipping cost/duties for non-US customers. Minimal Kit Includes: 

All mirrors
Tertiary mirror kinematic mounts
Machined dovetails for mounting
Printed instruction guide and .DXF/.STL digital files
Complete components list

See FAQ for details on building the minimal kit.

There will be a future kit available direct from Analog Sky to upgrade a minimal kit to a complete kit.

Get the jump on the open source crowd and receive your plans 1 year sooner. This is the kit for people who want to build their Swift on maximum challenge level or as budget allows. Even grind your own mirrors! (Yes, you can do that.) Plans-Only Kit Includes: 

Printed instruction guide and .DXF/.STL digital files
Complete components list
Limited Edition Analog Sky poster

See FAQ for details on how to build a plans-only kit.

 

Add-Ons

You can add these to your cart at checkout. Don't forget your tripod if you don't already have a tripod rated for 30 lbs. payload and has a center column.

 

Additional Eyepieces

Additional eyepieces allow you to zoom in closer to see more detail. You can add these to your cart at checkout. Premium eyepieces expand the field of view from 62 to 82 degrees:

This wider view looks amazing and lets you find things easier and keep them in the field of view longer.

Medium range (75x magnification): See more details in deep space objects. $199/pair

Close-up (125x): See Saturn, Jupiter, Mars, Uranus and smaller deep space objects close-up! $199/pair

Premium Medium range (60x): See more details in deep space objects with a spaceship window feel. $399/pair

Premium Close-up (140x): See Saturn, Jupiter, Mars, Uranus and smaller deep space objects close-up, and track them much easier with a wider field of view! $399/pair

 

"This is astronomy observing the way it was meant to be!"
Dr. Bryan Shumaker
Adj Professor, Dept. Of Physics (Astronomy)
Oakland University, Rochester, Mi.
NASA/JPL Solar System Ambassador

 

"I grew up not knowing the night sky,
and I don't want that for the future generations."
Edward Chan, super-early bird

 

Drifter Features

 

 

Drifter Specifications

 

  • Dual 8" f/5 primary mirrors (GSO) recoated to 97%
  • Aurora Precision 6-point primary mirror cells with locking bolts
  • Enhanced aluminum secondary (2.6") and tertiary (1.8") mirrors (Antares)
  • 2" dual-speed focusers
  • 2" filter cartridges (use any 2" filter)
  • 30mm 65 degree eyepieces
  • Under 50 pounds for OTA 
  • Custom Berlebach tripod with K70 geared column
  • Machined aluminum or stainless steel components
  • Engineering-grade 3d-printed components
  • Two Noctua primary fans
  • Z-bolt laser finder
  • Tracer LiFePO4 battery pack

 

"Looking through the Drifter at Oregon Star Party was an absolute delight. I'm sincerely excited to add this to our family's collection!" 
Susan Anderson, super-early bird

 

Team

 

Where does the funding go?

 

Analog Sky is a truly people-powered project to move amateur astronomy forward. There are no secret investors behind the scenes, so your support pays for everything. The more Swifts and Drifters we sell, the more capacity we build early-on.


R&D:

Rigorously test and finalize Swift and Drifter designs

Test both with a variety of eyepieces and mounts

Test and perfect Swift assembly process

Optimize all 3D printed parts for easy printing

Write and illustrate instruction guide with accompanying videos

 

Manufacturing Capacity:

Build a 3D Printing farm: Printers, remote monitoring, racks, ventilation equipment, tools, and containers

Assembly machinery, furniture, and tools

Packaging and shipping stations

 

Components: 

Wholesale orders of mirrors, eyepieces, laser-cutting, tubing, components, fasteners, etc.

Packaging and printing

3D Printing filament stocking

 

Operations: 

Rent, Insurance, Legal, Accounting, Wages

 

"My 4 year old granddaughter & I are not only looking forward to exploring the universe together, but to actually assemble the time machine to do it puts the cherry on top."
AT, super-early bird

 

Timeline

 

 

"I'm an astrophotographer, but the lure of a giant binocular
view of the sky was too much to resist."
MR, super-early bird

 

Risks / Challenges

The Drifter has been in the prototype stage for two years. The Swift builds on what we've learned from the Drifter. Rigorous testing will finalize these designs. There is no software to develop, no proprietary electronics to troubleshoot.

Our greatest risk is one shared with all telescope makers: Global optics supply chain. We are working to diversify our sources for mirrors so that supplier difficulties don't slow down our schedule.

A margin for unexpected costs and challenges is built into our minimum goal. As we reach and surpass the goal, our safety margin will increase.

 

Full Warranty on Parts

story:
Community Courts International is an organization setting out around the globe to build multi-sports courts for areas in need. CCI builds courts for basketball, soccer, volleyball, and four square, providing all the necessary playing equipment.

Project #1: Nets for Nepal

The problem: Many villages spread throughout the Himalayas either have very little sports equipment or no sports equipment at all.

Volleyball is very popular in Nepal, so we have been invited to trek for 2 months throughout the Himalayan Mountains, setting up high-quality volleyball nets in 7 remote villages.

First, we will fly into the capital, Kathmandu, where we will base ourselves as we prepare to set out to the villages in the surrounding mountains. We will travel to those villages from Kathmandu by transit as far as it will take us, then backpack all of the equipment and supplies the rest of the way. After we get to these remote areas, we will set up high-quality volleyball nets for the community, and provide numerous balls and pumps to keep the games going! Once we have set up a volleyball net in a village, we will teach a volleyball skills camp for anyone in the area who wants to learn to play or improve their game.

Now, this is no easy task to do in Nepal, so how’s it all going to happen? First, we are raising a minimum of $6,000 just for the flights. We are also seeking equipment donations from sports equipment manufacturers and retailers.

During this expedition, we will be recording a documentary, made specifically for all of you early supporters. 

It all sounds like a good reason to help, right?

Please be sure to sign up on our website and Facebook to get live updates and lots of information regarding this project. 

Thanks for your support, and welcome aboard this adventure!

Only 25 dollars to support us in making this happen will entitle you to receive an HD download of our documentary.

http://www.communitycourtsinternational.com

story:
Hi there. I'm Chris Ryan. I’m a writer, poet, and philosopher.

This year I plan to engage in a research project that unravels the human condition, and points the way towards a better world for mankind. I don’t think it’s too much to suggest that I will find out the meaning of life. And I’m asking you to join me on this wild adventure.

The future of planet Earth is at a critical juncture. Climate change, Middle Eastern turmoil, and koalas with chlamydia - there are serious problems that threaten the world we live in. But where are people talking about solutions? We are more self-absorbed than ever; busy making Facebook updates and LOLing online.

 Sunset for humanity? It won't be this pretty

I will travel the globe looking for places where people have escaped the strictures of modern society to form strong, face-to-face, communities. From bars in Paris and pubs in Chicago, to beer halls in Munich and bodegas in Mexico, I will uncover what I call “places of communion.” Once I find these hidden holy places, I will fearlessly join the locals in their customs, whether it’s drinking wine, beer or spirits, to help me discover what these people have learnt through their varied traditions.

Unfortunately this wisdom won’t be revealed without an investment, and I have little money to speak of. That’s where you come in. With an investment of ten dollars, you can be a part of this bold, world-changing experiment.

It may seem expensive but the knowledge I gather across the globe will enrich us all ten-fold. Just a week ago I was drinking with friends late into the night and we solved most of Australia’s political problems. I quiver to think what wisdom I will attain after a year of communion with citizens of the globe.

There is wisdom in every bottle

If you are a tight-arse you may be wondering, “Why would I fund this dickhead to travel the world, when I could kick in to help a friend make an album?” If you did that, you’d have to feign interest in your friend’s shithouse music, and encourage them to pursue a career that will only end in misery. If you fund my research you never have to hear from me again (unless you want to).

You may think helping a starving child would be a more noble cause to give money to, but with corruption in third world dictatorships, do you really know where that money goes? Do you? Chances are the money is being siphoned off to buy AK47s that perpetuate the very war that has left little Mustapha in so much trouble in the first place. You should be ashamed of yourself for funding warlords who continue their rape and torture.

By supporting me, all the money will be spent on my research, and whatever this site takes in admin costs. None of it will go towards AK47s – unless on a visit to a Cambodian bar someone wants to sell me one cheaply.

People who want something for their donation can get weekly updates on my investigations into human society. They will be in prose and, for the time poor, pictures and a haiku.

If you’ve had a bad week after the death of a parent, or burning your tongue on a soy latte, you can forget your troubles for a moment as I share what I have learnt from a one-armed car thief in a Delhi drinking den, a high-class prostitute in a Manhattan jazz bar, or whichever guru I have communed with that week.

There will be doubters who think that this plan is too ambitious, that my hopes for the dawn of a new, enlightened age are absurd. To them I say: donate ten dollars, and let me prove you wrong.

 

This is a fixed funding project. All contributions will be returned if I fail to raise the $50,000 that will make this dream into a reality.
story_txt:
Hi there. I'm Chris Ryan. I’m a writer, poet, and philosopher.
This year I plan to engage in a research project that unravels the human condition, and points the way towards a better world for mankind. I don’t think it’s too much to suggest that I will find out the meaning of life. And I’m asking you to join me on this wild adventure.
The future of planet Earth is at a critical juncture. Climate change, Middle Eastern turmoil, and koalas with chlamydia - there are serious problems that threaten the world we live in. But where are people talking about solutions? We are more self-absorbed than ever; busy making Facebook updates and LOLing online.

 Sunset for humanity? It won't be this pretty
I will travel the globe looking for places where people have escaped the strictures of modern society to form strong, face-to-face, communities. From bars in Paris and pubs in Chicago, to beer halls in Munich and bodegas in Mexico, I will uncover what I call “places of communion.” Once I find these hidden holy places, I will fearlessly join the locals in their customs, whether it’s drinking wine, beer or spirits, to help me discover what these people have learnt through their varied traditions.
Unfortunately this wisdom won’t be revealed without an investment, and I have little money to speak of. That’s where you come in. With an investment of ten dollars, you can be a part of this bold, world-changing experiment.
It may seem expensive but the knowledge I gather across the globe will enrich us all ten-fold. story:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello Supporter,

This is a FIXED FUNDING CAMPAIGN.  If we do not reach our goal EVERYONE will get their contribution back.  We can not move forward without you, we hope you enjoy our presentation we have a lot to teach you today, and we thank you in advance for your contribution.

                                                                                   -HOCOO TEAM

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 2014-2015 is anticipated to be a very cold winter season, that doesn't mean you do not have to go to work, but it does mean you or your loved one can be comfortable while on the way!   You or someone you know could use a heated necktie this winter because.... keep scrolling

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have you ever experienced the harsh winter winds and weather?

This necktie keeps you warm in the winter by adding a blast of continuous                heat to your neck and head area.


     

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Even when the weather is cold outside he will still be HOT!!!!!!


Start the day off right by being warm and charged up                                                           with the best necktie you will ever own.


With many styles to choose from you will be ready for any occasion



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Hocoo Comfort Tie is currently 100% silk and is also waterproof so if you are out and about and happen to get caught in the rain don't fret.  Click the link below to Watch Philip Morrow accept the ALS Icebucket challenge while wearing this heated necktie.  He also donated to the wonderful ALS organization.




-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Has your phone ever died on you at the least inopportune time?

While you are on the go especially in the winter time you may experience your cell phone battery losing power more than normal this heated necktie has a battery that can be removed and used to charge your phone, ipad, tablet or other usb devices.




-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




In the summertime if you want to surprise that special someone, easily remove the battery, think outside the box and reach inside the discreet pocket of your necktie, she will never expect it but she will definitely love it.  " I DO"

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Watch The Full Video About the Hocoo Comfort Tie -  7:21


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


                        The Science Behind The Hocoo Comfort Tie










Dr. Craig Lomita, MD answers questions on how a heated necktie
could be beneficial to consumers.



In Conclusion

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Featured In...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We need your support to mass produce these wonderful neckties and have them delivered to you by the beginning of December 2014. You will be the first to receive The Hocoo Comfort Tie at a price that will be lower than future retail price.  Our company was also told that when we raise our campaign goal we would be taken on as a client and our product marketed on national television.


Go ahead get this wonderful necktie for your loved one trust everyone will be watching...




The production of our unique necktie does not take long to produce, though they are each carefully crafted we can almost guarantee that we can have this product out to you by the beginning of December 2014. Worse case scenario we have them to you by the end of December, but with our campaign ending in October that will allot us plenty of time to manufacture and deliver to you on time. 

Our Team:

Philip Morrow who came up with the idea for The Hocoo Comfort Tie while standing at the bus stop in the blistering cold on his way to a job interview.

Drew a heated clothes specialist who has worked hand in hand with Philip Morrow over the past 2 years through various prototypes to come up with a working product.

Marta who is a seamstress of 14 years and hand sews the Hocoo Comfort Ties together.


FAQ

1) Is The Hocoo Comfort Tie waterproof? 

Yes the heat strip is has a waterproof plastic covering allowing the necktie to withstand rain and down pours.

2) Can I only wear this necktie in the winter? 

No, we designed this necktie to be universal to all seasons. We did this by making sure the battery could be easily removed from the necktie so that in the summer time you can wear this heated necktie as any other ordinary necktie.

3) Do I have to buy a battery with each purchase of The Hocoo Comfort Tie?

No, since the battery is removable once you make your first necktie purchase with us you can easily use that same battery in every other necktie that you continue to purchase from us. This also allows for the price of every subsequent necktie to be priced lower than your first necktie purchase with the battery. 

4) How long does the battery Last? 

The battery will stay on continuously for 3hrs while heating up and will also last long enough to fully charge your USB device.


THANK YOU !!!!!

Support Our Campaign today and be the First to have The Hocoo Comfort Tie-The necktie that keeps you warm in the winter, charges your smartphone/other usb devices and in the off winter months can easily turn into a storage place for your pocket sized items.

***Feel Free to Share our campaign on Facebook, and Twitter #Theheatednecktie it would be most appreciated. ***

If you have any questions and for any Press Inquiries feel free to contact us  stayhocoo@gmail.com


Look at the photos below to see how handsome The Hocoo Comfort Tie looks,  would you have ever thought that a simple necktie could offer you so many options? It's  finally here the necktie that works for you...

 






OTHER PRODUCTS FROM OUR HOCOO LINE THAT HAVE BEEN ADDED TO THE PERKS ABOVE...




The HOCOO Executive Wallet...




Handsome Genuine Leather HOCOO Belt....


Beautiful Lady Hocoo Signature Handbag in Red and Butter Cream





HOCOO MENS BRIEFCASE-SIMPLY STUNNING



HOCOO MENS cufflinks in Gold and Silver plating




Lady Hocoo b/w double clutch purse




Lady Hocoo Shoulder Handbag in butter cream and in black





And Yes women wear neck ties also...



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A portion of the proceeds will also go to supporting the organization Little Flower Children and Family Services in which I grew up in as a child from 5-11. It is important for me to give back to this organization and show the children that they are special and can achieve anything they put their minds to.

story:
Slab is an awesome travel wallet – It's not minimalistic. Just properly done. 

We're so smart about money at home, but on the road we set ourselves back decades with awkward wads of cash, or money belts that mark us as easy pickings. Slab will keep you safe by not showing people more than they need to see. 

And it’s MADE IN CANADA because we like to support local people and communities.


The Story

I love the minimalistic wallet designs that have been flourishing on Kickstarter over the last couple of years. They’re amazing for home and give you easy access to your cards and the occasional folded bill. However, when you’re overseas, cash rules.


I like wallets.

Over the last five years, I have lived in China, Indonesia, Vietnam, Hong Kong, the Philippines, and Thailand. Only cash can give you piece of mind in these countries. Unfortunately, the petty theft rate is really high.

In one unnamed Asian country, I heard stories about tourists paying for their purchases at convenience stores, not knowing that thieves were checking out their wallets. After they left the shop, their wallets would get stolen a block down the road.

I used a bi-fold wallet for a bit, but then I encountered a police officer in another unnamed Asian country and he levied a "fine” on the spot. I pulled out my wallet, and when he saw some big bills, my "fine” doubled.

We’re often our own victims. I was hiding cash in my cargo shorts and created a complicated system of different bills in different pockets. In the end, I lost quite a bit of money in taxis, nightclubs, and restaurants because bills stuck to my phone or hands and fell out.

And in countries where every traveler is a “millionaire” (example: one million Vietnamese dong comes out to fifty bucks), some of the small bills and the big bills look the same at a glance. If you’re new to a country, what’s to stop you from giving 100,000 when you actually owe 10,000?

I asked myself a question: How can I organize my small bills for small purchases and have the big bills when I need them, all in the same wallet – but NOT have others see them?


Prototypes.

After nine months of different ideas, prototypes, and errors, I invented the SLAB: a three-plate magic wallet with RFID protection that can trick observers, keep your cash hidden and carry necessities for your cell phone (SIM cards and a SIM card removal tool for the iPhone).

I used almost a hundred year old design introduced by French and put a little twist on it...


American Edition (10.5cm x 7.5 cm) and Euro Edition (10.5 cm x 8.5 cm)


SIM card holder and SIM removal tool


Double gripping, strong elastic to keep your cards and cash in place.


Strong rare-earth magnets keep the plates aligned and will not affect your cards. 

IMPORTANT:

We use strong magnets in our wallet. The magnetic field is very narrow. Your credit card (with a magnetic stripe) is safe when you put it in, take it out and store it (i.e., regular use). HOWEVER, IT MIGHT DEMAGNETIZE if you SWIPE IT AGAINST MAGNET. Don't do that. We can't be responsible for loss of your card. Your chip, RFID and ID cards are totally safe, though.

Magic Wallet (2-Plate design):

When you go back home and don't need the "hiding" feature, you can just remove the central plate and convert SLAB into traditional Magic Wallet.


Remove the centre plate to create a traditional Magic Wallet.


Opened Magic Wallet.


Keep just a card and ID for a minimalistic profile.

Useful Info:

Pickpocket: See thieves work it on the streets of Buenos Aires. These criminals watch how much money you have in a wallet before stealing it. Scroll to 2:45 for details:

RFID theft information:

Adam Savage on RFID:

Features:

• Securely holds 2 cards in precisely machined slots

• Cash can be split into 4 compartments

• Proven old-school magic wallet design

• Chose aerospace-grade aluminum or Grade 5 Titanium for an awesome look and durability

• 13 rare earth magnets to keep plates aligned

• 3 SIM card slots and SIM removal tool for iPhone

• 2 sizes to choose from: American Edition (10.5cm x 7.5 cm) and Euro Edition (10.5 cm x 8.5 cm)

• Choose between the classic silver or anodized black, pictured here:

• RFID Protection

• Plate system. You can remove the centre plate to convert it to traditional Magic Wallet.

• Lifetime elastic replacement

• Choose between the classic silver or anodized black, pictured here:




• RFID Protection
• Plate system. You can remove the centre plate to convert it to traditional Magic Wallet.

story:
AnySafe is Back! After the achieved goals in Travelock, Anylock and Travelock 2 with TSA campaigns, we are back with AnyBag——the Backpack with a Anti-Theft Fingerprint Lock. We also won't let you down this time! 

                           

 

 

Normal Backpack is easier to be opened by strangers and is at risk of being stolen or lost . These headaches are solved in this newly designed anti-theft backpack with fingerprint lock, AnyBag. 

 

Unlike the traditional lock using on the backpack, AnyBag, this smart anti-theft fingerprint lock is instantly turned on with just your fingerprint touch. Not only can record 10 fingerprints, but also is able to unlock in 0.5 seconds.  

Anybag is more convenient and efficient in the dark night with the touch recognition capability, there is no trouble with finding keys and taking time. 

 

ONE fully charge for Three months. It avoids the troubles that often require charging and the interruption that out of electrical power during the journey, provide you an easier lifestyle. 

 

IP65 waterproofing ability to effectively prevent dust, rain, and salt spray corrosion. It is treated with multiple PTFE processes and has excellent temperature resistance.   

In order to meet the needs for different people, AnyBag is designed with a powerful storage capacity . Even a 17-inch laptop can easily accommodate. Not only that, but also for your commuting and short-term business trip. 

The gadget-friendly system improves your working efficiency, not let the backpack become a stumbling block in your life. Even in dark environments, it's easy to find the item that you wanna find. 

Computer padded layer can effectively protect your computer, also it’s for bump & shock absorption to protect the inside items. 

The luggage pass-through allows AnyBag attached on your luggage, especially when carrying other items in the crowd, it not only can relieve your burden, but also no worry about the backpack slipping or losing.

The small and frequently used items can be settled in the anti-theft pocket and quick access pockets to avoid pickpockets and thieves, also allows you to pick your items on the go without slowing you down. 

Taking into account the convenience of charging, A Bag has an external USB charging, which is to ensure your electronic device is fully charged anytime, anywhere. 

Made of polyester material, there is no need to worry about rain or water accidents.  The sponge pad for back, gives you a cool feeling during the carrying experience. 

Anysafe AnyBag team members have a world-renowned college education background and have rich R&D experience in the mechanical lock industry and smart electronic equipment industry. Most of the members have served the world's leading companies and brands, and have participated in many research and development of security products that are popular in the market as a major member. They have rich experience in the development of fingerprint locks.

story:
For Long And Short Term Citizens

My name is Ervin, I'm a journalist from Pécs, Hungary and I want to create a website about my city for the English speaking communities here. It will cover upcoming events, culture, food, leisure, people and practical tips with daily posts. But I plan some other features as well, a little beyond the blog. (Update: you find some teaser posts here.)

Pécs City Guide is the production title, I hope you can help me to choose the best name (see Perks on the right).

The Blog

Not every post will be interesting for you, since I will have to cover a large variety of topics. But my goal is to have at least one or two blog posts every week that you would love to read. This way every visitor will find something interesting in the weekly newsletter.

The blog may include titles like:

  • 8 Things To Do This Month In Pécs

  • Where To Buy The Best Fish In Pécs?

  • The 5 Best Fast Food Restaurants In Town

  • Q&A Of The Week

  • Avoid These 3 Running Routes  

The Essentials And The Best

The site won't collect every information about Pécs in English. The essentials and the best will be collected. Everything that is useful and relevant to visitors and citizens. For those who live here or who just come by. 

The Goal

Quality content costs time and money, but I want to keep the site free from advertising. The funding goal covers the costs of operating the site for 6 months. After 5 months I will start a new fundraising campaign and/or advertising may appear. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  1. Share the link of this campaing.
  2. Send me your ideas: what would you like to see on a website like this?
  3. Contributing writers and editors are welcome.
  4. I'm not a native speaker of the English language (I think you already realized that), so a proofreader, editor would be very welcome.
  5. If you have other funding ideas, feel free to share them with me.

Updates are coming, please follow and share the project on Facebook.

Update: I publish teaser posts every Thursday and Monday until Oct 14. You find them here.

Please spread the word! Thanks for sharing!

story:
Boldly Camp Where No One Has Camped Before!

Star Trek (TNG) Fans!!  Do you want to help create the prototypes for a Shuttlecraft tent?  This is your chance to help turn this awesome concept into reality, and be in line to get your very own when we produce them.  This campaign will fund the first 10 prototype designs to achieve the best possible design! 

Why are we making this?

We researched and did more research, and thought this tent already existed, but realized it does not!  There's only a fan made 3D render concept by a fan named Dave Delisle in 2016.  Well... we love to create things, and we love this concept, so we decided to reverse engineer the idea, create real technical blueprints for a manufacturer to follow, and have REAL LIFE prototypes made for the fans who supported! That's why we turned to Indiegogo.  We need help from FANS to make this a reality by collectively helping us fund it, as we've already put some of our own funds to get it this far.

Prototype Blueprint designs underway

We contracted an AutoCAD draftsman to take the 3D concept, and create the preliminary 2D technical drawings required by manufacturers.  These are a great start.  We will need to create a few more sophisticated tech drawings to submit to the manufacture to produce a working prototype!

Tent will come in 2 sizes

2 Person Sleeper                                           3-4 Person sleeper

Version Upgrades

Each size will also come in a Solar Package Bundle option: Comes with solar panels and battery bank to power phones, lights, and fans.

What We Need

We are in the concept stage.  The goal of this campaign is to fund 10 prototype versions of the Shuttlecraft tent. This is to make sure all things are good to go before raising the funds to mass produce for fans.

Do we need LICENSING to make these Shuttlecraft tents?

To build the prototypes?  No.

To build a mass production version?  Yes.

If we were trying to mass produce these we would need to have a licensing agreement in place with CBS Corporation. 

We have started the process of licensing

Our plan is to obtain licensing! We have started the process with CBS Corporation to become an official licensee! We plan to license the design of the Star Trek Shuttlecraft from The Next Generation IP before moving into mass production, and making this tent an Official Star Trek item. This means we're actively pursuing licensing to produce official Star Trek Shuttlecraft tents.  For THIS campaign though, we are only designing and manufacturing 10 non-official prototype tents while we wait for word from CBS Corporation.

What You Get For Donating

You get first chance to get in line and get your own cool un-official Shuttlecraft tent before they are made for the rest of the world!

Between $5-$100 perks - you'll get big discounts on the final public versions of the tent when we go into manufacturing end of this year.

$250 Perk - You will receive a fully working prototype 2 Person Shuttlecraft Tent + Prototype Solar Power bundle from this campaign, and a 60% OFF discount on the final public released version of any tent!

$400 Perk - You will receive a fully working prototype 3-4 Person Shuttlecraft Tent + Prototype Solar Power bundle from this campaign, and a 70% OFF discount on the final public released version of any tent!

ONLY 10 PROTOTYPES WILL BE BUILT!  THIS IS NOT FOR MASS PRODUCTION!

To create the prototypes the funding required will be:

  • $1000 licensing legal fees
  • $1500 R&D custom part creation
  • $1250 for 5  - two person tent prototype revisions
  • $2000 for 5 - three to four person tent prototype revisions
  • $1000 for manufacture design additional accessories (solar, ventilation, lighting)
  • $1000 for high quality graphic design for tent design print
  • $900 in Indiegogo Fee's to cover costs of running campaign
  • $500 for 10 prototype nacelles carrying cases
  • $500 for high quality professional 2D & 3D tech drawings for manufacturer

The campaign perks:

  • $5 - Thank you for supporting! Get name put on donor's page
  • $10 - 25% OFF future purchase of final tent model!
  • $50 - 35% OFF future purchase of final tent model!
  • $100 - 50% OFF future purchase of final tent model!
  • $250 - Early Bird Design! Prototype 2 person released versions! + 60% OFF future purchase of final models
  • $400 - Early Bird Design! Prototype 3-4 person released versions! + 70% OFF future purchase of final models

Fixed Funding, Why?

The funds we require will be to build high quality prototypes with engineering documents.  We believe that if fans want to help, they'll help raise the funds. If they don't then why make the tent to begin with.

If not all funds are reached there is no campaign, and no prototypes will be built!  This campaign must succeed in order to create this.

ADDITIONAL TENT ACCESSORIES

  • Solar power bundles will be created with ability to power small fans, phones, and lights.
  • over 8 pockets for storage
  • Solar powered FAN addons will keep airflow moving, keeping temperatures cool!
  • Water resistant material to block rain
  • Sweet Nacelles Carrying Case (The engine turns into the carrying case! I think this is one of the best things I've seen, and this is why I want to make it a reality for so many fans to enjoy!)

What's Next?

If this campaign is successful then the next steps will be to create all 10 working prototype tents with accessories.   Once the prototypes are complete and ready, we will open another round of crowdfunding on IndieGoGo to produce the Shuttlecraft Tent for all the fans who put in an order! 

If you signed up for this campaign you'll receive your discount off the public released version.  

If you donated to this campaign, you will receive the corresponding perk, or discount towards the public released product!   

Thank you. 

If you can donate great, if you can share even better!  Either way may you...

Live long and prosper.

story:
Let's face it, drones are cool, but drone landing pads...not so much. They're not something you think much about...until you really need one. As drone enthusiasts, we've hauled cardboard, tarps, and even the wife's yoga mat out to the field, only to find there were limitations. Cardboard is too light, tarps need rocks to hold them down, and the wife's yoga mat....it always tends to curl up...and, well, it's pink. Backpacks are great for storing your drone's gear, but just too expensive to sling in the mud and takeoff from. We've spent the last two years studying this gap in the market, and focusing on what would make the best drone landing pad for pilots now, and in the future. We're ready to share our vision with the world and finally make a drone landing pad that is just as cool as the drone sitting on it. Help us bring a SPOT to every pilot, to every camera operator, to every racer, and help us to keep our drone flying fun, safe, and clean. 

Why do you need a drone landing pad, again?

The video pretty much sums it up, but overall a drone landing pad protects your drone from dirt and debris, protects it from sudden landing impacts (they happen), keeps it on the level (needed for sensor calibration during takeoff), keeps it out of the mud (which means you can fly in any terrain), and extends the overall life of your drone.  If that alone doesn't motivate you, then keep in mind that taking off from a SPOT will at least make it 'look' like you're a professional ...even if your flying says otherwise. 

So why do we need your help?

We've successfully built proto runs and tested all of the SPOT models shown here, but need to meet minimum order quantities to bring the SPOT series of pads to the masses at a reasonable price. The money we raise here will go towards ordering mass quantities of all the models, as well as funding protos of our next product the SPOT X, which we are planning on introducing Q1 2017. If we don't meet our full goal, we will still fulfill all orders, and partial funding will go towards mass production of the most popular SPOT model. 

What's the Spot X?

Remember when we said we were thinking about the future? Well, the Spot X is a connected, open landing pad platform, that will integrate an array of sensors for specific drone applications. Think drone deliveries and racing applications. We have a patent pending for the current SPOT designs, as well as the SPOT X sensor platform. There is also a shot or two in the video if you want a sneak peek. 

THE FUTURE SPOT X

What are the SPOT perks available now?

Checkout the PERK section for the nitty gritty details, but we currently are trying to fund manufacturing of the SPOT .5 "Half" microdrone pad, SPOT 1, and SPOT 1 LED drone pads. All of which represents what we think is the best designed drone landing pad on the planet, at an affordable price. 

SPOT .5

 

SPOT 1

 

SPOT 1 LED

 

SPOT 1 LED

 

How else can you help and what's in it for YOU?

Let's not deny it, our name is unique and our logo looks 'lit'. For those of you who just want to help our cause, but don't have a need for a landing pad just yet, we offer Waveguyd stickers to help us propagate our brand and help YOU become recognized as the generous contributor to the drone community that you truly are.

Who are we? Well, we're really just a couple of guys that love drones, but if that doesn't cut it for you, here's a little about our backgrounds:

  • Troy Brown
    • Engineering grad from Purdue University
    • Electronic security product developer 
    • Host of HackerWarehouse.TV on YouTube
    • Embedded Systems Design Engineer - 10+ yrs
  • Jon Harding
    • Business grad from Indiana University
    • Entrepreneur
    • COO of Renewable Energy Developer in SoCal
    • Idea Man....sips coffee....motivational speaker

We truly appreciate your time, and we hope you can join us in our journey to make drone landing pads something to be admired. 

 

 

Want to give Waveguyd SPOT as a Christmas gift?

If you order before Christmas, we will send you a decal and graphic card showing your ordered Perk.

story:
The OffVentures idea

OffVentures is for people who like to leave well-trodden paths and explore remote regions of the world. We know that transport is a big issue in these regions – if guided tours exist at all they are usually expensive and follow a fixed schedule, so you're riding through the country as a tourist instead of diving into the real nature and culture of the area.

That's why we created OffVentures. We offer a means of transport through regions that are otherwise hard or even impossible to reach – with full flexibility! YOU decide when to hop on and hop off and add YOUR own dream destinations to the route. This way, everyone takes part in the planning, gets to save money and to enjoy some company along the way.

For more info, please visit our website: offventures.com – we'll see you on the road!

Our first venture: OffTransSib

Our first OffVenture will lead us to Siberia where we will roam the incredible landscapes, villages and cities in August 2017, ready to take adventurers on board – whenever you want, wherever you want.

We have prepared a basic outline for a route but will flexibly adapt dates and destinations as travellers join and share their plans with us. Check out the current route and see who comes along at offventures.com/offtransib

Why crowdfunding?

There are two main reasons why we decided to start this crowdfunding campaign:

  1. We want to offer special deals to YOU – our first OffVenturers to come on board – to thank you for the trust you put into the OffVentures team and our project!
  2. We'll have to make some investments before we start out on OffTransSib and the money we gather through crowdfunding – with your help – will be used to cover these expenses, including:
    1. purchase of a van
    2. car modifications and legal fees
    3. purchase of adventure gear
    4. website and marketing

How can you support us?

If you are up for an adventure in Siberia this summer or are already planning to ride the Trans-Siberian Railway – get your choice of discounted seats through this crowdfunding campaign! It's a win-win: as one of the first OffVenturers you'll have a lot of freedom in dictating the route AND your money will help us prepare for the trip. Make sure to check out the route outline and calendar on our website and get in touch before you claim your seat package, so we can make sure to prepare your desired dates and destinations! If you have any questions, check out the FAQ on our website (offventures.com/faq) or contact us at igor@offventures.com.

If you already have other plans or Siberia is just not your thing, please check out the perks we created for you! By showing your support now you will keep us going and help us to offer more OffVentures in the future – who knows, maybe you'll ride a motorbike along through Vietnam or join a tour around the Black Sea next time?

No matter if you're coming along to Siberia or you just like the idea, please share this crowdfunding campaign with your friends. Thank you! And see you soon – in Siberia or elsewhere.

Travel with purpose

We think, travelling is not just about us – it is also about the people around us. The people we meet along the way, the locals in the regions we roam through and even our friends and families back home. That's why we want to offer some special support to people who don't just travel for the sake of travelling.

Are you working on a research project that leads you to Siberia? Do you want to offer on-the-road life coaching? Or will you document the local lifestyle for the people back home? If you are on a special mission, send a short video presentation of yourself and your project to alina@offventures.com and we'll make you part of this crowdfunding campaign! If we select your project we will share your video on this page and create a perk that enables people to support you directly – so you'll have the chance to join OffTransSib for free and we will take you one step further to reaching your goal.

story:
The BabyTech bottle is a disposable, sterile and compact rubber baby bottle made from recyclable materials that expand under pressure from the baby's food. It is the only bottle that is active, i.e. it helps the baby to eat, while its soft touch gives a feeling of natural nursing.

At its end, the bottle has a nipple and a one way valve inside that opens and closes while the baby is eating. Since no air enters, it prevents digestive problems. It is the only bottle that allows babies to sit and eat without raising their heads. It has no Bisphinol A (a toxic, cancerous substance). It does not drip, increases food safety (vacuum package) and is the lightest bottle available. The BabyTech bottle is great for hospital use for midnight bottle search and for family camping.

 

Need for New Disposable Baby Bottles

Baby bottles in use today have numerous problems. "The teats and screw tops of bottles trap germs which get into the milk and make the baby ill" (World Health Organization). In addition, sterilizing and filling a baby bottle can present difficulties to parents, especially during trips and at night. Furthermore, current disposable bottles are limited, including:

  • Partially disposable - Sometimes, only parts of the bottles are disposable, such as just the nipples or just the liners.
  • Disposable with 'old' problems - Several inexpensive disposable bottles have the same inherent problems of standard bottles, such as filling is still difficult.
  • Limited to certain foods - There are disposable bottles that can work mainly with their own brand of foods or are pre-filled.
  • Mostly for trips - A recent solution collapses as the baby feeds, but, as the baby drinks, the bottle can go floppy, which cannot happen to BabyTech.

 

The BabyTech Bottle

Totally made of recyclable rubber, the bottle is composed of a nipple, valve and an inflating tube. The bottle is inflated with the baby's food and the valve stops the liquids from bursting out. When the baby drinks the valve opens, and when the baby stops, the valve closes again, on its own.

The bottle’s benefits include:

  • Disposable - It allows parents to quickly return to sleep without searching for and washing bottles, which is also an extremely useful feature for trips as well as hospitals.
  • Portable - The volume of a few BabyTech bottles is half of a standard bottle, which is useful for trips.
  • Sterile - In addition to being disinfected and sterilized, the bottles are kept in hygienic packaging.
  • Natural nursing feeling - Its soft touch (elastic material) gives a baby a feeling of natural nursing, making the transition from breastfeeding to a bottle much easier and smoother.
  • Better digestion - The bottle prevents extra gases in a baby’s digestive system since no air enters it. It also allows eating while sitting (see below), which further improves digestion. As research has proven, when eating occurs while sitting the air is concentrated on the upper part of the digestive system and is thus immediately released at the end of feeding. However, when eating while lying down the air mixes with the food and causes the accumulation of gases in the digestive system, thereby requiring actions to release the gases (e.g. taps on the back for extended minutes).
  • Safe eating while sitting - It is the only bottle that allows sitting babies to eat without raising their heads. The food is given to the baby at a controlled rate, making it much safer.
  • Feeding is easy and fast - The BabyTech bottle achieves this by means of its controlled pressure and by preventing the known vacuum problem.
  • Has no Bisphinol A - Many have raised concerns about the impact of this material on their child.
  • Higher food safety - Due to the bottle's vacuum package, the food stays edible for a longer time. Tests also show that reducing the number of germs prevents disease and dental caries in gums/teeth.
  • No dripping - The bottle's unique valve enables to feed a controlled dosage to a baby's mouth.
  • Lightest bottle available - Totally made of rubber, the BabyTech bottle is the lightest on the market.
  • Environmental friendly - The BabyTech bottle is a disposable, sterile and compact rubber baby bottle made from recyclable materials that expand under pressure from the baby's food.

Our Vision

We began this journey with a vision that the BabyTech bottle will help babies and parents all over the world. Today, we have a patented and fully developed beta product and we need your help to complete the first generation of the BabyTech bottle.

Thank you so much for helping us make this dream come true!
story_txt:
The BabyTech bottle is a disposable, sterile and compact rubber baby bottle made from recyclable materials that expand under pressure from the baby's food. It is the only bottle that is active, i.e. it helps the baby to eat, while its soft touch gives a feeling of natural nursing.

At its end, the bottle has a nipple and a one way valve inside that opens and closes while the baby is eating. Since no air enters, it prevents digestive problems. It is the only bottle that allows babies to sit and eat without raising their heads. It has no Bisphinol A (a toxic, cancerous substance). It does not drip, increases food safety (vacuum package) and is the lightest bottle available. The BabyTech bottle is great for hospital use for midnight bottle search and for family camping.
 
Need for New Disposable Baby Bottles

The bottle’s benefits include:

Sterile - In addition to being disinfected and sterilized, the bottles are kept in hygienic packaging.

Safe eating while sitting - It is the only bottle that allows sitting babies to eat without raising their heads. The food is given to the baby at a controlled rate, making it much safer.

Feeding is easy and fast - The BabyTech bottle achieves this by means of its controlled pressure and by preventing the known vacuum problem.

Has no Bisphinol A - Many have raised concerns about the impact of this material on their child.

Higher food safety - Due to the bottle's vacuum package, the food stays edible for a longer time. Tests also show that reducing the number of germs prevents disease and dental caries in gums/teeth.

No dripping - The bottle's unique valve enables to feed a controlled dosage to a baby's mouth.

Lightest bottle available - Totally made of rubber, the BabyTech bottle is the lightest on the market.

Environmental friendly - The BabyTech bottle is a disposable, sterile and compact rubber baby bottle made from recyclable materials that expand under pressure from the baby's food.

Our Vision
We began this journey with a vision that the BabyTech bottle will help babies and parents all over the world. Today, we have a patented and fully developed beta product and we need your help to complete the first generation of the BabyTech bottle.
Thank you so much for helping us make this dream come true!

story:
Meet MK3, a '5-in-1 Outdoor Smart Gadget' to make your outdoor life more convenient. It includes walkie-talkie via smartphone Bluetooth paring, Emergency button, Bluetooth speaker, LED light, and a Stylus pen. Whether you’re climbing, hiking, fishing, or camping, the MK3 will help you enjoy your all the outdoor activities and keep your smartphone safe. 

 

 

 

Using a smartphone in the exciting outdoor has a lot of risk. For example, a smartphone can be dropped on a rock and broken or be dropped into water and ruined. MK3 can solve this problem very easily.

MK3 is very easy to use. Once you connect the MK3 to your smartphone via Bluetooth, the setup is complete. Then you can keep your valuable smartphone safe in your bag. Now you can talk to your friends more conveniently with MK3. When you receive an incoming call, you simply press the button once. While talking on the phone, you can do whatever you want with your two hands.

 

 

- How does MK3 work?

MK3 helps people to communicate easily while enjoying in various outdoor activities with friends and family. MK3 provides multi-communication through mobile app. In case some friends and family are too far, or even home, you can communicate through telecommunication network with them. Like a professional explorer, you can enjoy a real walkie-talkie by pressing the button to talk.

 

 

  • Emergency button to send emergency messages and GPS information to the selected numbers in your smartphone.

 Outdoor activities are often at risk as you can get lost or be wounded. With one ‘Emergency button’, even young children can easily request SOS for emergency or urgent situation. After pressing the button, it informs the selected people in the smartphone through mobile app with current SOS message and GPS location.

 

If you want to listen to music, you don’t have to carry around your portable speakers for your outdoor activities. The MK3 can function as a speaker by connecting through Bluetooth pairing.

When you have to receive an incoming call or a walkie-talkie in the middle of listening to music, MK3 stops the playback and switches to communication mode automatically.

 

 

 

While you enjoy outdoor activities, you may want to go camping at night and exploring dark caves. With MK3’s LED light, you can feel safe in dark places.

The brightness of the LED is 150 lumens. It is much brighter than LED light of regular smartphone. In addition, it can be used up to 24 hours if only LED is used.

 

 

You may have experienced inconvenience in outdoor activities during winter. It is very difficult to use your smartphone when you wear thick gloves. In this case, using a stylus pen at the bottom of the MK3 allows you to use your smartphone conveniently. You can receive your calls or write messages without taking off your gloves.

When you enjoy outdoor activities with MK3, you may be exposed to rain or snow, depending on weather conditions. Furthermore, you may drop it when you cross a puddle of water or river during your activity. To protect from these kinds of situations, MK3 has waterproof function and durability.

 

 

The MK3 is designed for IP67 rating certification. When you use MK3, you don’t have to worry about dropping MK3 in a little water, as well as rain and snow. However, it should not be immersed in water.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have achieved 165% fundraising on Kickstarter.

Nowadays, we are working on diverse tests for waterproofing and improving quality of the speaker to make it sound better.

Once these are done, we plan to produce molds in August.

Although the estimated delivery date for MK3 is March 2018, We are working hard to deliver them to you more earlier.

Thank you.

 

 

My team members and I love outdoor activities including hiking, camping, and surfing. My leisure time is frequently occupied with such outdoor activities and I often watched many people using their smartphones around me while enjoying these activities. They repeatedly take out their smartphones to take pictures, send SMS message, or other various actions. 

One day when I was on the mountain during the winter climbing, my phone was ringing. I was frustrated when I had to take off my thick gloves in order to take my smartphone out of my pocket. MK3 is designed to simply avoid this inconvenience and be able to use smartphones without taking off thick gloves during the activity. I also wanted to improve communication so that team members and I can talk to each other. In the process of developing this idea, I came across the two factors which were ‘outdoor’ and ‘walkie-talkie’. As a result, I added speaker and an LED light features into MK3 in the form of walkie-talkie.

We have also been successful in crowdfunding in South Korea with MK1, a previous version of MK3. From the initial crowdfunding experience, we are ready to make this project as seamless as possible to successfully execute the plan.

 


We attended an 2017 Beijing ISPO exhibition to introduce our new product MK3. We were very excited as our product had attracted a lot of attention from overseas buyers.

story:
Short Summary

Here is an outstanding portable battery charger for emergency, Good Ion. With this portable battery charger, you can generate electricity in any situation when you are in emergency. You can produce electricity only with salt water in any circumstances with Good Ion. Even when you don’t have an electric code, you can charge your smart phone without any problem.

 

Product detailed

We are living while using various electronic equipment for various purposes. Especially, as smart phone has been distributed widely ever, the quantity of smart phone consumed has increased dramatically. And everybody used to face with difficulty since there was no battery once.

 

 

Good Ion made by Ion’s Lab is a portable generator that can produce electricity by itself when a user pour salty water.

The first feature of this product is that there is no restriction. You can use it outdoor without any electric code and charge electricity even in case of black out.

The second feature is that electricity charge is economically cheaper than any other batteries. The magnesium we use as fuel in Good Ion is most abundant element on earth and even it is not expensive. Moreover, all Good Ion needs to generate electricity is only salty water which is mostly free to get.

The third feature is environment-friendly product. The previous battery includes substances that can aggravate environment whereas the materials used in Good Ion are eco-friendly. Salt water is not dangerous, right? And the main substance, magnesium hydroxide is used for material for cosmetic and also harmless for human body.

And the fourth feature is that you don’t have to charge and there is no natural discharge. In case of normal battery, you should store electricity for use and recharge it. However, you don’t have to recharge energy when you use Good Ion. Just pour water! And there is no natural discharge in Good Ion. You can use this useful product in a foreign country or location with no electricity.

 

 

 

We recommend this product if you are someone who

uses smart phone very often,

enjoys travelling,

loves extreme camping,

possess boat,

likes to go fishing,

loves climbing often,

prepares disaster and blackout or works at mine.

 

 

When you should call for this product?

In a country and area with insufficient electricity supply

In a building or exterior space where requires electricity for emergency

In area vulnerable to the nature disaster

In area in which produces loud sound and needs fuel in order to be supplied power supply

In case of power supply in the confined space

 

While solar power and gravity are more likely to be affected by weather, Good Ion only needs salt water and is not affected easily by external environment.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We’ve already produced mass products and you are available to purchase in Korea. The reason we started Indiegogo crowd funding is to improve design and function of the product. We will present upgraded Good Ion product for people who will participate in this crowd funding project.

 

We will offer product at lower price to 140% than selling price for people who participated in this crowd funding.

If we fail to collect U$450,000.00(four hundred fifty thousand dollars), we will refund your full payment. Since it is unavailable to mass produce including a new plastic injection molding if the fund is not successfully collected, we have no choice but to refund your full payment.

 

After completing funding, we will improve design and improvement within 1 month 

2 months will be taken for mass production after improvement

we will deliver immediately after mass production within 2 weeks

 

Risks & Challenges

We truly believe that this product could help people live freely and improve their quality of life even in area without electricity through adapting improved product for outdoor purpose.

Movement problem while using product and waterproof issue caused by wrong horizontality will be settled with advice from relevant experts.

In order to solve corrosion problem caused by salt water, we will block off the access of salt water by producing device design. 

New design will be handled with outstanding expertise since it is very important issue for this product.

 

 

 

Team

Our team has been looking for alternative energy that anyone can use safely and easily through conducting research for 8 years in order to suggest new plans to deal with the most important and urgent energy issues that we, mankind has faced. While studying technology of powder metallurgy, we came to develop Air Cathode which is the core technology, by applying nano method that we possess and this led us to produce Good Ion product.
