story:
The Idea

We love guns.  We love to shoot guns.  But there's a problem.  We're tired of shooting at boring old paper targets, and we can imagine there are a lot of you out there that feel the same way.  We need something more stimulating, something that creates competition, something with a realistic setting that will actually help us improve our skills for when we are out in the field.  That's why we want to create the Pigeon Hollow Rifle Range located just an hour from Utah county in Little Pigeon Hollow near Ephraim, Utah.  The range will be built in two separate canyons, allowing participants the freedom to choose from a variety of games and shooting situations.  We have the location, now we need the backing to build this one-of-a-kind range.

This isn't your average shooting range. The first canyon will contain a series of special "poker card" silhouette steel targets ranging from 50 to 400+ yards allowing you to incorporate games such as Black Jack, Texas Hold'em, War, and my personal favorite, Slap Jack.  Each pair of players will be provided a set of playing cards with the range logo, which they can take home at the end of the day.  Also in this canyon, will be battleship silhouettes designed to play, you guessed it, Battleship!  There will be two different sets of battleship targets.  One set, 50 to 200 yards for the less experienced shooters, and the second set at 400+ yards for those who have spent years honing their skills

The second canyon will contain over two dozen life-size animal silhouettes ranging from prairie dogs and coyotes to pronghorn and elk.  These wood targets will have a steel gong placed in the 'vitals' area so you know when you have made an accurate shot.  These reactive targets will range from 100 to over 800 yards, testing the skills of even the most experienced shooters.  Players on this portion of the range will be able to compete in a game of 'pig' or 'horse' or they can use the provided score cards, which coincide with each target, to see who is the top shot.

Now if you are one of those weirdos that actually enjoy shooting holes in a piece of paper or you are just looking for a way to get to know your rifle a little better before an intense game of Slap Jack, you may want to visit the practice range with targets placed every 100 yards out to 1200+.


Use of Funding

Our initial goal of $11,500 covers all of the initial costs of building Pigeon Hollow Rifle Range.

Initial Goal

  • Steel targets and frames
  • Construction of wood silhouettes
  • Gravel shooting pads
  • Improvement of roads
  • Construct parking areas
  • IndieGoGo fees
  • Insurance and legal fees (a necessity these days)
Once our initial goal has been met, we are going to stretch that goal and 'shoot for the stars' with improvements, add-ons, and more; the possibilities are endless!

Stretch Goals
  • Concrete and shaded shooting pads
  • Pavillion for group event
  • Kids and beginners range
  • Restrooms
  • Have an idea?  Share it with us in the comments section.

The success of this venture, and to what extent, depends on how much support we can garner.  So, if you can, please contribute and take advantage of our great perks. If you are unable to contribute financially (and even if you can), PLEASE share this campaign with your friends, shooting groups, and social media groups!


    The Timeline

    Depending on the success of this campaign, we are aiming for April 2015 for the grand opening.  However, there is a possibility of finishing it by this fall!  Keep in touch with us and we'll let you know.

    So even if you can only contribute just a couple bucks, your donation and sharing of this campaign will go a long way in helping us build the best darn rifle range this side of... well, anywhere!

story:
Almost any time when you are a microcontroller programmer and you need to know if the program it's working I would like to "see" the logic state of a microcontroller pin....


Then you pick a multimeter or put some led and resistors to know about it...

Well, with this socket board you can see the pin logic state all the time of any pin!

And when you finish your work just remove or leave it.

The logic socket board contain a smd led's and resistors for each pin and take the circuit electricity for power.



This product is a very helpful visual aids and can improve your projects developments.

The idea is to build a large quantity with diferents sockets like 40 pin, 28 pin, 18 pin and 8 pin.
story_txt:
Almost any time when you are a microcontroller programmer and you need to know if the program it's working I would like to "see" the logic state of a microcontroller pin....




Then you pick a multimeter or put some led and resistors to know about it...
Well, with this socket board you can see the pin logic state all the time of any pin!
And when you finish your work just remove or leave it.
The logic socket board contain a smd led's and resistors for each pin and take the circuit electricity for power.







This product is a very helpful visual aids and can improve your projects developments.
The idea is to build a large quantity with diferents sockets like 40 pin, 28 pin, 18 pin and 8 pin.

story:
The RMU Cargo Collection is a MTB adventure solution for you, your bike, and your truck.

We’ve designed a system, to get you prepared for any trip with the crew whether your shuttling laps, headed to the desert for some camping, or hitting your favorite local singletrack. The RMU MTB Cargo Collection is inspired by adventure, and built for the journey.

We are an inclusive mountain company. We connect people to the mountains, people to people, and people to mountain lifestyle. Our products are solutions for mountain life. 

We are skiers, we are mountain bikers, we are a mountain company.

We...are RMU outdoors.

11 years ago we started building skis in a garage...because of our passion for skiing and the outdoors. That led to us becoming a legitimate business, earning international awards, and manufacturing skis in the best factories in the world. Those skis allowed us to open concept locations in Breckenridge Colorado, and recently Whistler Blackcomb, that have become a hub in our mountain communities.

5 years ago we started designing our own equipment line for mountain biking, to address the problems we faced on a daily basis. Since we started, we have been testing, refining and developing what we consider to be the ultimate kit...the MTB Cargo Collection. We have designed, developed, and tested these prototypes. We are excited to launch our new collection here on Indiegogo and we have some great perks for you to choose from. 

Lifetime Warranty

At RMU, we are dedicated to supplying the best quality products with timeless design and as sustainable as possible.  We have implemented a number of programs and committed to working in an ongoing manner with every partner, and ultimately deliver this commitment to every customer. 

Every RMU product makes carries a lifetime warranty on manufacturers defects for the original owners of the product.  We are committed to maximizing the build quality and long term durability.

How you can get involved.

We have made sure to procure fabric early, switched to a Nylon liner fabric instead of Polyester and locally source all buckles and trims. We’ve got some great perks that range from a virtual high five, graphic tees, stickers...and we even have packs available RIGHT now. The Core Pack 15L, and BRFCS35-50 are in stock and available now for purchase on www.RMUoutdoors.com and in our retail locations in Breckenridge Colorado and Whistler Blackcomb. The Tailgate Locker 2.0, Enduro Fanny 5L, and Utility Belt are all available for pre-order at a discounted rate and will ship to you in March if the campaign is successful.

Tailgate Locker 2.0

The Tailgate Locker has weatherproof 840D Nylon with Carbonate + PU coating to hold up to the elements and four Aluminum buckles keep things secure. It’s insulated beer pocket has a food-grade liner to keep the funk out and locking zippers to keep your precious cargo safe. Available in Standard (54” x 18”) to fit small and mid-sized pickups (ie Tacoma, Frontier) and XL (61” x 20”) for full coverage on the biggest trucks (ie Tundra, F250).

"The Truck pad to end all Truck pads"

"This is the coolest thing I've ever bought for my truck. Every detail was thought out for throwing bikes, beers, and accessories onto the back of my truck. It's super durable, holds a bunch of bikes, and you can even throw beers into it! Additionally, I love the integration of throwing a cable lock into it to lock my bikes!"

-Mike (V1 owner from Seattle)

 

"Simply put, this pad is leaps and bounds ahead of the other tailgate pads out there. 100% a premium option."

-David 


 

Enduro Fanny 5L

We made the Enduro Fanny because we wanted to get the pack off our backs for those hotter days, without giving up any of the functionality. The Enduro Fanny has enough space for the essentials: tools, a reservoir or bottle, snacks, a spare jacket, etc. It uses the same waterproof fabric as all our packs, has thoughtful organization for tools and it even fits a helmet for when hiking is the only way up. Aluminum hardware, a bright interior and a stowable bottle pocket round out a bag that punches above its volume.

 

MTB Utility Belt

The Utility Belt is the sleekest way to carry your tools under your jersey. Stretch pockets keep everything you need handy and a stowable bottle pocket lets you bring extra fluids. With enough space for basic tools, your phone, wallet and keys, it’s the go-to solution for every ride. 

By supporting our campaign, your are becoming apart of the RMU Community, which has helped build and shape RMU into what it is today! It is our Community that inspires and challenges us to keep making innovative outdoor products. Additionally with your support RMU donates to trail building organizations and other non profits in our local communities. 

#inspiredbyadventure #builtforthejourney  

-Thanks from everyone here at RMU!

story:
FabStayz recognizes LGBT+Ally Hosts from Airbnb, Vrbo, Book and other major platforms.

Be your Fab! Self wherever your travels take you knowing FabStayz Hosts foster welcoming, inclusive accommodations around the world.  

  • No anxiety over 'will I be welcomed?'
  • No coming out to a stranger with messages like; 'my partner and I' or 'I'm trans' wondering the reply
  • No guessing, no looking for signs if the host is truly welcoming
  • Yes to supporting allies and community members supporting us! 
     

FabStayz Hosts are Super at Hosting

  • Minimum 7 months experience on another major platform
  • Only great to excellent reviews
  • Agree to the FabStayz diversity and inclusion policy fostering welcoming safe spaces 

 

What They're Saying About FabStayz:

Read the articles, listen to the podcasts, view the tweets and see us on the evening news, FabStayz is being talked about! Lesbian, queer, transgender, gay and ally bloggers, influencers and journalists are sharing the FabStayz mission of inclusivity.


 

National Gay Lesbian Chamber of Commerce:
LGBTE Certified Business

Proud member of NGLCC and affiliate chambers Greater Seattle Business Association and Tampa Bay LGBT Chamber. Cognizant of our supply chain, FabStayz works with other LGBTE Certified businesses like BKN Creative. 


 

Support the FabStayz Community!

While we've come a long way in a short amount of time we'd love your help to fuel the growth of the FabStayz Community and the platform we continually approve upon. While FabStayz beta v1.0 is fully functioning, there's lots of room for improvement. 

We are seeking to raise $25,000+ to be spent on:

  • Tech/Development 
    Develop new mobile interface with improved enduser experience and faster load speed along with upgrade site hosting moving to a premier service, we've already crashed twice.
    $7,500 
    Automate host registration and back-end process with improved integration and host account set up.
    $3,500
    Develop and code additional synching capabilities improving host listing management.
    $5,000
    Hire part-time LGBTQ coder to join existing development team.
    $10,000
  • Marketing
    Fund expenses to exhibit at Pride Events to promote FabStayz
  • Beyond Our Goal
    After achieving our goal of $25,000 we will share the additional proceeds with LGBTQ organizations making a difference in our community like; Metro Inclusive Health in Tampa Bay, Great Seattle Business Association LGBTQ scholarship program and others.

 

Can You Contribute?

We have gifts for every level of contribution. Your support is appreciated! From an $11.99 a month GoDaddy website built in 2018 to what you see today, our vision of FabStayz wherever your travels take you is coming to fruition.
Thank you in advance for helping achieve our mission through any means possible to you, contribute or share FabStayz on social.

 

 

Changing Travel for the LGBTQ Community

The FabStayz Community is making a difference in how all members of the LGBTQ community travel! FabStayz represents every letter of the acronym LGBTQ and along with our allies creating  travel experiences that are fun, fabulous and hassle free.

The stories shared by travelers no longer dealing with anxiety of being accepted validate the FabStayz mission. And hosts epitomizing the very best in hospitality wanting to be recognized for fostering welcoming inclusive spaces have helped make the FabStayz Community a reality.

Beta v1.0 was launched in Portland, Oregon in June 2019 with 100 hosts. Today we have over 1,200 properties worldwide and growing everyday.

 

FabStayz is More than Amazing Accommodations

What to do when you arrive at your Fab! Destination? Our Fab! Flight Crew has some fabulous suggestions like when Liquor Mini traveled to Portland, Oregon, pictured below enjoying the culinary delights of a food truck located at Pioneer Square.

And there's more:

  • Pride of the Americas Daily Guide - the largest Pride Event of 2020
  • NGLCC LGBT Chamber of Commerce directory - support businesses at home and when travel that support our community.
  • Guides to LGBTQ Community Events: Prides, Queer Film Festivals, LGBTQ Welcome Centers and more 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with EVERYONE, click on the Indiegogo share tools! Follow FabStayz on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn. 

 

Super at Hosting? We Want You

Are you hosting on Airbnb or other major platform? Come join our FabCommunity, be recognized as a FabStayz Host, learn more.

The Fab! Flight Crew

Meet the original FabStayz Flight Crew pictured here on their turf, a runway!
From left to right; Danny Lee Cabrera aka Mini Liquor, Josias Alex Bermea aka Penelope Devereaux and Kyle Costa aka Kandy Aisle.

 

Always Start Your Travels with FabStayz

FabStayz beta v1.0 powered by Houfy is live, now. Search by destination on mobile or desktop, FabHosts around the world await your arrival.

 

 

FabStayz is not affiliated with Airbnb, Vrbo or Booking.

Meet the original FabStayz Flight Crew pictured here on their turf, a runway!From left to right; Danny Lee Cabrera aka Mini Liquor, Josias Alex Bermea aka Penelope Devereaux and Kyle Costa aka Kandy Aisle.

story:
Save money and enjoy your commute, with PingRide! 

If 680 is driving you mad, try PingRide's new commuter coach service. Direct service in both directions between Hacienda Business Park in Pleasanton and Moffett Park in Sunnyvale is just $10 per roundtrip. That's less than half the cost of driving alone* and you're free to text, surf the web, work, nap, read--whatever. 

PingRide aims to transform Bay Area transportation systems as a model for the world. We are passionate about transportation and experienced in creating and managing great services like this for some of the most successful companies in the Bay Area. By focusing on this commute, we can offer great service with free wi-fi onboard a luxury coach at a great price, with free parking at the business park near your home, and a flexible schedule, so you're sure to make it back home, whenever your day is done. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $13,500 to pay for 4 luxury coaches for the week. That means we'll need 270 people to buy a $50 pass. That's a lot of early adopters, but it's the volume we'll need to provide the flexible schedule we think you'll need. (FYI, at this level, the buses will be just over 1/2-full--or just under 1/2-empty, depending upon how you choose to look at it ;-) 

Here are the details: 

For $50, you get a 1-week pass for our coaches, good for one round-trip for each weekday from March 4 thru 8. You can get on whichever bus fits your schedule that day, but seats are limited and available on a first come, first-served basis. 

For service in either direction, departures are scheduled as follows: 

AM: 7:15, 7:45, 8:15, 8:45, 9:15, and 10:00

PM: 4:00, 5:00, 5:30, 6:00, 6:30, and 7:00

AM Pickup (PM Dropoff) locations at both Hacienda and Moffett are TBD. Both will be  adjacent to ample free parking. 

AM Dropoff (PM Pickup) locations throughout each business park will be determined by demand, so encourage your co-workers and neighboring companies to sign up! We will include enough stops to get anywhere in each park by a 5-minute walk, and we'll include a stop covenient to connecting shuttle or light-rail services no matter what. 

This is a "fixed funding" campaign, so there's no risk: if we don't reach our goal, you don't pay. 

If we do reach our goal, you will get to enjoy the service for a week with no further obligation. We'll follow up with campaigns to fund service for the following weeks and months, and you'll be eligible for discounts and incentives for spreading the word that could have you riding for free! 

Don't forget to check with your employer to use federal pre-tax transit benefits to pay for your pass, or to see if they'll help directly subsidize your sustainable, green commute! 

The Impact

We already know that employees at some of the biggest tech firms in the Bay Area can't live without this kind of service. Together, we can make a real difference in your budget, your quality of life, and the environment, not only throughout the Bay Area, but around the world. 

*AAA says the total cost of driving alone is typically $0.58/mile. This round-trip is about 60 miles, for a total of $34.80/day!

Other Ways You Can Help

Your co-workers and neighbors want this service too: Please spread the word!

story:
In partnership with:

www.timelab.org

What is the Bike2Charge?

Bike2Charge is an open-source bike charger that converts any AC-DC signal between 8-12 V to a clean 5V DC on a USB A jack. Plug the Bike2Charge into your dynamo, plug your phone in. And you are ready to charge your phone whilst you are cycling.




The Goal:

To produce the Bike2Charge PCB's at a reasonable price, the PCB's must be manufactured in volume. To accomplish this, we need your help. We need to sell at least 20 PCB's to keep the cost down.

features:

-Built-in over-current protection

-Can charge ANY USB device

-Iphone/Ipod charging support

-Status LED

-MAX current = 1 A (@Vin = 8V)

Case:

I've designed a custom case for the Bike2Charge PCB. It's made out of a piece of plexiglas. I lasercut the pieces and send them with your order. The pieces fit nicely together, just snap them into place. Here you see some photo's of the case:



Schematics and diagrams:

You can download the PCB files, schematics and more: Click Here

Testing and theory of operation:

We tested the Bike2Charge with several phones: Sony Xperia U, Ipod Touch, Samsung galaxy mini, ...

Bike2Charge charging an Ipod Touch:


Below, you see a screenshot of the oscilloscope with the signal coming from the generator:

The Bridge rectifier converts the alternating AC voltage into positive spikes,

The cap smooths out this spiky DC signal.

Then the voltage regulator turns it into a steady 5V DC, needed to charge your phone.

The PTC protects the circuit from overcurrent.

The resistor at the USB A socket creates a 2V DC on the datalines, this insures your Ipod/Iphone Will charge.

And finally we have a (yellow) status LED.


Current stage:

The PCB's are in.

Here are some photo's:

Bike2Charge installed on a bike:


Thanks for your contribution!

Midas Gossye

story:
Looper will work at their best in developing and producing their products to be a brand that is loved by all. We guarantee replacements for all and any product and part defects.

*  Items that are not subject to Looper’s standard return policy below may not be returned.

*  We can issue returns or accept exchanges if there is a technical problem.
story_txt: Looper will work at their best in developing and producing their products to be a brand that is loved by all. We guarantee replacements for all and any product and part defects.*  Items that are not subject to Looper’s standard return policy below may not be returned.*  We can issue returns or accept exchanges if there is a technical problem.

story:
The Kanga Kase Mate’s 3 layer laminate insulating barrier and non-permeable membrane (all you need to know is that it keeps the cold “in” and the “hot” out) are specifically designed to work with your beverage case’s cardboard packaging (much like a pizza box and the delivery guy’s insulating sleeve, only opposite). Together, the 5 layer system captures and retains the chill of your cold beverages and repels heat keeping your beverages cold 5 hours longer without the hassle and expense of ice.

1. Take a 12, 24, or 30 pack of your favorite beverage out of the fridge and slide the case into the Kanga Kase Mate and zip it closed.  

2. Lift the top flap and open the beverage case.

3. Create a hole on top of the beverage case to grab the cans from, enjoy, and repeat until empty.

The Kase Mate is the perfect accessory for, but not limited to: 

GRAPHICS

Our Kase Mates come in red, orange, crimson, light blue, royal blue, dark blue, and purple. We also have our Patriot Kase Mate for our backers that bleed red, white, and blue!

 

 

We sold a few of the first Kase Mate designs to our test market to get feedback, and here’s what they had to say. 

We’re 4 close friends from varying backgrounds attending Clemson University with a passion for college football and tailgating, hunting, fishing, and any other activity that goes well with a cold beverage in hand. With that said, we also shared a common dilemma – how to keep our beverages cold while avoiding the inconvenience of conventional coolers. Seeking a solution to keep our beverages cold without the struggle of lugging a bulky cooler around constantly having to refill the ice, we concluded that there had to be a smarter, more convenient way. We would all get together after classes and on the weekends to search for a solution to our problem. We came across a variety of different coolers that were feature rich with all the bells and whistles. However, everything we found was just as hefty and bulky as the price tags. Realizing there wasn’t a product to accomplish such a feat, we were quick to decide we’d have to create it. Hence the Kanga Kase Mate concept was born!

What started off as a run of the mill prototype has been transformed into the premium, high performing product we know today as the Kanga Kase Mate.

We plan to use the money we raise on Kickstarter primarily for manufacturing purposes, as well as scaling our company. Our goal is to be able to place a significant order with our manufacturer, driving down the cost per unit to produce, ultimately enabling us to maintain solid level of inventory for our post-Kickstarter needs. In addition to our manufacturing goals, we plan on accelerating our Brand Ambassador program which generates publicity for the Kanga brand as our acting salesforce.       

As we continue to grow and develop, we plan on designing a variety of products that bring fun and convenience to beverage cooling solutions. We plan to prototype and develop Kase Mates for bottles, sports drinks, and everything in between.

If you're interested in writing about the project, we have a full press pack with high resolution images, campaign videos and logos HERE.   

Email us at this address if you have further questions: Marketing@BuyKanga.com
story_txt:
The Kanga Kase Mate’s 3 layer laminate insulating barrier and non-permeable membrane (all you need to know is that it keeps the cold “in” and the “hot” out) are specifically designed to work with your beverage case’s cardboard packaging (much like a pizza box and the delivery guy’s insulating sleeve, only opposite). Together, the 5 layer system captures and retains the chill of your cold beverages and repels heat keeping your beverages cold 5 hours longer without the hassle and expense of ice.1. Take a 12, 24, or 30 pack of your favorite beverage out of the fridge and slide the case into the Kanga Kase Mate and zip it closed.  2. Lift the top flap and open the beverage case.3. story:
Villa in the Heart of Istria

 

What is the Heart of Istria project all about?

  • It will allow you to experience a dream holiday
  • It is the first ever crowdfunded holiday home
  • Built through crowdfunding the focus will be on you, not achieving profit
  • We love our holidays so the villa is planned for what we know you want
  • It offers a 5 star hotel service in a private villa
  • The opportunity to experience Istria, Croatia - Voted best tourist destination of 2016
  • Ultimate luxury and comfort during your incredible holiday

 

WHY

The purpose of this campaign is to bring to life and create a completely unique holiday home. We love our free time and enjoy our vacations as much we are sure you do. Since we also love Croatia, especially Istria, and have the knowhow and experience, the decision to create the Heart of Istria villa was very easy. We got to design something which would promote our country and bring pleasure and luxury to all our visitors!

The holiday home is designed to provide a dream vacation for every type of tourist, something different to anything on the market already, unique in its funding and approach, and all for a very affordable price, thanks to the perks!

 

FEATURED IN

 

THE VILLA

The Heart of Istria villa is like no other villa available in Istria today. Designed with the upmost luxury and quality in mind, whilst maintaining absolute privacy. This unique holiday home is set apart by not being part of a complex, yet retaining the extremely high standard usually only available in five star hotels and resorts. Accommodating up to ten people, it is entirely yours for the duration of your dream holiday.

We decided the goal of this unique project is not just a high end luxury villa in one of the most beautiful areas in the world. It is a dream holiday. By pouring our hearts and minds into this project we created the ideal setting for your vacation:

  • It is not too large (what's the point of spending your free time with friends and family if you don't see each other?) yet big enough to accommodate your every whim.
  • Completely private, while being extremely well connected, enabling you to easily visit every part of Istria.
  • On site staff which will care for you like you're in one of the finest hotels, yet will make themselves scarce when not needed, giving you full privacy.
  • Modern and eco-friendly, using solar power. Even the swimming pool is heated so it can be used the whole year round.

 

As you step into the villa grounds and get your first glimpse of the house you will immediately sense the incredible thought and care which went into its design. The villa itself is over 220 square meters with large surrounding grounds encircled by a high stone wall - providing privacy and peace of mind.

 

 

Taking a stroll around the house through the carefully planned garden will take you from the front patio and covered parking to the back terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and relaxation area. After a swim in the pool the comfortable lounge is perfect for resting in the sun and enjoying a relaxing drink.

The outside kitchen has been designed as a social , offering a traditional barbecue to prepare meals around.

 

 

To make sure you have the experience of a five star hotel the villa has some amazing amenities:

5 stars Green power Free parking Pet friendly
AC Cable TV Free Wi-Fi On site staff
Fireplace Gameroom Fitness room Hot tub
Room service Laundry service En suite bathrooms Swimming pool
 

 

Inside, the ground floor is open plan to provide maximum enjoyment and mingling. The hub of activity is the grand fireplace - perfect for setting the mood and warming up on winter nights!

 

The kitchen is fully integrated into the room so anyone using it isn't secluded. The dining table and game room seamlessly continue from it. The rear wall is entirely glass with integrated glass doors, offering superb lighting and connectivity with the backyard terrace.

 

 

The first floor features bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. Each bedroom also has its own balcony for those moments you wish to savor alone or in the company of your significant other, without the rest of the pack.

 

 

 

 

 

 

LOCATED IN - ISTRIA

Istria is a gorgeous region in the beautiful tourist country of Croatia. The special thing about Istria is it has everything you could imagine in a small area. Whatever you want your vacation to be, you can experience it in Istria!

Do you enjoy sunny weather and relaxing on the beach?

 

Or perhaps you're more into active vacations?

 

Istria is also famous throughout the world for its superb gastronomy!

 

There are plenty of sights and cultural festivals to visit.

 

Or perhaps you'd prefer to just relax and enjoy your luxurious holiday?

 

So we've decided to build a luxury holiday villa like no other and place it in the very Heart of Istria!

 

Whether the above is news to you or you already know everything about how great Istria is, it should be clear that this is a must visit location for your holidays - at least once, although many visitors decide to spend every vacation here once they've experienced it for themselves.

With mild Mediterranean climate but exceptionally diverse terrain, Istria is also a great place to visit throughout the year. A summer visit will enable you to enjoy the sea and many activities while a winter visit with snowy hills provides a perfect romantic getaway.

 

PERKS

Best perks go to our early backers so be quick and fund now! You can read detailed legal descriptions here.

 

Show you support the project with a contribution of $25! Thank you from the bottom of our heart! And don't forget, no matter the size of the contribution you're now a backer, and we have a special surprise in store for all our backers!

 

Thank you for your generous contribution of a $100! We are very grateful and once the project is a success we will send you an Istrian souvenir. Nothing special, just something from the heart!

 

We truly appreciate your $200 contribution and want everyone to know that! We will thank you publicly on our website and social media accounts once the project is complete. If you want, we can also include a link to your website or product etc., in the thank you.

But wait, there's more! Backers of this perk will also be thanked in a national newspaper in Croatia!

 

Have you ever wanted to leave your mark in history? Written down for generations to come and have it stand the test of time? For a contribution of $300 your name will be forever chiseled into a stone monument erected in the villa garden, to be gazed upon by countless people through the years.

 

If stone isn't good enough, perhaps metal is. For a contribution of $350 a part of the villa will be named in your honor, and your name placed on a plaque in the house. This is a limited perk, as only 11 sections of the house will be named after generous backers.

Ever wanted to have a building named after you? Now's your chance!

 

This is a perfect perk as it is most flexible! For a contribution of $400 you will be entitled to a 30% discount on your entire bill once you visit the villa! This includes the price of your stay as well as any other services, such as food or drink you order during your holiday!

Best of all, the discount doesn't expire and you can use this for yourself or give it to someone as a gift!

 

For your contribution of $450 we will have a local artist create a painting of you and then hang it in the villa to be seen by all! An extremely limited perk, only the 6 fastest backers will get a chance to be immortalized on canvas and praised by all visitors as those who made it all possible!

 

For a very low price of $565 (just 500€) you are entitled to two nights at the villa - this is a special price for early bird backers! You can purchase multiple perks and combine them for a longer stay!

You don't have to decide now when you'll be coming or even whether you'll use it yourself or give it as a gift. Once the project ends you'll be able to use the booking tool to schedule your dream holiday.

 

For just $850 (750€) you can experience three nights in the Heart of Istria villa! Same as the weekend perk, you can purchase multiple perks and combine them or even gift the stay to someone.

 

What would a perfect holiday be without memories? Whether it be a family affair or a romantic getaway, for a $1,150 contribution you can get a two night stay at the villa and the services of a photographer for an entire day! No matter if you spend the day at the villa or cruising through Istria, the photographer will be with you every step of the way and capture the best moments on camera for you to cherish the rest of your life.

 

This is a special and unforgettable perk. For a contribution of $1,700 you're getting a week-long stay at the villa - but for just two people. Instead of getting the whole villa for yourselves, you'll share it with other backers who took this perk!

So, a week-long stay at the villa with other similarly minded people who believed in the Heart of Istria project. The perfect chance to mingle, make new friends by the pool and share a barbecue with fellow travelers.

 

The early bird backers can get this great perk for just $1,950 (1.700€)! Stay seven nights in the villa and have the time of your life. But hurry, only the 10 fastest backers will enjoy it at this price!

You can use the perk yourself or give it to someone as a gift and yes, it is possible to purchase multiple perks and either combine them into an even longer stay or use them during different years.

 

For a contribution of $7,900 (7.000€) you will get a week-long stay at the villa - in three different years of your choice! So for three whole weeks the villa will be yours.

The stays offer complete flexibility. So you can come and stay one year and then give the perk as a gift to someone else!

 

With a contribution of $11,500 (10.000€) you surely wish this project to succeed. That's why we want to thank you properly. We want you and up to five of your friends or family to come and spend a weekend at the villa together with our family!

We will get to know each other and show you the Istria we know and love, the secret nooks and crannies of this beautiful region. We will also fire up the barbecue and have a big family lunch to celebrate the completion of the project!

 

No half measures with you! When you see something you want you go for it! For a contribution of $28,500 (25.000€) you can stay at the villa for a whole week each year for life! This means you and your family will never have to worry about where to go on vacation again!

This is a very limited perk and only four backers can claim it. So if you want this project to succeed and love visiting Istria, take the plunge and ensure yourself a dream holiday for life!

 

TIMELINE

We've come a long way and we are now ready to bring the project to life! Help us pass this milestone and reach our goal as planned on this timeline!

 

STRETCH GOALS

We want to make this the best holiday villa ever! And that's what our goal is. But there's always room for improvement so we already have some secret ideas lined up!

Back the project and let's reach more than the goal to discover the additional features which will improve your vacation even more!

 

FAQ

If you have any questions please feel free to e-mail us: info@croatianholidayvilla.com

 

Q: I'm having trouble contributing for a desired perk!

A: Contact us info@croatianholidayvilla.com and let us know the problem.  We'll figure it out with Indiegogo.

 

Q: If I get a stay at the villa perk, when can I come and use it?

A: Check our timeline. As soon as the villa construction is complete we will contact all backers and provide access to our online booking tool. Using this you will be able to book your stay for whenever you want.

 

Q: Do I share the villa with someone else?

A: No. Unless you picked the Unknown party or Unforgettable perk, the whole villa is yours for the duration of your stay.

 

Q: Can I bring my children?

A: Of course. If they still sleep in a cot you'll be able to request this using the booking tool at no extra cost. And if you want some time for yourself our fully qualified staff will gladly babysit.

 

Q: Can I get multiple perks?

A: Yes! Due to Indiegogo process you will need to purchase one at a time but nothing is preventing you from doing so or from combining them when you use them.

 

SUCCESS

We're committed to the success of this project. That's why we opted for fixed funding - since we know exactly what needs to be done and exactly what it will cost. This means we must reach the goal to succeed and offer you the best vacation of your life.

So, to make this dream holiday a reality for you:

  • Get your perk now
  • Spread the word and share the campaign

story:
At Stealth, we put a lot of thought into manufacturing ready to ship bags, packaging and the material we use. We're always working to give you the very best.

 Before you back this project we have limited ready to ship Smartbags at our factory in stock.  We're shipping as soon as the campaign ends.

In the upper section of this project we do briefly  introduce each bag edition and the  specifications from the 60L/45L King Kong Duffel , the 25L Daily backpack, 9L /5L Sling and 40L Max Pro Edition.

Please scroll down to see more details of that bag that suits your style.

Ready to ship 25L Smart bags

Please NOTE: The ready to ship editions are in black color BUT if your color preference is any color other than black, then you'll have to fill out the Backer survey after the campaign ends.

Ready to ship 9L/5L Sling Bag

Meet the Stealth smart bag family a high breed of tech bags combined with detailed organization and dedicated pockets. 

 

All our smart bags  are  made from the strongest carbon fibers  ten times stronger than steel and eight times that of aluminum, not to mention much lighter than both materials, 5 and 1.5 times respectively.

Carbon fiber is very durable and also very rugged as a material.

Made from carbon fiber, these are bags of Unmatched versatility, sleek design, access, organization and aesthetics, from a company of tech enthusiasts and developers.

This is the 60L King Kong Edition we call King Kong. Incredibly easy to configure  and organize the modules in seconds  enabling you to carry  it in  three carrying options.

The King Kong Duffle aims to create a revolution in how easy it should be to organize your packed items and stay on the move - whether you are commuting across town or taking a short trip.

This is the 25L Daily Backpack. It is a sleek  design, stylish, curvy with a purpose and made for those that need a great everyday backpack.

 

Meet the Max Pro edition with 25 pockets and built in camera for AI. The main difference between the 25L and 45L is size and the AI Camera.  

 

 Built in AI Camera| On device Algorithms

We've added a number of  "special features" that distinguish us from the bag  industry and we'd like you to be part of this journey with no targeted ads, no privacy concerns or data harvesting.  Most importantly is how we use  AI with Machine Learning  Algorithms in a bag to detect and receive real time alerts. Max Pro AI Camera can;

  • Records videos in 4k
  • Takes and Saves  pictures 
  • Voice recording
  • Real time notifications
  • Object detection AI Algorithms

Our AI Algorithms process images into meaningful associations and match them to goals. The  more objects our Algorithms interact with, the more it learns. Powered by AI, the bags become a more potent weapon for fighting crime, recording in ultra 4k  for self-defense purposes, photography, blogging and travel.

The Max-Pro  has an ergonomic design and a well-padded shoulder strap to ensure maximum support for the most rigorous journeys. From work commutes to outdoor adventures, this bag can do it all.

Built in Shoe Pouch

This is a must feature in all our smart bags whether you go to the gym, do sports after work or travel once in a while. 

A Built in Toiletry Bag

Keep it all in one place. In less than a few seconds , hang it inside the bag with your toiletries in intact  wherever whenever you need them.

Multi Functional Shoulder Straps

There are times you need a quick access pocket for your card, coins, water bottle or umbrella.T he smart bags are designed with quick access pockets for just that.

 

Breathable Back Panels

Max-Pro Backpack is equipped with padded straps and back panels that are comfortable and durable. The design allows airflow at the back of the bag making it super breathable.

 

USB Port| Built in 10.000 MAh Powerbank

Charge on the road with our built in powerbank. Supports type C  providing you with 2.5 watts of power.

 

Camera Bag Inserts| Dividers

This for all those that carry cameras to work on a daily basis. The adjustable dividers keep your Camera gear safe, easy to access and convenient for you whenever you need them

We have 2 types of Sling bags. 9L and 5L Sling bag all made from Carbon Fiber.

The Smart Sling has been engineered to last and gone through rigorous testing to ensure that it conforms to our international standards.

We designed the sling based on 3 core principles: practical, style, material and quality so you can take it wherever life takes you.

This the 60L/45L beast of a bag.

 It is a bag for the outdoors, the trips, the get away and safari. Made from carbon fiber, it is the perfect bag for professionals from photography to family outdoors.

Easy to configure  and organize the modules in seconds  enabling you to carry in  three carrying options.

Quickly and easily access items with 3 quick grab points and charge electronics while on the go with our inbuilt 10,000 mAh power bank.

Save time on packing and retrieve what you need, when you need it.

Never again worry about how much to pack, what to put where, and how to organize everything.

Whether you're planning to go to the gym or go on an outdoor adventure. This 60L Duffel can accommodate everything you need

The mid section compartment opens up completely and gives you easy access to the middle compartment.

Perfect for your shoes and other bulky equipment!

You don't have to rummage through your bag , creating total chaos in the process.

We made it super  easy and hassle free with quick and easy-access openings and pockets. Easy in, easy out.

Has two module compartments which are easily removable with detachable clips and side pockets on either end.

We added one long padded shoulder strap which is REMOVABLE just in case you would like to use the easy handles and change its carrying style to backpack mode.

Whether your trip is for a sport tournament, business, adventure or simply leisure, this is the perfect carry along duffel for those who would like top organization on the leash.

Laptop and iPad compartments with a strong protective pad right at the edge for ease of access during check-ins while traveling.

60L Dimensions

45L Dimensions

Daily  Backpack includes 25 pockets,  hidden compartments with tons of space, and your large-sized items can fit snugly inside.

Customized Bottle Opener

The bottle opener is attached to an elastic leash. It stretches back into the bag after using it.

 

The 25L Smartbag opens up fully at 180 degrees providing you easy access for packing.

We designed the 25L to be super easy to pack your shirt or 2 with internal straps that keep your clothes in one place.

 

Hidden Pockets Compartment

The 25 & 40L bags have built in hidden pocket compartments for items you may not want others for privacy reasons.

 

Waist Strap

We added an adjustable waist strap to balance the load in the bag while on the road.

The detachable toiletry bag organizes your toiletries keeping you organized.  It fits in  all our bags with the exception of the 9l and the Mesh type.

 

We know what daily travelers go through, so we made the 25L bag durable, light, and portable for all your outdoor activities, keeping your valuables organized and protected anywhere you go.

It's a great bag to compliment your adventure and after work lifestyle with an inbuilt shoe pouch for gym, sports or party.

17 inch Padded laptop and iPad compartments for protection.

Our built in toiletry bag is easy to roll up, easy to hang inside the bag and take out at the same time. For your cables, face cream, sanitizer, face masks, beard wax and much more.

Made from carbon fiber, mesh pockets & 2 pockets with a hook that makes it easy to hang or use.

Easy to roll up| Everything in one Place

Easily roll it up and hang it in the bag. Sanitize whenever on the road or outdoors especially in these Covid 19 pandemic.

Hang it Outdoors | Keeps you Super Organized

Instead of a bag full of items littered everywhere, we added a practical and very functional toiletry bag to keep you super organized. 

 

 

We added a shoe pouch for any day you might need to do something extra.

When you need to carry extra load, our wave design expands "automatically" to create more space. No  added buckles just an ergonomic design for extra expansion giving you extra 3 liters.

The 25L opens fully at 180 degrees allowing you to access every inch of the bag.

25L is a premium office bag for that classy outlook with 25 pockets. A built in 10.000 mAh power-bank to charge your gadgets to the go.

An elastic key leash - Don't even worry about misplacing or forgetting your keys anymore. 

The padded iPad and Laptop compartments to keep your gadgets safe while on the road.

A  Luggage sleeve makes it easy to add on your suitcase when  going for your next road trip.

 

Meet the sling bag. The perfect carbon fiber bag for the MINIMALIST and all those that need to get the job done in the most minimalist way possible. We have the 9L Sling and 5L Sling bag both designed for the minimalists. 

We all like sling bag for its simple and light style. However, limited capacity and lack of organization have been the major problems for most sling bags. That's why we have 2 versions of our - Sling bag.

The 9L/5L Sling are both designed for the outdoor minimalists.

3 major features:

  • Built in elastic to organize all smaller items
  • Expandable capacity
  • Quick access external pockets

One of the greatest challenge for current sling bags is to keep all the smaller items organized. We all hate digging around for something that lays in some dark corner. 

Slick and Minimal look

We make great quality bags with PU coated water repellent material with weather proof zippers. Pure black color, fashionable and slick. Opens at 180 degrees to allow you access every inch of your bag.

Water repellent material

The sling bags uses  Carbon fiber coated with a layer material, making it tough and water repellent.

Major compartment for more capacity

Oure sling bag have great capacity in the extendable compartment. It can easily take in smaller to large water bottle, umbrella, tech-pouch, etc.

Two face carry

Our slings can be carried from both sides. You can carry with the flipping side out for quick access, or the expansion side out for more capacity. 

It is super light. The adjustable strap allows you to access valuables from the back to the front position.

It can easily absorb pressure and folds right back into shape when you lean on it

The waterproof leather and zippers are water resistant to keep your property dry

In-depth Analysis of the AI Camera Backpack 

 In Depth review of the Duffel Bag

 

Review of the 25L, 40L and 9L Sling Bag

Production at our Factory is currently going on

story:
Expert Wine Travel

The Traveling Grape is a company built on 30+ years of wine industry experience and knowledge and on our love traveling to some of the best wine producing regions in the world. Our team is made up of wine professionals who have relationships with some of the best wineries and winemakers in the world. We want other wine lovers to feel the same excitement and joy that we have visiting beautiful wineries, meeting winemakers, and experiencing authentic food and culture.

We specialize in visits to boutique, family-owned wineries who emphasize sustainable practices with the utmost respect for the terroir. Many of these wineries are not open to the public, so this is an unprecedented opportunity for all oenophiles.

 

Can’t Make it to Portugal?

Learn and explore Portuguese wines from the comfort of your own home with one of our Portugal at Home packages. All the wine packages will be truly unique and authentic wines from Portugal. The wines included will be ones that best represent the region they are from and that help tells the story of that place.  Along with the wine, you will also receive information and notes with expert insight into Portuguese wines, the stories behind the wines from the people that produce them, tasting notes, food pairings, and so much more.

Portugal at Home wines will all be boutique style, sustainably produced, family-estate based, with high critical praise*, and many that have never been available in the United States until September.  Perk members will be some of first to taste these wines.

All Portugal at Home perk holders will be sent vouchers in September 2018 with instructions how to redeem them and set up shipping. You will be able to pick shipping dates to ensure you will be available to receive your package and avoid any heat damage.

 *Popular critics like Robert Parker/Wine Advocate, Wine Spectator, Wine Enthusiast, and more. Many of the wines will have 90 or more points on the rating scale. 

 

Best of Portugal Wine Tour

We are offering contributors an escorted tour to one of our favorite places, Portugal, at a 40% discount. In the last few years, Portugal has emerged as one of the hottest wine regions in Europe. From its 100+ indigenous grape varietals are elaborated unique and exciting wines that with modern techniques are just becoming available to consumers. These wines embrace a fresh sourced and dynamic food scene.

The Traveling Grape is an environmentally responsible tour group. We offset carbon emissions on behalf of all of our travelers.

* All trip perk holders will receive a confirmation voucher within 24  hours of the end of this campaign. This voucher will have details and instructions how to finish registering for your trip. 

 

Highlights

  • Seven days, Six nights
  • 5* accommodations
  • Explore Porto and Lisbon
  • Visit over six wineries and try over 60 wines
  • Port house visit
  • Winery stay in the Douro
  • Meet and learn from winemakers
  • All breakfasts and 4 lunches included
  • Three wine dinners with wine pairings
  • Small Tour Groups; our tours have a maximum of 12 people plus 2 guides.

Itinerary 

Day 1   Arrival and Welcome 

Porto is a great introduction to Portugal. Beautiful and historic, it is a walking city and is easy to get around with lots to see and great food.

  • Arrive in Porto. 
  • Hotel check-in.
  • Free time to explore in Porto to allow for everyone's arrival.
  • Welcome dinner and we will raise our glasses to celebrate the beginning of our exciting week in Portugal!

Day 2   Exploring Porto

We will take some time to acclimate and get to know this wondrous city. Of course, Porto is the home of port wine. 

  • After breakfast, we’ll kick off our morning with a walking tour of the beautiful city of Porto.
  • Over lunch, we will learn the history and traditions of port including a port tasting.
  • After lunch, we will take a Port house tour.
  • After a busy day, the evening is yours to rest or explore on your own. We'll have additional recommendations for spots to visit!  

Day 3   Vinho Verde

You might know Vinho Verde as the home to fizzy quaffing wines but it's also home to small wineries that produce some of the finest white wines in the world.  We will be visiting one of the most prestigious of these producers.

  • After breakfast in the hotel, we'll depart the city and travel by bus to the Vinho Verde wine region.
  • Throughout the day you will learn about all the different indigenous grapes of this region.  You will also learn the history of the largest wine region in Portugal.
  • We’ll visit one of Vinho Verde’s most outstanding wineries and observe the winemaking process.
  • Here we’ll enjoy lunch in the vineyard with the winemaker and his wines.
  • We'll bus back to Porto in the afternoon.
  • We’ll end our day at a traditional restaurant in Porto with wine pairings.

Day 4   Into the Douro   

This is one of the most spectacular wine regions in the world.  Along with being the home of port, it is also home to many highly regarded red wines. Some are rated as the best reds in the world.

  • Breakfast in the hotel, pack your bags
  • Head into the Douro by private bus
  • Here we’ll enjoy lunch along with gorgeous views of the Douro Valley.
  • Winery tour
  • Dinner at one of the most famous restaurants in Portugal with the winemaker and wine pairings.
  • We will stay this night at a winery in the Douro.

Day 5   Hello Lisbon!

Lisbon perfectly reflects the Portuguese culture, modern but maintaining its unique heritage and traditions. It is constantly recognized as one of the greatest cities in the world but it is still one of the least visited capital cities in Europe. It's also easy to get around, friendly, with a lively nightlife and fabulous food.

  • Today we will start the day with breakfast at the winery, then we will pack bags and load the bus.
  • We will depart from the Porto train station for a three-hour journey to Lisbon.
  • Check into the hotel in Lisbon
  • This afternoon and evening, you are free to wander and dine on your own,  your guides will give you tips to some of their favorite local spots.  

Day 6   Lisbon Wineries

The Lisboa wine region produces both red and white wines that can't be missed. We will travel a short distance from Lisbon to two different wineries offering contrasting styles from many of the same varietals.

  • After breakfast in the hotel, we will start the last day of our adventure.
  • Bus trip to winery
  • Winery tour and tasting
  • Bus trip to next winery
  • Lunch at winery with wine tasting
  • We’ll share our last dinner together at a fabulous seafood restaurant in Lisbon. For those in the mood to stay out longer, we can bring you to some of our favorite spots for a proper cocktail.

Day 7   Farewell and Departure

Wake up and enjoy breakfast at your leisure. This morning, we bid farewell to new friends, fellow explorers, and wonderful guides. Depart for flights or trains home, or onto your next destination.

The Fine Print

THE TRAVELING GRAPE BEST OF PORTUGAL WINE TOUR INCLUDES

  • All lodging in double-accommodation rooms in 5 star hotels throughout the trip. Alas, we can't accommodate singles at this time.
  • 6 breakfasts, 4 lunches, and 3 dinners (with wine, duh).
  • Two guides to accompany you throughout the trip.
  • Admission to all proposed activities and events.
  • A great group of fellow Traveling Grape oenophiles, excited to explore all that Portugal has to offer!

The Traveling Grape is an environmentally responsible tour group. We offset trip emissions on behalf of all of our travelers. 

(Please see our Terms and Conditions for more detail.)

You must be 21 and over.

ACTIVITY LEVEL
This tour requires a medium fitness level and the ability to walk and/or stand for long periods of time. Guests should expect to walk upwards of 5 to 7 miles over the course of any given day and spend significant time outdoors, including in the countryside.

FLIGHTS AND RAIL
You should plan to arrive in Porto by 3 p.m. on the day the tours starts. If you are flying to Lisbon we can help direct you to the convenient and fast three hour rail service to Porto (it's easy!). Otherwise, there are many connecting flights to Porto available.  We will pick you up at the train station or airport and take you to the hotel.

NOTE ON ITINERARY
Itineraries are subject to change. This particular tour has been designed with specific activities and events in mind, whose schedules and availability may change in coming months. If any activity or attraction that is advertised is missed or not available, then we will always replace it with another activity or location of significant interest and value.

Please note that The Traveling Grape Portugal trip is non-refundable through this promotion. But be assured if for any reason the trip is cancelled we will return your money.

TRAVELERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR

  • Transportation and flights arriving in Porto, Portugal and departing from Lisbon, Portugal
  • Travel insurance (optional).
  • Baggage charges.
  • Additional meals and drinks outside of The Traveling Grape offerings, including three dinners and all alcoholic beverages outside of wine.

Here we’ll enjoy lunch along with gorgeous views of the Douro Valley.
Winery tour
Dinner at one of the most famous restaurants in Portugal with the winemaker and wine pairings.
We will stay this night at a winery in the Douro.
Day 5   Hello Lisbon!Lisbon perfectly reflects the Portuguese culture, modern but maintaining its unique heritage and traditions. It is constantly recognized as one of the greatest cities in the world but it is still one of the least visited capital cities in Europe. It's also easy to get around, friendly, with a lively nightlife and fabulous food.
Today we will start the day with breakfast at the winery, then we will pack bags and load the bus.
We will depart from the Porto train station for a three-hour journey to Lisbon.
Check into the hotel in Lisbon
This afternoon and evening, you are free to wander and dine on your own,  your guides will give you tips to some of their favorite local spots.  
Day 6   Lisbon Wineries The Lisboa wine region produces both red and white wines that can't be missed. We will travel a short distance from Lisbon to two different wineries offering contrasting styles from many of the same varietals.
After breakfast in the hotel, we will start the last day of our adventure.
Bus trip to winery
Winery tour and tasting
Bus trip to next winery
Lunch at winery with wine tasting
We’ll share our last dinner together at a fabulous seafood restaurant in Lisbon. For those in the mood to stay out longer, we can bring you to some of our favorite spots for a proper cocktail.
Day 7   Farewell and DepartureWake up and enjoy breakfast at your leisure. This morning, we bid farewell to new friends, fellow explorers, and wonderful guides. Depart for flights or trains home, or onto your next destination.The Fine PrintTHE TRAVELING GRAPE BEST OF PORTUGAL WINE TOUR INCLUDES
All lodging in double-accommodation rooms in 5 star hotels throughout the trip. Alas, we can't accommodate singles at this time.
6 breakfasts, 4 lunches, and 3 dinners (with wine, duh).
Two guides to accompany you throughout the trip.
Admission to all proposed activities and events.
A great group of fellow Traveling Grape oenophiles, excited to explore all that Portugal has to offer!
The Traveling Grape is an environmentally responsible tour group. We offset trip emissions on behalf of all of our travelers. (Please see our Terms and Conditions for more detail.)You must be 21 and over.ACTIVITY LEVELThis tour requires a medium fitness level and the ability to walk and/or stand for long periods of time. Guests should expect to walk upwards of 5 to 7 miles over the course of any given day and spend significant time outdoors, including in the countryside.FLIGHTS AND RAILYou should plan to arrive in Porto by 3 p.m. on the day the tours starts. If you are flying to Lisbon we can help direct you to the convenient and fast three hour rail service to Porto (it's easy!). Otherwise, there are many connecting flights to Porto available.  We will pick you up at the train station or airport and take you to the hotel.NOTE ON ITINERARYItineraries are subject to change. This particular tour has been designed with specific activities and events in mind, whose schedules and availability may change in coming months. If any activity or attraction that is advertised is missed or not available, then we will always replace it with another activity or location of significant interest and value.Please note that The Traveling Grape Portugal trip is non-refundable through this promotion. But be assured if for any reason the trip is cancelled we will return your money.TRAVELERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR
Transportation and flights arriving in Porto, Portugal and departing from Lisbon, Portugal
Travel insurance (optional).
Baggage charges.
Additional meals and drinks outside of The Traveling Grape offerings, including three dinners and all alcoholic beverages outside of wine.

story:
Who We Are

SKYLAB® is part of an innovative Product Development and Design firm based in the Bay Area. Our staff has over 30+ combined years of experience creating and bringing unique, sought-after consumer products to market. We recently began designing, prototyping, and manufacturing our own products, with Axis™ as our first entry to market.

Axis™ - Highly Functional & Well-Designed

Our goal was to create a new unique device that eliminated the need for rolling papers while offering consistent and smooth draws. We also wanted to help reduce the number of discarded filters (that take eons to degrade) off the streets, out of landfills, and out of waterways.

AXIS™ is designed as a stylish and extremely functional tool, leaving no stone unturned to ensure peak performance. The movable plate gives excellent compression while preventing fallback into the cylinder, which was something we found challenging when using auger-style offerings.

Next, we looked at how to create a cover that would perform several functions:

- Loss-limit design

- Prevents rolling

- Impact resistance

- Storage & dor control

Finally, in the end, we needed to ensure that the Axis™ could be easily cleaned. Using a liquid solution-based cleaner, and a few minutes of time, and you'll have it prepped and ready to go for the next session.

Hurdles & Successes 

There were certainly hiccups along the development path to get things just right. We value our internal folks' ability to quickly make changes and necessary updates so we were able to finalize a product that we were more than happy with. After countless prototypes and active sessions, we did it. Axis™ has come to life.

Where Things Are At & How You Can Get An Axis™

We are happy to say that we are currently in production, but we realize that we need funding to help spread the word through events and improving our social media exposure. We are looking to generate $5,000 to make this happen. Your pledge with get you in the queue for an Axis™ at 20% off the normal retail, and that will include free shipping*. We anticipate to receive our first order to ship from our supplier end June 2018, and once received, we will turn around Axis™ pipe shipments within 5 days of receipt via USPS. We are currently only shipping to continental US addresses at the moment.

What's In The Box?

Metal Base with Signature Hexagon Logo

Silicone O-ring

Metal Threaded Assembly

Metal Compression Plate

Borosilicate Cylinder

Multi-function Silicone Cover

Additional components:

1x Spare O-ring

1x Spare Metal Plate

1x Cleaning Brush

1x Tamper Tool

 

Patent Pending

*CA residents will be subject to sales tax.

Warning:

Health Warning: "Products we offer are not intended for pregnant or nursing women, children, people with or at risk of heart disease, high blood pressure, diabetes, asthma, or those who are sensitive to nicotine. By purchasing you confirm that you are of legal age and acknowledge you will assume all liabilities for any harm or damages that may result in the use of these products. Use at your own risk. 

NOT FOR SALE TO MINORS. FOR USE WITH TOBACCO ONLY. Nicotine is addictive and may be dangerous to your health. Keep out of reach of children and pets

story:
You can be a big part of the crucial first step in funding this project by simply contributing $1. If each person that reads this message gives $1 then we can show there is a need and desire for a facility like this in the Myrtle Beach area and reach the $50,000 goal within 60 days.  Be sure to check out the awesome perks we have for anyone that would like to contribute more than $1. 

Thanks for checking us out!
Jeff Cline
Founder

What is Ponderosa Beach?

Ponderosa Beach will be an outdoor adventure park with camping facilities and also host a children's summer camp during the 10 summer weeks. It will be a place where you can explore the outdoors or relax on the beach, swing from trees or swing in a hammock, challenge yourself or reward yourself. It will truly be the best of both worlds!

Explore both sides of this exciting Adventure Camp!

The Ponderosa side will feature:

  • Family style cabins secluded among the pine trees along the 3 acre lake
  • An aerial adventure course with bridges & obstacles, a high & low ropes course, a Quick Jump Free Fall and scenic zip line across the entire lake!
  • ATV rentals and trail course
  • An Adventure Run obstacle course for those training for an event or just having fun
  • A tree house village where you can sleep in the trees and cook over an open fire
  • Make an appointment for a horseback riding adventure throughout the 68 acres
  • Catch some fish in our stocked fishing pond at the back of the camp

The Beach side will feature:

  • Luxury Canvas Cabins nestled along the the 3 acre lake and just steps from the beach
  • A floating water park that features trampolines, slides, bouncers, and much more!
  • Beach loungers, tiki umbrellas, floating mats, and drink service will be available
  • Paddle boards, kayaks, and canoes available to explore the lake
  • 40 foot tall inflatable water slide
  • Wooded tent sites available for those wanting to relax among the trees

The best part of Ponderosa Beach is how affordable it is for the entire family to enjoy a day of exciting adventures or spend the day playing in the water or relaxing on the beach! For one admission price you can enjoy all the adventures the camp has to offer.

Day Pass Admission & Other Fees
Friday, Saturday & Sunday 10 am - 7 pm

Day Pass: $15 per person (includes admission to the camp, use of the beach, floating water park and other water activities)
ATV tour (1.5 hour): $85 per person
Zip line, aerial course, ropes course, and Quick Jump free fall: $55 per person
Horseback riding (1 hour): $35 per person

  

Summer Camp Sessions

Ponderosa Beach will cater to children (ages 5 - 15) for day & overnight camps during the 10 summer weeks Monday - Friday. These weekly camp sessions will be for 10 weeks from the second week of June through the second week of August.

Each week will feature a theme camp including one week each summer where the camp will host children with special needs and their parent(s) so they have the opportunity to experience the joy of summer camp.

  • Survivor Camp: campers will be split into two tribes and compete in a food reward challenge each day while learning how to become a Soul Survivor

  • Science Camp: campers will experience explosions, gases, liquid nitrogen and many other exciting hands-on activities

  • Quest Camp: campers will enjoy a week of activities that will encourage team building and problem solving skills. Teams will compete to find clues and solve puzzles while playing Treasure Hunt and Amazing Race games

  • Beach Camp: campers will spend three days at camp participating in fun beach activities like snorkeling, beach volleyball, sand castle building contests, etc. The two other days the campers will be transported to the Myrtle Beach State Park to spend the day at the ocean surfing, body boarding, learning about marine life and exploring nature trails

  • Sports Camp: campers will play volleyball, basketball, soccer, golf, softball, and many more. Our Sports Directors will help each child become a better player and a more inspired athlete

  • Magic Camp: every day the campers will have fun learning a new magic trick and experience a live magic show at camp.

  • Special Needs Camp: campers will enjoy singing, playing games, swimming, arts and crafts, and much more. Trained pediatric therapists will be there to assist and guide the campers through a typical camp day.

Resident Campers $475/week
Campers can be dropped off starting at 8 am on Monday mornings and must be picked up by 1 pm on Fridays.

Day Campers $199/week
Campers can be dropped off each day between 8 - 10 am and picked up by 7 pm Monday - Thursday and by 1 pm on Fridays. Pick-up and drop off transportation may be available for an additional cost.

Cabin & Treehouse Rentals

Spend the night in one of our cabins or tree houses to enjoy extra hours of adventure or relaxation.

Luxury Canvas Beach Cabins $200/night
Glamping at its finest! Sleeps 2-4 people, enjoy quality linens, air conditioning, a private fire pit lit for you nightly, and your very own outdoor shower!

Tree House $100/night
Sleep in the trees and cook on an open fire! sleeps 6

RV Sites $40/night
Full hookup sites

Tent Sites $25/night
For those wanting to get away from it all

Couples Retreat Weekends

Be sure to book a cabin for one of our themed Couples Only Retreats and experience a fun filled weekend where only the overnight guests will be at the camp (no day pass visitors). There will be retreats like: Couples Survivor, Beach Party Luau, Murder Mystery Camp, Haunted Trails, and more!

Location

The camp will be located in Conway, SC just 24 miles from Myrtle Beach with convenient access via Highway 22. It is less than a 2.5 hour drive from Charlotte, Columbia, Raleigh, Charleston, and other great cities! 

Start your vacation early, add an exciting day to your summer vacation
Most beach house rentals do not allow you to arrive until 3 pm or later on Saturdays during the summer. So bring the family and spend the night with us on Friday night and enjoy the camp instead of waiting in line to check-in. Or tack on a day at the end of your week when you are forced to check-out on Saturday and stay with us Saturday night before starting your trip home on Sunday.

Funding

For Ponderosa Beach to become a reality we need your help! This is an ambitious and expensive project so we will be using revenue, contributions, loans, sponsorship's, and investors to fund this project. We will keep you posted every step of the way through our Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter accounts!

How else can you help?

If you are not able to contribute money please take a moment to like us on Facebook and help spread the word about Ponderosa Beach Adventure Camp.

Also, if you know a business that would be interested in being a sponsor please let us know!

story:
Meet The Carry-On.

The Carry-On is the result of thoughtful design, high quality materials, and a commitment to honest pricing.

  • Light-weight, indestructible shell (100% polycarbonate)
  • Fits on all major US airlines
  • Compression technology helps you pack more
  • High quality materials, 10 year warranty

Early backers get our impeccably designed suitcase, at a discounted price. The Carry-On comes in Slate Blue, Forest Green, and White Sandstone.

We are friends, designers, and entrepreneurs with a passion for travel. Together, we designed the carry-on we always wanted but could never find. We are very grateful for your support, and we can't wait to see where Marlowe takes you! 

- Brendan & Tom

About us:  We've built everything from mobile apps, to physical goods, always putting a premium on quality, simplicity, and design. We have extensive experience with direct-to-consumer business models that make it possible to offer high end products at a fraction of the cost. We're excited to finally make high end luggage affordable.

About the name:  Marlowe means roughly from the hill by the water. We chose this name as a nod to Marlowe's birthplace: San Francisco, CA.  

Note: We have already gone through an extensive design process, selected a manufacturer, and produced multiple fully functional prototypes. We will use the funds from this campaign to place our first bulk order of The Carry-On and distribute them to early backers. We are very grateful for your support!

How does Marlowe compare to other premium suitcase brands?

Why does The Carry-On cost so much less than other high-end suitcases?

We spend the same amount as high end luggage companies on the design, materials, and production costs that go into a premium suitcase. The reason we can offer a lower retail price is simple: we will sell directly to our customers, online only. This means we don’t need to maintain expensive brick and mortar retail locations, or pay hefty sales commissions to store associates. We pass those savings on to you, the customer.

Beyond that we make a commitment to fair and honest pricing. Quite frankly, the luggage industry makes billions of dollars every year scamming customers with outrageous markups. We think that's unfair.

Our model is different: We are proud to produce the highest quality luggage, and offer it at an honest price.

Where do you ship?

We can ship anywhere in the United States for FREE.  Extra charges apply for international shipping. Please see the Perks section for details.

How does the 10 year warranty work?

Our warranty policy is simple: If your suitcase is damaged due to normal wear and tear in the first 10 years of use we will repair or replace it, no questions asked. We believe that luggage should be built to last. It's an easy promise to make when you believe in your product.

What is polycarbonate?

Polycarbonate is a super strong, lightweight plastic. It is widely used in high-end luggage, but you do need to be careful as some producers (cough, Tumi) will mix in lower quality materials like ABS to cut corners. Our luggage is made from 100% polycarbonate for extra durability.

How much does The Carry-On weigh?

6 lbs. Our carry-on is one of the lightest on the market.

Does The Carry-On actually fit as a carry-on?

Yes! Checking your bag is a pain. We designed this suitcase to fit as a carry-on with all major US airlines, and the vast majority of international airlines too. The exact dimensions are: 22” x 14” x 9”. 

I would like to write an article about Marlowe. Who should I contact?

Please drop us a note at hi@marloweluggage.com. We will be in touch as soon as possible.

I have more questions about Marlowe!

Send us a message at hi@marloweluggage.com, or on our Facebook Page. We're happy to help!
