story: OUSQUARE is a design company dedicated to designing and manufacturing products with distinctive features and in unique styles, aiming to improve customers’ quality of life by freeing them from wavering between difficult choices. $10 of funds raised will be used to establish the travel accident fund. 30% of the remaining money collected will be used for research & development and after-sales service, and the rest (70%) of the capital will be used for manufacturing.
story_txt: OUSQUARE is a design company dedicated to designing and manufacturing products with distinctive features and in unique styles, aiming to improve customers’ quality of life by freeing them from wavering between difficult choices. $10 of funds raised will be used to establish the travel accident fund. 30% of the remaining money collected will be used for research & development and after-sales service, and the rest (70%) of the capital will be used for manufacturing.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Zidar Dušan. As a photographer, I have been working almost twenty-five years, mostly in commercial, studio, nature and travel photography. 
In recent years i rediscovered my passion for street and documentary (mostly b&W) photography, shooting digital and film. I was inspired mainly by the work of Robert Frank, H.C.B., Garry Winogrand, Alex Webb and others. I also learned a lot about street photography from Eric Kim blog and Street hunters. 
Visit my Flickr page https://www.flickr.com/photos/dusanzidar , or my web page.

What Is It About

This project goal is making a beautiful b&w art photo book about life and emotion of the Greek people in this uncertain time. I will put my heart and soul plus 100% of work into this and then choose only 30 outstanding photographs out of five to ten thousand. It will take about a month to select, edit, post process, develop/scan films and design a book, after we return from the trip. So the perks will be going out shipping at the end of November. Title of the book remains unknown until the selection of the photographs.
There is a lot going on in Greece this year (financial crisis, war refugees...) which will make this project even more important and challenging for me to accomplish.


Estimated departure date is scheduled on 20.09.2015. The plan is to travel around Greek mainland and coastline for one month with our small camper (converted from a van) and subjectively capture amazing photographs. My better half and my partner Tanja and our dog Jazz are joining me on this adventurous journey to keep me company and help my creativity going.

How You Can Help

This is an unprofitable art project. The funding for the trip is coming from our pockets, so basically the money that you will be contributing will mostly go for perks (printing books, shipping costs, fees...). I hope some extra will stay for the food & drink on the road☺
 
There are five ways in which you can contribute/participate

  • €4 - Big THANK YOU and a pack of two postcard size photographs from the journey.
  • €10 - A pack of four postcard size photographs signed by the author plus E- photo book from the journey.
  • €20 - A pack of 8 postcard size photographs signed by the author plus E- photo book from the journey.
  • €35 - Signed small PHOTO BOOK 34 pages/30photographs - (limited edition) plus 2x signed postcard size prints  plus E-book.There will also be thank-you note with 20 names of contributors stated in each photo book.
  • €45 - Signed large PHOTO BOOK 34 pages/30photographs - (limited edition) plus 4x signed postcard size prints  plus E-book. There will also be thank-you note with 20 names of contributors stated in each photo book.

Free shipping for all perks!! (shipping costs already included in price)



What You're Getting Into

By contributing, you’re becoming a part of beautiful art project but also enabling me to accomplish a dream.

Other Ways You Can Help

I don't think everybody wants prints, e-books or a Photo book, but I would appreciate if you could share this in case some of your friends would enjoy a Art Photo book from Greece.

Please share it and tell me what you think about this project. 

Whenever we can (if I can find a wifi spot) we will be posting news about the trip and the project on GREECE Monochrome facebook page.

I belive this is going to be quite an adventure!


Thank you for taking the time to read and watch my video, and to share this campaign with your friends!! 

  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word !
story_txt:
Short SummaryMy name is Zidar Dušan. As a photographer, I have been working almost twenty-five years, mostly in commercial, studio, nature and travel photography. In recent years i rediscovered my passion for street and documentary (mostly b&W) photography, shooting digital and film. I was inspired mainly by the work of Robert Frank, H.C.B., Garry Winogrand, Alex Webb and others. I also learned a lot about street photography from Eric Kim blog and Street hunters. 

Visit my Flickr page https://www.flickr.com/photos/dusanzidar , or my web page.What Is It About
This project goal is making a beautiful b&w art photo book about life and emotion of the Greek people in this uncertain time. I will put my heart and soul plus 100% of work into this and then choose only 30 outstanding photographs out of five to ten thousand. It will take about a month to select, edit, post process, develop/scan films and design a book, after we return from the trip. So the perks will be going out shipping at the end of November. Title of the book remains unknown until the selection of the photographs.



There is a lot going on in Greece this year (financial crisis, war refugees...) which will make this project even more important and challenging for me to accomplish.

story:
Outdoor Equipment with life Energy, The Product directly supplies power to most mobile phones and electronic digital products through constant voltage and charging protection. No battery Requires,

 

With breathable design contains large mesh combines to form air guiding, which reduces heat and reduces back pressure, The main back has Large Capacity, is separated by multiple layers for easy sorting and placement of all kinds of product, Also contains Ultra wide shock Strap, More Fit Shoulders,

 

Reasonably distribute weight with Portable charging, Convert Solar energy into electrical energy, Charging mobile phone, digital camera, and other micro-electrics anytime, anywhere

story:
Mini kemperio ( teardrop trailer) idėja, dizainas mena jau beveik 90 metų, kai 1930 metais buvo publikuoti pirmieji brėžiniai ir nuo to laiko jie išpopuliarėjo išlaikydami savo vintažinį dizainą ir minimalistinę koncepciją. Jame dažniausiai būna patogi dvigulė lova ir mini virtuvėlė su pagrindine reikiama įranga stovyklavimui ar kelionėms.

Pirmasis TINYCAMPER atsirado iš poreikio pakeliauti savo automobiliu, aplankyti pažintines mažai civilizacijos paliestas vietas, todėl visiškai nesinorėjo rezervuoti viešbučių ar apartamentų. Norėjosi būti arčiau gamtos ir stovyklauti ten, kur galima pikniką pasidaryti ir pasimėgauti naktinio laužo romantika. Po intensyvių paieškų atradome šiuos mini kemperiukus ir nusprendėme, kad reikia tokį pasidaryti. Laikui bėgant pagalvojome, kad galime pasidalinti savo patirtimi ir populiarinti tokį keliavimo būdą Lietuvoje ir šiam etape suteikti šansą visiems norintiems ir planuojantiems keliones pakeliauti būtent su tokiu mini kemperiu.

KO MUMS REIKIA:

Mūsų planas yra pagaminti vieną mini kemperį nuomai, jei įgaus populiarumo, planuojame ir daugiau . Tam, kad pavyktų išpopuliarinti šių kemperių idėją, reikia jūsų pagalbos pasidalinti su savo draugais apie tokius kemperius ir jūsų finansinio palaikymo mainais į nuomą. Finansavimo sėkmės atveju 2018 pavasarį paleisime pirmą kemperio versiją visiems išbandyti, kai prasidės pats kelionių sezonas. 

KAS TAU IŠ TO:

Tu gauni kelionėms pasiruošusį ir pagrindine įranga aprūpintą mini kemperį kelionei po Lietuvos regionus, Europą ir apsistoti gražiose vietose. Šie mini kemperiai yra iki 750kg svorio ir nereikalauja papildomos vairuotojo kategorijos. Jame yra dviejų vietų (1.4x2m) komfortiška lova, spintelės drabužiams bei daiktams pasidėti. Bus įrengta talpi baterija pasikrauti elektroninius įrenginius bei pasijungti buitinius prietaisus. Saulės baterija suteiks visišką autonomiją ilgoms kelionėms. Mini virtuvėlė su būtiniausiais įrankiais, geriamo vandens rezervuaras. Kad nešviestų stipriai saulė ir lietus nesugadintų stovyklavimo ant stogo bus sumontuojas išskleidžiamas prieangis. Pagal pageidavimus ir papildomą apmokestinimą kelionėms pridėsime ekonomišką ir talpų šaldytuvą, šildymo įrangą, baidares, papildomas miegojimo vietas ant stogo, dviračių laikiklius.
Tempimo svoriui ir gabaritams užtenka B kategorijos vairuotojo pažymėjimo, kuro sąnaudos padidėja ne daugiau kaip 20%.

KAIP KITAIP GALI PRISIDĖTI:

Pilnai suprantame tavo apsisprendimą ir galimybes, bet jei tau patinka mini kemperių idėja, paprašysim tavo palaikymo. Pasidalink apie mus savo draugų rate, per socialinius tinklus. To nuoširdžiai pakaks, kad mini kemperių idėja keliautų iš lūpų į lūpas.

AČIŪ už jūsų palaikymą ir galimybę skleisti šią įdomią patirtį.

story:
‘Purisoo+’, the second version of Purisoo, is a premium-design portable water purification bottle with upgraded usability in terms of pumping and drinking. The upgraded version comes with Modular Filters that allow you to choose and combine the filters you want, and thereby purify contaminated water with greater efficiency. The Modular Filter can deal with various levels of water quality and environments all around the world, and thus ‘Purisoo+’ can provide you safe and drinkable water no matter where you are.

 

You don’t need to carry extra plastic bottles with you anymore. ‘Purisoo+’ is an all-in-one purifier bottle with pump and storage in which you can store the drinkable water. Just hit the road and travel light with ‘Purisoo+’!

 

‘Purisoo+’ has a much softer pump handle but it offers much stronger pumping! When you pump, the water rises up by pump pressure. Then it purifies contaminated water immediately through the filter. You can get 400ml of clean water with only about 40 rounds of pumping!

Drink water through the lid of adequate size that makes it easy to quench your thirst Furthermore, it is safe to carry thanks to the silicon lid that blocks leaking.

 

You don’t have to store contaminated water for getting clean water.
Only clean water is stored in the main compartment of ‘Purisoo+’!

 

You can purify water regardless of the depth and distance of water resources. Shallow water sources are no longer a problem. Simply open the bottom cap and place the unit in the water you want to purify!

Is the water source too far or too deep to access?
No worries! Your ‘Purisoo+’ comes with an extension hose.

 

‘Purisoo+’ is for everyone. This is not a personal purifier that purifies through sucking.
You can share clean and safe water with all your family and neighbors with just one unit of ‘Purisoo+’.

 

By utilizing the 7 (seven) types of modularized filters that come with ‘Purisoo+’, you can drink clean and safe water wherever you go. The optimized filters of ‘Purisoo+’ can deal with various levels of water quality all around the world.

 

 
 

 

‘Purisoo+’ comes with 7 types of Modular Filters.

Four (4) Types of Upper Filters: UF, ACF, ION, Ceramic

Three (3) Types of Lower Filters: ACF, ION, Ceramic

 

Depending on the combination of Modular Filters, a unit of ‘Purisoo+’ can remove 99.99% of bacteria and protozoa that cause waterborne diseases, or improve the taste of water and remove bad odor. Others can reduce lime-scale build-up. There are also filters that can raise the pH of drinking water to make alkaline water.

 

In case of an assembled filter, if one of the filter materials is blocked, you have to discard the whole filter even though the other materials can be still used.
With ‘Purisoo+’, you don’t need to do this anymore.

Only exchange the blocked filter for a new one!
You can save money and use it economically at the same time!

 

Which filter combination do you need?
Find out and combine the filters depending on your environment and the quality of water available to you.

 

We recommend the following filter combination for maximize filter efficiency.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are completely finished with the design, and we have produced prototypes with mock-up toolings. We have tested individual parts successfully, and we have confirmed every part can be produced economically. All of the off-the-shelf parts availability have been confirmed. We have identified the manufacturer that can produce at a reasonable cost. We just need to produce the toolings in order to mass-produce the units. We are confident that we will be able to ship on time if you back us with the target amount.

As for international shipping, it is not possible for us to be able to ascertain the duties and tariff policy of every nation in the world. Therefore, our price does not include the VAT or duties that may be charged by each country when crossing the border. We encourage you to research your country's tax and import regulations before pledging.

story:
Short Summary

Here at Skunk2 we always receive various requests for us to design certain parts for specific cars. In this case, a small group of people requested that we design an Ultra Race manifold for the H22A engine. The problem is that we are unsure of the actual demand for this part. We've made parts in the past based off of enthusiast feedback that ended up being complete busts and wasting precious time and resources that could have been directed to more fruitful ventures.

We decided to use Indiegogo as a platform in which we can gauge interest and use to guide our parts development. If hopeful enthusiasts are willing to put their money where their mouths are thus ensuring the product wont be a complete bust, we are willing to take the plunge and design the part.

So, whether we make an H22A Ultra Race Manifold is entirely up to you guys out there!


What We Need & What You Get

We need $15K to get this project going. Our actual development and tooling costs are much higher than this, but $15K tells us that the marketplace is serious.

Minimum contribution is $100 and maximum contribution is $500. Read over the 'Perks' section of the campaign to see what you get specifically.


The Impact

If you support this campaign, not only do you get the part you always dreamed of, but you also get to say you were a leader and instrumental in bringing the Ultra Race Manifold to the H22A community. Be a hero and make a difference!

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks to this campaign!
If we do not raise $15K, you contributions will be returned to you.
If we receive $15K in contributions, you will see the manifold completed in 4-6 months. Once we reach the $15K goal and the wheels are in motion, contributions are not refundable. However, when the manifolds are ready for sale, you can transfer your credit to someone else if you need to for whatever reason.

Also, to all the haters and morons out there....we've been in the Honda game for 20 years and aren't in the business of ripping people off. We are not some fly by night internet hero that can just disappear with peoples money. If we reach the fundraising goal, it WILL happen...no ifs ands or buts!

story:
And It Looks Like This

The brand new, completely stylish Horse on a Treadmill can koozie. Get one while they still exist. 



Short Summary

I'm the Horse on a Treadmill. I run on a treadmill for the sake of scientific research. The people in Lane Stadium go crazy when they see me on the jumbotron.

I'll just let the video remind you of my rockstar ability:


What We Need & What You Get

Quite simply, I need to be able to order these can koozies in large quantities so I can be exposed to more people, and everyone's can will be rocking with style. GOT IT? GOOD!

You can back the campaign and different levels, and this is what you will get:

  • For $1 you will get a thank you email. 
  • For $8 you will get one can koozie delivered to you in the mail.
  • For $14 you will get two can koozies (one for you and a friend) delivered to you in the mail.
  • For $24 you will get the family pack (four can koozies) delivered to you in the mail.
  • For $40 you will get the party pack (eight can koozies) delivered to you in the mail.

story:
This invention came from the frustration of poor quality/designed tent pegs. I needed something stronger than bendy pegs, easy to set so that can be pushed in with your foot thus eliminating the need for a heavy mallet to drive an overly long spike in the ground. It had to out hold any conventional peg in all ground types, and is primarily designed for the guy ropes which take most of the force in windy conditions.

It is made from aluminium and although over built still only weigh 26 grams each! The weight saving cutouts are structurally placed and not just asthetic additions. The cutout on the top 'shank' of the anchor also serves as a finger hold to retrieve back out of the ground. Round holes assist drainage in wet conditions so it doesn't trap water causing some pegs to slip out. Every curve, edge, angle and hole has been designed for a reason.

The Titan Ground Anchor was designed to be the most efficient shape to produce the most hold against line tension. This is achieved by diverting the pulling tension down to the tip of the submerged blade rather than the top of a standard tent peg. I have tested these in all conditions and tent sizes from 2 man- 8 man family tents. A nice extra feature is the ability to pair these anchors back to back to produce unrivalled holding power.

This new product is laser cut from 2.5mm aircraft grade aluminium and ase super strong. I believe it is the solution to an old widespread problem of substandard tent pegs ( I have had to buy and replace many failed pegs in my life ) This is a chance to be part of an entirely new product which I hope will one day be on the shelves of all major outdoor retailers. I am offering these Titan Ground Anchors at a competitive price.

 

Anodised red option

 

How it sits in the ground

 

 

Field testing on Dartmoor

 

 

 

As part of my kit
story_txt: This invention came from the frustration of poor quality/designed tent pegs. I needed something stronger than bendy pegs, easy to set so that can be pushed in with your foot thus eliminating the need for a heavy mallet to drive an overly long spike in the ground. It had to out hold any conventional peg in all ground types, and is primarily designed for the guy ropes which take most of the force in windy conditions.It is made from aluminium and although over built still only weigh 26 grams each! The weight saving cutouts are structurally placed and not just asthetic additions. The cutout on the top 'shank' of the anchor also serves as a finger hold to retrieve back out of the ground. Round holes assist drainage in wet conditions so it doesn't trap water causing some pegs to slip out. Every curve, edge, angle and hole has been designed for a reason.The Titan Ground Anchor was designed to be the most efficient shape to produce the most hold against line tension. This is achieved by diverting the pulling tension down to the tip of the submerged blade rather than the top of a standard tent peg. I have tested these in all conditions and tent sizes from 2 man- 8 man family tents. A nice extra feature is the ability to pair these anchors back to back to produce unrivalled holding power.This new product is laser cut from 2.5mm aircraft grade aluminium and ase super strong. I believe it is the solution to an old widespread problem of substandard tent pegs ( I have had to buy and replace many failed pegs in my life ) This is a chance to be part of an entirely new product which I hope will one day be on the shelves of all major outdoor retailers. I am offering these Titan Ground Anchors at a competitive price. Anodised red option How it sits in the ground  Field testing on Dartmoor   As part of my kit

story:
Néit is a revolutionary premium quality suitcase available in carry-on and check-in sizes. Néit's most amazing feature is its collapsibility, which reduces the case to just 3 inches, making it easy to store when not in use.  

Storing luggage takes up loads of space when you're not using it, especially when space is already tight. Néit’s unique (Patent Pending) collapsing mechanism saves you space and allows the case to reduce to ~30% of its original volume. Collapsing the case is simple, takes less than 10 seconds and can only be achieved when the case is unlocked and opened. Welcome to more efficient storage. Your space back for something more important.

Néit luggage collapses down to just 3 inches when not in use, which means it can be stored pretty much anywhere.

Don't have free space under your bed or couch? Why not hang it...

Our carabiner-style handle enables you to hang-store your luggage when not in use. No more rummaging around for your case when you can pull it straight of out of your closet. The carabiner-style handle also makes it easy to clip additional luggage/bags onto the case while you’re on the move.

What more can we say? Hard Case luggage offers by far superior protection. The case is made from lightweight, yet durable Polycarbonate and features aircraft grade aluminium frame for additional structural protection and our collapsing mechanism. The perfect combination to protect your belongings while on the road...no more broken fragrance bottles in your luggage.

Néit's distinctive design was inspired through nature. We loosely based our design pattern on an armadillo's shell; one of nature's strongest natural armours. This has created an alluring design, unparalleled in the luggage industry today.

YKK zippers are known around the world for their superior quality. All zippers (both internal & external) on Néit luggage are YKK's waterproof Aquaseal which are consistently used in top quality mountaineering equipment.

Let’s face it, 4 wheels beats 2. Take the strain out of walking with your luggage with our 4 revolving spinner wheels. When storing your case your wheels can be removed and/or placed into the base. This allows for a more efficient use of space - Packing multiple cases in your car becomes easier, as does storing your carry-on in an overhead locker. 

Why put GPS in your luggage? More than 1.5 Million bags were lost or stolen in the US alone in the past year. And let's face it, no-one likes to lose their luggage. Our GPS enabled product allows you to quickly locate your luggage anywhere in the world through our integrated travel app

Our unique IOS/Andriod app makes your travelling life easier. We provide you with all your essential travel information in one place. Through the Néit travel app you can locate your case with our GPS tracker, store your boarding pass, book additional flights and hotels, check the status of your flight, map your route from airport to hotel and find out location specific tips on things-to-do at your destination.

Over half of the world’s population live in cities and at Néit we are counted amongst them. We have spent a good proportion of our lives living in small city apartments that we try to keep as uncluttered as possible. However, as you know, that’s easier said than done. 

We consider ourselves to be global citizens who travel regularly. Upon arriving home from one particular adventure in South-East Asia, we realised how frustrating it was that our luggage took up so much of our precious and otherwise useable space in our apartments. The more we thought about it, the more we started to recognise that it wasn’t just luggage that hasn’t been adapted to modern day city-living.The Neit concept was born! 

Initially, we started small, with our slim and stylish iPhone CardCase. The Neit phone case reduces pocket bulk, protects your phone and enables you carry up to 2 important cards (e.g. contactless payment). The Neit phone case provided us with our early experience of sourcing, manufacturing, and logistics. 

We quickly migrated this experience to focus on the luggage problem. Luggage has seen little radical development in many years. We travel more regularly than ever before, yet our luggage and travel experience has remained largely unchanged. So, we set out to design a hard-shelled case that would complement our modern urban lifestyles from the moment we pull the case out of our closet all the way to putting it back in at the end of the trip; a head-turning companion while on the road and at our destination. Néit Luggage will add value to all aspects of your travel experience, before, during and after; your modern-day travel companion! 

In addition to our Checked and Carry-on luggage we’re also offering these awesome travel rewards: 


We’ve finalised our prototype and are ready to take our luggage to the next level. We’re working with D2M, a Uk based design and manufacturing consultancy with previous experience in collapsible products, to make sure the process runs as smoothly as possible. We have a manufacturer lined up with 5 alternatives, should we encounter any problems. We have source manufacturers for all additional products and have a global distribution company lined up to assist with the logistics, as well as contingencies should we encounter any issues. With your help we can bring this project to life and give you the world's first smart, collapsible and hangable hardcase luggage. 

Founder

Christian Cook has an MSc in Business Management from Imperial College London. Christian founded Néit in 2014 and launched their Super-slim Card Case for iPhone. Prior to starting Néit Christian worked in Financial Services.

CTO

Nicky Öster Jenk has been building tech products for the past 10 years. He has been involved in a variety of projects, most notably a video streaming platform that garnered 500,000 users in the first month. 

Product Design 

Design 2 Market Innovation (http://www.design2market.co.uk/) have over 100 combined years of experience in design and manufacturing advisory. They have previously worked with collapsible lifestyle products.

PR - PRmedianow, Kate Goodall 

Prototype - Pro2Pro 

Media - Unihillproductions, 3dimagingUK, Ben Stevens Photography, The Hospital Club

Special Thanks

Product Design - Centreline Design, Dom T & Burcin S

Media - Adela Popilkova, Kate Goodall, Laura Authier

Advisory - Mick Cook, Justin Jenk, Ben Wigoder, Toby Davies, Nick Deeming

story:
I'm on the Fence, Why Should I Send Chandler Parsons to Hawaii? And Who Are You?

I'm just a Houston Rockets fan who believes in a meritocracy, America, and a man named Chandler Parsons. 

This season, as a starting forward for the Houston Rockets, Chandler Parsons averages 15 points, 5 rebounds, and 3.5 assists per game. In one particularly memorable performance against Mark Cuban's Dallas Mavericks, Parsons sunk 32 points, hitting on his first 11 shots and finishing the game 12-13 from the field. Only one other NBA player this season has finished with at least 30 points on 90% shooting. That other player?

Lebron James.

Yet despite impressive game after game, Parsons is making less than a million dollars a year. And he's more or less locked into this contract for another two seasons. Grantland founder Bill Simmons called Parsons' contract one of the best bargains in the NBA. 

I ask, a bargain for who?

At a salary of $888,250 this year, Parsons barely takes home $10,000 a game. And that's before legal fees, agent fees, and taxes. At an average of 15 points/game - Chandler is earning roughly $666 a point. For a little helping of context: Kobe Bryant makes 27.8 million a year which averages out to about $339,000 a game. If Kobe made $666/point, he would need to average 509 points per game to match Parsons' efficiency. 

To make matters worse, mere weeks away from the playoffs, Chandler has been stricken with both a strained calf, food poisoning, and a crushing loss for his alma mater in the Elite 8 at the hands of Trey Burke and his Michigan Blue-ligans. This guy doesn't need to catch a break, he needs to catch the first flight out to Maui after the season ends! 

I whole-heartedly believe Parsons and his Rockets will go far in the playoff season. But, whether he goes for one last victory lap or all the way to championship glory, I think we can all agree Chandler deserves a little rest, relaxation, and hula. 

For the same price as an NBA jersey, a round of cold beers at your local sports pub, or nosebleed tickets to a Bobcats-Pistons game, you can help show Chandler Parsons your appreciation for an outstanding season. 

Donate if you think MVP stands for Most Valuable Parsons. 

So, What's Up with the $10,000?

Since he makes roughly $10,000 a game, we thought this extra "game" could be on us. Here's the cost estimate:

  • $3,000 for a first class (he's got long legs) round-trip ticket from Houston to Maui
  • $3,000 for a Deluxe Ocean View Room, $500/night x 6 nights
  • $1,500 for Food (he's 6'9", guy probably has a huge appetite)
  • $1,500 for Fun
  • $300 for Miscellaneous Expenses ;)
  • $700 for Indiegogo Processing Fee

This is a Fixed Goal Campaign, which means if we don't reach our goal, we don't get any of the donations, and Chandler Parsons doesn't get to go to Hawaii.

We are reaching out to Parsons's managment concurrent with this campaign to determine the best way to get him the funds. Meaning if, I mean when, we do reach our goal, we can get him on that first flight to Maui as soon as possible. 

How Will This Impact Chandler Parsons, and the World?

Honestly, we don't know. We can't really speak on behalf of Parsons, or the nearly 7 billion people living on this earth. What we can speak for is the many NBA fans who appreciate a good underdog story and are tired of all the inflated salaries going to too many mediocre players. 

I Want to Help Send Chandler Parsons to Hawaii, But I'm a Little Low on Funds Myself. 

Even if you can't contribute money, you can help contribute a little sweet, sweet social media currency to our campaign. Everyone can play an important role in giving Parsons a reason to say "Aloha" to the off-season.

Here's how you can help get the word out:

  • Use the hash tag #sendchandlerparsonstohawaii OR #scp2h to spread the word about our campaign
  • Make sure to use the amazing Indiegog share tools 
  • Write a biting letter to David Stern

story:
Erle-Spider is now available on our web store. 


Join the referrals program now!

  • english
  • español


We are thrilled to reveal Erle-Spider as the first legged drone powered by Snappy Ubuntu Core. A smart robot running  Linux and based totally on the Robot Operating System (ROS). This computer with legs is the result of our work over the last years and we are really excited to see what you can do with it.






Yes! A cloud-based marketplace for robots and drones available for you to start creating the next game changer app for robots. Developing apps is free, no silly developer licenses, just a simple account. Do you feel like you want to learn more? Check out our store intro here.


















Erle-Spider includes the latest version of our artificial brains (not released yet) for robots and drones: Erle-Brain 2.

  • 900MHz quad-core ARM Cortex-A7, 1 GB RAM
  • USB, Ethernet, I2C, UART, HDMI and more.
  • Gravity sensor, gyroscope, digital compass, pressure sensor and temperature sensor.
  • Snappy Ubuntu Core
  • ROS Indigo
Erle-Brain 2 will have support for ROS, APM and several other frameworks for robot and drone applications development.


Our kits come with comprehensive instructions and a step-by-step walkthrough on how to create your first drone app for Erle-Spider. You don't need to have a PhD in robotics or a masters in mechanical engineering to build this robot. We've made it really simple so that the only requirements are some patience and some love for robotics.




What are the mechanical dimensions of Erle-Spider? And the weight? 

Dimensions: 34x24x15 cm. Weight: 2.1 kg.

Can I use the assembled Spider straight out of the box? 

Yes, the assembled version is thought to be used out of the box.

Can you guarantee Xmas delivery for the December orders?

Yes we can! Our team has been working really hard to get everything ready in time for this December.

Which ROS distro will Erle-Spider include?

Indigo.

What is the controller? Can I use my phone?

We've put together a simple wireless controller gamepad for you to interact easily with Erle-Spider. If the Android app stretch goal is reached we'll release an Android smartphone app to do the same.

What skills do I need to complete a DIY kit?

Some interest in robotics and a bit of patience. 

I don't know how to program, how can I create behaviors with Erle-Spider?

We've done a lot of thinking about this matter and decided to provide support for Scratch if the corresponding stretch goal is met. With it, everyone will be able to create programs for our robot with simple blocks without laying a single line of code. Furthermore this will help shaping your mind to later learn about other ways of programming robots.

Why are you crowdfunding?

In order to make Erle-Spider affordable we need to produce big quantities.

Are you going to open Erle-Spider designs?

Yes we are, sources, components and designs will be opened under a GPLv3 license (unless specified or enforced by others).

Are you planning to move to ROS 2?

Yes we are. There'll be ROS 2 packages for those that dare to try it out. Once ROS 2 becomes stable, our official releases will be based on ROS 2.

I want to create a robot app, will you help me with that?

Unfortunately we won't be able to help every single individual with their applications however our forum (http://forum.erlerobotics.com) will be open to questions and our engineers generally answer as many as they can.

I want to make money with my robot application, can I charge for it?

Definitely! Robot apps start at 3$ but compared to smartphone apps, we wouldn't be surprised is behaviors above 50-100 $ appear soon.

Can Erle-Spider run computer vision algorithms onboard?

Absolutely! 4 ARM cores running at 900 MHz have room for a lot. Help us spread the word about Erle-Spider and you might get your Spider with a camera included ($150K stretch goal).

Can i put a custom Linux kernel or another file system?

Yes you can but note that we will only offer support for our Snappy images.

Spiders have 8 legs, why yours has 6?

Because ours can do more with less :)

In the video you showed Erle-Brain but the campaign offers Erle-Brain 2. Why is this?

We have decided to offer our latest brain to deliver an even greater experience. The new brain includes an upgrade on processing power, size (it's smaller) and sensing. What's better, since we'll be delivering big quantities, we've made it super affordable.

What is your refund policy?

During the campaign, you may get a refund for your perk via Indiegogo. Please contact support@indiegogo.com directly.

What has your team done in the field of robotics or drones?

We are part of Erle Robotics, a startup based in Spain creating artificial brains for robots and drones with ROS at its core. Over the last year or so, our team has a been selected twice as one of the most promising robotics startups worldwide, ranked in the top 8 of European tech startups and created the first flying robot powered by Snappy Ubuntu Core. We have a  strong technical background and experience in research centers and robotic startups around the world.

During the campaign, you may get a refund for your perk via Indiegogo. Please contact support@indiegogo.com directly.
What has your team done in the field of robotics or drones?
We are part of Erle Robotics, a startup based in Spain creating artificial brains for robots and drones with ROS at its core. Over the last year or so, our team has a been selected twice as one of the most promising robotics startups worldwide, ranked in the top 8 of European tech startups and created the first flying robot powered by Snappy Ubuntu Core. We have a  strong technical background and experience in research centers and robotic startups around the world.

story:
My Not So Short Summary:

I have spent the vast majority of my adult life jumping on and off planes, running in and out of meetings, and frequenting coffee shops and restaurants across the country. Inevitably Mother Nature calls and I found that in an alarming number of bathrooms the hook meant to be in the stall was missing. Either it was broken off, or completely missing with just the faint outline of where it had once been remaining. Which left me juggling a bag and a jacket.  

I had seen portable table hooks for purses so I knew that there must be something similar for the bathroom. If a woman isn’t willing to put her purse down on the restaurant floor there was zero way she was putting it on the bathroom floor. I looked for a solution on line and to my utter amazement there were thousands, and I mean thousands of purse hooks for table tops, but nothing for the bathroom. It blew my mind there wasn’t one. Determined to solve at least my problem I sat down that night and drew out the initial concepts for what would become The Loo Hook. And that is as far as I got for maybe a year. An idea, but no practical way of making it happen, until I learned by chance an old friend had opened a shop in which he made carbon fiber parts. I called up my old friend and he in his enthusiastic and friendly way said he would absolutely help me.  After a few ... like 10...  variations of the hook we came up with one that I liked. The prototype came out great. It was strong, but light, and it easily fit in a jacket pocket or a bag, but it cost almost 20.00 to make because of the high cost of carbon fiber material.

Undeterred I started on Kickstarter, and too my disappointment failed to get funding. The biggest feedback was that the idea was great, but the cost of 45.00 was just too high.  I was at first dejected, but soon began to search for high grade plastics that would give the same high-end strength and portability, but at a fraction of the cost of carbon fiber. I discovered polycarbonate. I was ecstatic. Polycarbonate would allow us to create a hook that weighs less than 3oz, that would still hold up to 55lbs, and unlike carbon fiber would allow us to make the hook in any color. I quickly commission a single chamber mold and we had our first run of hooks.

I want to keep growing this product, but I need help. In order to get our product into the big box stores we need to get our per piece manufacturing costs down 100%. The only way to do this is by creating a multi chamber mold, which is not cheap, so I decided to try again to harness the power of crowdfunding by moving my campaign here to Indiegogo!

What We Need :

More people using The Loo Hook. I have discovered... there are two types of people; people who always wanted a product like the Loo Hook and had no idea it existed and stumbled into it online and happily bought it and everyone else who would never think to look for it online. I am convinced that once it is in the big box stores and everyone else is exposed to the idea of the product that the upside of having their very own personal portable hook will become apparent, and that a fair amount will discover they need and want one too.

The Impact:

What your support will do? Help me take this product from a few online stores to a full scale product nationally and internationally.

Risks & Challenges:

There are few to none. We are currently manufacturing, shipping and running a functional online business. We just need funding to increase our capacity and allow for a larger color pallet

What your support will do? Help me take this product from a few online stores to a full scale product nationally and internationally.

Other Ways You Can Help:

Don't think The Loo Hook is a good idea? Don't see the point? I get it... but I bet you know someone who would love one! Really love it! So pass the word onto others and help that way. 

Want to support on a bigger scale? Buy a bunch and put them in your stores!

story:
10% of funds raised will be reinvested into other Indiegogo design projects!

 

Inspired by family fishing trips and vacations to the beach, this fishhook bottle opener redefines a tool that is often overlooked. Sometimes the most common of household items need refreshing; we hope melding design and function into our unique bottle opener does that.

Designed on a whim, this opener became an instant hit within our community and after many requests, we are now excited to share it with you! The opener is a perfect gift for any fisherman or someone simply wanting to bring memories of the shore home with them.

With the design already patented, the goal of the project is to help fund: 1) a production run, 2) packaging design, and 3) trademarking fees.


This opener is our first venture into producing one of our custom designs.

Is it novelty? Yes. Is it intriguing? We hope so. Is it functional? Absolutely.

The first in a series, we hope you join us and enjoy the bottle opener.

Hook a cold one.

story:
Monowalker Fatmate – the hiking cart that carries your outdoor gear!

Performance that rocks

When developing the Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer, we had one goal in mind - to be self-sufficient, far away from civilization, with equipment and food for days on foot, and to get along comfortably despite the heavy weight of the equipment and difficult terrain. The Monowalker Fatmate is not only made to hike in alpine terrain, but as well suitable for expeditions in the tundra, desert, or the Scandinavian Fjell without paths. But here it shows its real strengths. With the Fatmate, it does not matter if there is a path, if snowfields obstruct the way or the ground is muddy. With the 4 "(10 cm) wide Fattire tires (20”) you can move reliably over any terrain. The width of the tire prevents the trailer from sinking, even with heavy luggage and loose ground.

Technology that reduces your gear weight

Thanks to the special geometry of the Monowalker Fatmate, you will carry only half of your gear weight on your hips without sacrificing comfort or supply. The other half of the gear weight is on the rear wheel. With this advantage, any hike becomes a pleasure. By using the Fatmate rack, you can reduce the gear weight on your body by 70%.

Monowalker Fatmate without rack.

Monowalker Fatmate with rack.

Downhill and uphill hikes with the Monowalker cause less stress on your knees because you only carry half of your gear's weight; 45 kg (100lbs) equipment load is the comfort area for trained hikers. One-sided loads on the shoulder, neck or back muscles, such as those that can occur while wearing a very heavy backpack, are eliminated, even when carrying 40kg (88lbs) of gear or more with the Monowalker Fatmate. Thanks to the free-swinging suspension of the trailer on the Monowalker hip belt, the fully loaded MONOWALKER Fatmate will not affect your movement.

The Monowalker Fatmate is made for your hiking adventure!

For years now, the Monowalker has been used by our customers around the world - all of them on very different and often long outdoor adventures like Sandor Lau , https://www.sandorsoregontrail.com/ walking the Oregon Trail in the footsteps of the pioneers and the native people who came long before. In the documentation of “Sándor’s Oregon Trail” writer and filmmaker Sándor Lau walks from Missouri to Oregon in the footsteps of the pioneers and the moccasins of native people.

Prepper, product tester and trailblazer Canadian Prepper is one of the persons, I have to say thank you for awesome reviews on youtube. He was pushing the Monowalker Fatmate from the beginning. https://www.canadianpreparedness.com/

An early tester in the field was Mark Wood . Mark is an established polar explorer and adventurer who operates within the extremes of our planet. Accompanied by our Monowalker Fatmate, he has crossed Iceland from north to south in 20 days, carrying all his food and gear, a total of 110 pounds. http://markwoodexplorer.com/

Lucy Barnard, Australian in pursuit of becoming the first woman to walk the length of the Earth (the two american continents). https://tanglesandtail.com/ It bugged her that in the 35 years since it was first completed, no women had achieved the same feat… so she began to plan. Officially, three men have walked from Argentina to Alaska, and approximately 10 have walked variations but…only one (the first) has walked from the polar most extreme cities Three years on, she has walked the length of Argentina, Chile, Peru and Ecuador. Some say it’s an impossible dream – but she did it up to Ecuador, when the Corona crisis stopped her. The way she see it is that if he can, she can too. By using the Monowalker Fatmate, she was able to cross Chile and the Atacama Desert unsupported.

I am happy to see that long distance hiker Angela Maxwell, who crossed Australia,Vietnam,Mongolia, Georgia and Turkey with a two wheel bicycle trailer, converted to a hiking trailer switched to a Monowalker. Her travelblog is: http://www.shewalkstheearth.com/ Find out about her passion to walk and her motivation to carry all of her gear in a cart.

50,000 kilometers hitchhiking, across the oceans by ship and later on with a fresh born child in Mexico. "Weit. The story of a way around the world" is a colorful and particularly authentic movie about the extraordinary journey of a young couple who set off for the East, only to return home from the West three and a half years later in a threesome. Without flying and with a small budget in their pockets, they explore the world, always accompanied by curiosity and spontaneity. Coming back to Europe (Spain) they hiked back with the help of a Monowalker Fatmate, back to Germany.

The Monowalker is made for...

Hikers -who appreciate adventures in nature and don’t want to hike with heavy weight on their shoulders

Photographers & Documentary Filmmakers -who want to carry heavy gear and outdoor equipment

Hunters -who need to pull animals out of the woods

Bushwalkers -who want to do long distance walks, carrying water and food for many days without access to civilization for periods of time

Parents -who want to camp with their children but have too much to carry for 2-4 people.

Youth group leaders -who need to carry personal items plus group equipment

Disaster Control personnel -who need to carry heavy equipment on trails where vehicles are of no practical use

Worldtravelers -who like to carry gear for a year with more comfort

What is new

The new Monowalker is made of high strength aluminum tubes, drawn by a German tube maker. The newly designed handlebar unit is seamlessly adjustable in its height and width to fit various hip sizes and body heights. In just a few simple steps, you can transform the Monowalker to fit your body height and type.

Monowalker Harness

The Monowalker harness is made for pulling the Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer and is available in two sizes.( Size S up to 88 cm (35”) / Size M up to 105 cm (41”) – size L starting at 105 cm (41”) ) You will find at the hipbelt three loops to fix the carabiner at a position that fits with your hip size. A fourth loop is made for pulling a two-wheel cart or a pulk. The new Monowalker harness has a fail proof magnetic fit to secure and release hikers from the trailer intuitively. It can only be opened in one direction by pulling on the flaps in an upward opposing direction, and in case of emergency the Fidlock buckle can be opened by pulling the emergency latch and will release the trailer within one second, even under a heavy load. A third buckle at the hipbelt frontside has as well panic release features. All can be opened within a second as well with tensile load in case of an emergency. Adjustable in the length, the shoulderbelts will fit any person. Those are attached with a magnetic-mechanical closure at the hipbelt and can be attached and detached within a second from the hipbelt. With help of the harness you may convert the hiking trailer as well to a packframe.

Packframe

Whether you have to fly to your destination or go to places not easily accessible by foot, the light-weight aluminum frame transforms in combination with the harness into a backpack frame and the wheel and handlebar unit will fit inside the duffle bag that can be ordered along with the Fatmate.

The rack

Are you planning on carrying extra heavy or bulky gear like water, food, camera equipment, bulky tents or even dog food for your furry friends? We have designed a Monowalker rack for this exact scenario. The Monowalker Fattire rack is an add-on rack with a payload of 30 kg or 66lb, designed for larger duffles with more volume than a bicycle sadlebag. Though it will fit regular bicycle saddlebags as well. The gear that is positioned on the rack, will be carried by 100% on top of the wheel axle and as a result it will reduce the weight on your hip belt by 70%.

The wheel

The 20” wheel will be build-up with the very light Alex Blizzerk 90 fattire rim and a hub with sealed SKF MTRX bearings. The MTRX bearings: the new standard in bearing technology

The Monowalker will run on the best available ball-bearing technology. The special features of these new ball-bearings: A polymer material is molded into the free space of the bearing, forming a narrow gap around the rolling elements and raceways, enabling the bearing to rotate freely. The polymer matrix has a porous structure, with millions of micro-pores, that hold the lubricating oil retained by surface tension. In operation, oil is released from the material into the narrow gaps between it and the bearing components, thus providing effective minimum quantity lubrication. Bearings filled with Oil are lubricated for the life of the bearing and contain two to four times more oil than bearings using a conventional grease fill. Solid Oil cannot be washed out and virtually fills all the free space, thus limiting the amount of dirt and contamination that can enter the bearing. The polymer filling physically supports integral seals, reinforcing their effectiveness under wash-down conditions

  • No lubricant washout
  • Solid Oil remains in the bearing
  • Lower risk of corrosion
  • Solid Oil protects the bearing components
  • Increased lubricant reservoir
  • The polymer matrix contains two to four times more oil than conventional grease fill
  • Longer lubricant life
  • MTRX bearings are lubricated for life
  • Protection against ingress of contaminants
  • Efficient seals prevent dirt from entering the bearing
  • Low environmental impact
  • With MTRX there is no lubricant leakage

Packsize & Content of delivery

The Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer will be shipped in parts pre-assembled as shown in the picture. Don`t worry, a detailed assembly instruction is included in delivery and the brake cable is already assembled. Disassembled and packed the cart fits as well in a packraft or kayak, a bush airplane or stored in your truck in a travelbag. Length of the packed frame: 80cm (32”) Packsize of the wheel: 59 x 59cm ( 23x23”) , weight of the trailer : 9,8 kg (21lbs) , weight of the harness 1 kg (2,2lbs) Content of delivery: pre - assembled hiking trailer as shown below, with 3 sets of packbelts & harness (available in three sizes S-M-L)

The rewards

Please note for purchase tax and import information please look at the FAQ 1-3!

 Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer - Receive one Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer with the Monowalker harness ( includes the packframe option) and the 20" x4" fattire wheel with disc brake. (with packbelts) 

Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer - Receive one Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer with rack with the Monowalker harness ( includes the packframe option) and the 20" x4" fattire wheel with disc brake. (with packbelts)

Thank you - If you simply want to help our cause then choose this reward.You are really helping us to achieve our goals and we can`t thank you enough ! Please share our project and help us spread the word ! We will thank you with a T-shirt with Monowalker logo.

Choose your add ons

The Monowalker travelbag has a roll-up closure and is unique at this volume on the market. It will be closed first at the topside with velcro and then rolled. Inside and outside belts will compress your gear. All seams of the bag are high frequency welded and 100% waterproof The bag roll up closure will be sealed in a first step with velcro and then the roll clusure will be wrapped. The Monowalker travelbag can be packed tight with 140 l volume or up to 170 l. The bag has a wide opened mouth to fill the bag very comfortable with your camp gear. Due to this wide open space, you can easily carry as well cut meat from your hunt in this bag. L 90cm x 50 cm( 35”x19”)

Proudly engineered and manufactured in Germany

As hiker and adventurer with a love for the outdoors, I spend countless days, weeks and even months traversing different landscapes and countries. My company is run out of a small town located in the south of Germany, near Freiburg, right at the bottom of the mountains of the Black Forest. I feel fortunate to be able to call this place my home because the outdoors are my backyard, and I love to take advantage of it whenever I can. As mechanic and former product manager in the bike industry I` m passionate about anything that has two wheels that can carry me and my stuff. Working several years as Product Manager in the bicycle industry, I have the skills to realize larger productions. In the past years, I assembled the Monowalker Fatmate from my workshop in the old trainstation, named “Kingdom of Heaven”.

The specifications – selected parts for your adventure:

frame EN-AW 6061 aluminum tubes, laser cut and welded with CNC machined parts, anodized black engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany & the Netherlands
plattform crosstubes EN-AW 6061 aluminum u-profile, laser cut, anodized black engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany
handles EN-AW 6061 aluminum tubes, laser cut, anodized black engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany
rack EN-AW 6061 aluminum tubes, laser cut and welded, anodized black engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany
brake lever Microshift barend shifter BS-SR-M12 made in Taiwan
disc brake & rotor Bengal MB 700T mechanical discbrake, 6-bolt rotor 180mm, made in Taiwan
brake cable & housing and cable splitter Jagwire - KEB cable housing and stainless steel brake cable Cable splitter can devide the brake cable tool-free made in Taiwan
hub Fattire hub,for 6-bolt disc brake rotor black anodized, O.D. 135mm, 32 holes upgraded with sealed SKF MRTX ball bearings made in Taiwan
rim Alex rim Blizzerk 90 (406-84 /20"), anodized black made in Taiwan
spokes stainless steel, black, brass nipples made in Taiwan
Tire & inner tube Veerubber Mission Command 406-100/ 20"x4" with Kevlar protection belt inner tube with car valve made in Thailand
harness Padded hipbelt and shoulder belts, adjustable shoulder belts.Available in size S-M-L designed in Germany, manufactured in Italy

What is the money for ?

As you can see, we have equipped the Monowalker Fatmate with new features and even more durable technology. We're asking for your support in this campaign to get our production started. Your support will allow us  to purchase aircraft aluminum tubes, welding jigs, as well as other  brand new parts. Your pledge will help us to get the   production of the Monowalker started , and allow  us to finally  offer  this amazing, polished version of a tried and tested product to  you  and other outdoor enthusiasts ,to those that simply want a smarter way to carry their gear on their outdoor mission.

Evolution of the Monowalker

2016

Monowalker hiking cart made of birch plywood with handles of steamed ash wood

    
   

2016

 

2017 & 2018

Monowalker Fatmate -made of aluminum square tubes

    
   

2017 & 2018

Creation of the Monowalker travel bag with roll-up closure

Time schedule of the Monowalker production 2020

2019

Development Monowalker Fatmate modelyear 2020

    
   

2019

Requirements- adjustable handlebar in it`s width and height. Integrated rack design for duffles and side panniers

2019

Research and selection of manufacturer in the European Union

    
   

2019

Production will take place in the Netherlands, Germany, Italy

Spring 2020

Creation of a businessplan and cash budget, based on the quotes of selected manufacturer

    
   

Spring 2020

Review by a management consultant

June 2020

Creation of the Crowdfunding movie

    
   

June 2020

Indiegogo launch

July 2020

Production-go to manufacturer

    
   

September 2020

Pre-assembly Monowalke Fatmate

End of September 2020

Shipment by DHL worldwide

    

The price…

… hmm … a spoonful of sugar first: people have many modes of escape to their personal freedom, and all sorts of kit to facilitate adventure and exploration- none of it is cheap. To take just one comparison, if your mode of escape is a mountain bike, you might pay 1000 – 2000 – 5000 USD. A quality rucksack might set you back 150-450 USD. A Kayak will give you freedom and relief on water, but for 1500 USD or more. Here’s the medicine: by the laws of physics all the dynamic stresses of a rucksack load, in addition to your own body mass, go through your shoulders, neck, back, hips, knees, etc.For me as creator of the Monowalker Fatmate, those stresses result in intolerable, preclusive pain in my shoulders and neck. In this context, and taking into account the sheer quality of this all-terrain-marvel, the 1199,00 Euro price tag (incl. German sales tax for customers from the EU) respective 1007,00 €(price ex EU, e.g. USA, Canada or Switzerland) price tag of the Monowalker might seem really very reasonable. What are your knees and shoulders worth and experiences in the great outdoors ? Consider it is an investment in your future freedom … or, as the price to pay for a new lease of LIFE!”
 

Join our community

If you would like to learn more about us, please visit our website. Follow the pictures and stories of Monowalker Design on Facebook or Instagram and become a part of our community.

Contact information

Kai Fuchs Monowalker Design, info@monowalker.com

The new Monowalker is made of high strength aluminum tubes, drawn by a German tube maker. The newly designed handlebar unit is seamlessly adjustable in its height and width to fit various hip sizes and body heights. In just a few simple steps, you can transform the Monowalker to fit your body height and type.
Monowalker Harness
The Monowalker harness is made for pulling the Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer and is available in two sizes.( Size S up to 88 cm (35”) / Size M up to 105 cm (41”) – size L starting at 105 cm (41”) ) You will find at the hipbelt three loops to fix the carabiner at a position that fits with your hip size. A fourth loop is made for pulling a two-wheel cart or a pulk. The new Monowalker harness has a fail proof magnetic fit to secure and release hikers from the trailer intuitively. It can only be opened in one direction by pulling on the flaps in an upward opposing direction, and in case of emergency the Fidlock buckle can be opened by pulling the emergency latch and will release the trailer within one second, even under a heavy load. A third buckle at the hipbelt frontside has as well panic release features. All can be opened within a second as well with tensile load in case of an emergency. Adjustable in the length, the shoulderbelts will fit any person. Those are attached with a magnetic-mechanical closure at the hipbelt and can be attached and detached within a second from the hipbelt. With help of the harness you may convert the hiking trailer as well to a packframe.
Packframe
Whether you have to fly to your destination or go to places not easily accessible by foot, the light-weight aluminum frame transforms in combination with the harness into a backpack frame and the wheel and handlebar unit will fit inside the duffle bag that can be ordered along with the Fatmate.
The rack
Are you planning on carrying extra heavy or bulky gear like water, food, camera equipment, bulky tents or even dog food for your furry friends? We have designed a Monowalker rack for this exact scenario. The Monowalker Fattire rack is an add-on rack with a payload of 30 kg or 66lb, designed for larger duffles with more volume than a bicycle sadlebag. Though it will fit regular bicycle saddlebags as well. The gear that is positioned on the rack, will be carried by 100% on top of the wheel axle and as a result it will reduce the weight on your hip belt by 70%.
The wheel
The 20” wheel will be build-up with the very light Alex Blizzerk 90 fattire rim and a hub with sealed SKF MTRX bearings. The MTRX bearings: the new standard in bearing technology

The Monowalker will run on the best available ball-bearing technology. The special features of these new ball-bearings: A polymer material is molded into the free space of the bearing, forming a narrow gap around the rolling elements and raceways, enabling the bearing to rotate freely. The polymer matrix has a porous structure, with millions of micro-pores, that hold the lubricating oil retained by surface tension. In operation, oil is released from the material into the narrow gaps between it and the bearing components, thus providing effective minimum quantity lubrication. Bearings filled with Oil are lubricated for the life of the bearing and contain two to four times more oil than bearings using a conventional grease fill. Solid Oil cannot be washed out and virtually fills all the free space, thus limiting the amount of dirt and contamination that can enter the bearing. The polymer filling physically supports integral seals, reinforcing their effectiveness under wash-down conditions

No lubricant washout
Solid Oil remains in the bearing


Lower risk of corrosion
Solid Oil protects the bearing components


Increased lubricant reservoir
The polymer matrix contains two to four times more oil than conventional grease fill


Longer lubricant life
MTRX bearings are lubricated for life


Protection against ingress of contaminants
Efficient seals prevent dirt from entering the bearing


Low environmental impact
With MTRX there is no lubricant leakage
Packsize & Content of delivery
The Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer will be shipped in parts pre-assembled as shown in the picture. Don`t worry, a detailed assembly instruction is included in delivery and the brake cable is already assembled. Disassembled and packed the cart fits as well in a packraft or kayak, a bush airplane or stored in your truck in a travelbag. Length of the packed frame: 80cm (32”) Packsize of the wheel: 59 x 59cm ( 23x23”) , weight of the trailer : 9,8 kg (21lbs) , weight of the harness 1 kg (2,2lbs) Content of delivery: pre - assembled hiking trailer as shown below, with 3 sets of packbelts & harness (available in three sizes S-M-L)
The rewards

Please note for purchase tax and import information please look at the FAQ 1-3!
 Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer - Receive one Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer with the Monowalker harness ( includes the packframe option) and the 20" x4" fattire wheel with disc brake. (with packbelts) 


Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer - Receive one Monowalker Fatmate hiking trailer with rack with the Monowalker harness ( includes the packframe option) and the 20" x4" fattire wheel with disc brake. (with packbelts)

Thank you - If you simply want to help our cause then choose this reward.You are really helping us to achieve our goals and we can`t thank you enough ! Please share our project and help us spread the word ! We will thank you with a T-shirt with Monowalker logo.



Choose your add ons
The Monowalker travelbag has a roll-up closure and is unique at this volume on the market. It will be closed first at the topside with velcro and then rolled. Inside and outside belts will compress your gear. All seams of the bag are high frequency welded and 100% waterproof The bag roll up closure will be sealed in a first step with velcro and then the roll clusure will be wrapped. The Monowalker travelbag can be packed tight with 140 l volume or up to 170 l. The bag has a wide opened mouth to fill the bag very comfortable with your camp gear. Due to this wide open space, you can easily carry as well cut meat from your hunt in this bag. L 90cm x 50 cm( 35”x19”)





Proudly engineered and manufactured in Germany
As hiker and adventurer with a love for the outdoors, I spend countless days, weeks and even months traversing different landscapes and countries. My company is run out of a small town located in the south of Germany, near Freiburg, right at the bottom of the mountains of the Black Forest. I feel fortunate to be able to call this place my home because the outdoors are my backyard, and I love to take advantage of it whenever I can. As mechanic and former product manager in the bike industry I` m passionate about anything that has two wheels that can carry me and my stuff. Working several years as Product Manager in the bicycle industry, I have the skills to realize larger productions. In the past years, I assembled the Monowalker Fatmate from my workshop in the old trainstation, named “Kingdom of Heaven”.
The specifications – selected parts for your adventure:


frame
EN-AW 6061 aluminum tubes, laser cut and welded with CNC machined parts, anodized black
engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany & the Netherlands


plattform crosstubes
EN-AW 6061 aluminum u-profile, laser cut, anodized black
engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany


handles
EN-AW 6061 aluminum tubes, laser cut, anodized black
engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany


rack
EN-AW 6061 aluminum tubes, laser cut and welded, anodized black
engineered in Germany, manufactured in Germany




brake lever
Microshift barend shifter BS-SR-M12
made in Taiwan


disc brake & rotor
Bengal MB 700T mechanical discbrake, 6-bolt rotor 180mm,
made in Taiwan


brake cable & housing and cable splitter
Jagwire - KEB cable housing and stainless steel brake cable Cable splitter can devide the brake cable tool-free
made in Taiwan




hub
Fattire hub,for 6-bolt disc brake rotor black anodized, O.D. 135mm, 32 holes upgraded with sealed SKF MRTX ball bearings
made in Taiwan


rim
Alex rim Blizzerk 90 (406-84 /20"), anodized black
made in Taiwan


spokes
stainless steel, black, brass nipples
made in Taiwan


Tire & inner tube
Veerubber Mission Command 406-100/ 20"x4" with Kevlar protection belt inner tube with car valve
made in Thailand



harness
Padded hipbelt and shoulder belts, adjustable shoulder belts.Available in size S-M-L
designed in Germany, manufactured in Italy
What is the money for ?
As you can see, we have equipped the Monowalker Fatmate with new features and even more durable technology. We're asking for your support in this campaign to get our production started. Your support will allow us  to purchase aircraft aluminum tubes, welding jigs, as well as other  brand new parts. Your pledge will help us to get the   production of the Monowalker started , and allow  us to finally  offer  this amazing, polished version of a tried and tested product to  you  and other outdoor enthusiasts ,to those that simply want a smarter way to carry their gear on their outdoor mission.Evolution of the Monowalker



2016

Monowalker hiking cart made of birch plywood with handles of steamed ash wood


 
 


 
 

2016

 





2017 & 2018

Monowalker Fatmate -made of aluminum square tubes


 
 


 
 

2017 & 2018

Creation of the Monowalker travel bag with roll-up closure




Time schedule of the Monowalker production 2020



2019

Development Monowalker Fatmate modelyear 2020


 
 


 
 

2019

Requirements- adjustable handlebar in it`s width and height. Integrated rack design for duffles and side panniers





2019
Research and selection of manufacturer in the European Union

 
 


 
 

2019
Production will take place in the Netherlands, Germany, Italy




Spring 2020
Creation of a businessplan and cash budget, based on the quotes of selected manufacturer

 
 


 
 

Spring 2020
Review by a management consultant




June 2020
Creation of the Crowdfunding movie

 
 


 
 

June 2020
Indiegogo launch




July 2020
Production-go to manufacturer

 
 


 
 

September 2020
Pre-assembly Monowalke Fatmate




End of September 2020
Shipment by DHL worldwide

 
 


The price…
… hmm … a spoonful of sugar first: people have many modes of escape to their personal freedom, and all sorts of kit to facilitate adventure and exploration- none of it is cheap. To take just one comparison, if your mode of escape is a mountain bike, you might pay 1000 – 2000 – 5000 USD. A quality rucksack might set you back 150-450 USD. A Kayak will give you freedom and relief on water, but for 1500 USD or more. Here’s the medicine: by the laws of physics all the dynamic stresses of a rucksack load, in addition to your own body mass, go through your shoulders, neck, back, hips, knees, etc.For me as creator of the Monowalker Fatmate, those stresses result in intolerable, preclusive pain in my shoulders and neck. In this context, and taking into account the sheer quality of this all-terrain-marvel, the 1199,00 Euro price tag (incl. German sales tax for customers from the EU) respective 1007,00 €(price ex EU, e.g. USA, Canada or Switzerland) price tag of the Monowalker might seem really very reasonable. What are your knees and shoulders worth and experiences in the great outdoors ? Consider it is an investment in your future freedom … or, as the price to pay for a new lease of LIFE!” Join our community
If you would like to learn more about us, please visit our website. Follow the pictures and stories of Monowalker Design on Facebook  or  Instagram and become a part of our community.
Contact information
Kai Fuchs Monowalker Design, info@monowalker.com

story:
RADACAT is designed for locating your loved ones and keeping them safe. No matter where you are in the world. No cell service or Wi-Fi needed and there are no monthly fees.

  • Real-time Tracking
  • SOS
  • Geo-Fence Alerts
  • Off-line Maps
  • Off-line Texting

 

The GPS Messenger 2 & the Mini Tracker are 2nd generation devices by RADACAT Technology. With improved reliability, increased range, built-in GPS module, new app interface, and compatible with the 1st generation of products.

True GPS and LoRa technologies allow you to create your own private network or join The Radacat Public Mesh Network with other Radacat users in your area.  Since no cellular or GPS services required, RADACAT is the most affordable tracker in the market. 

Download HD maps for off-grid adventures. Then locate, share a location or set a meeting point with your group.

 

Send text messages to your friends and other Radacat users in your area. Create private groups and get a confirmation when a message is delivered. 

The Radacat Mini GPS Tracker is ideal for pets. It’s sleek, compact and lightweight. Attach it to your dog’s collar, backpack, luggage, camera bag or around someone’s wrist. It’s tiny, with extreme 6 miles long-range capability and SOS function.

 

Superpowered Lost & Found Ability

Unlike some short-range Bluetooth trackers, the Radacat mini tracker has built-in GPS and long-range radio communication systems. You and other users can find it miles away.  

Get help faster by sending an SOS signal to your team members or other RADACAT users nearby. Help requests will be broadcast with your exact location and the RADACAT will help them navigate them to you faster.

 

Radacat can be used anywhere in the world. Locate and text for free and reduce roaming fees when traveling internationally.

 

All communications are encrypted using secure 128-bit AES via an embedded hardware coprocessor. Text and share your location with confidence knowing you are protected.  

 

Turning the Relay Mode on your RADACAT can help increase the max range for you and other RADACAT users in your area by acting as a relay station.. You can place additional RADACATS in strategic locations to act as antennas for your own private network and extend your range up to 42 miles.  

 

 

 

 

 

People asked, and we listened! Our amazing customers loved our first product, the Radacat GPS Messenger, the best GPS Tracking and Off-grid communication device on Amazon!! They loved the build quality, ease of use and all the safety features.

With improved reliability, increased range, built-in GPS module, and new app interface, we are excited to bring the Radacat GPS Messenger 2 and the Mini Tracker to our loyal customers and the Indiegogo community.

We are thankful for your support and excited to have you along for this journey!

 

 

 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Click on one of the buttons below and tag your family, friends, or coworkers who need this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

     

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see the reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship starting in March 2020 We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.
