story:
მოვიზიდოთ ალტერნატიული ტურისტული მასა საქართველოში

როგორც მოგეხსენებათ რუსეთმა აკრძალა პირდაპირი ფრენები საქართველოში და შესაძლოა მინიმუმამდე შეამციროს ტურისტული ნაკადის შემოსვლა ჩვენს ქვეყანაში. ეს ყველაფერი იქონიებს უბრალო მოსახლეობაზე უდიდეს გავლენას,რადგან ეკონომიკაში ტურიზმის წილი (GDP ში პროცენტულად) შეადგენს 9.3%, შესაბამისად აღნიშნული ტურისტული შეზღუდვები იქონიებს მნიშნველოვან გავლენას, როგორც ეკონომიკაზე ასევე უბრალო მოსახლეობაზეც, რომლის ტურიზმიდან მიღებული შემოსავლის უმეტესი ნაწილი დამოკიდებულია რუსეთიდან ტურისტულ ნაკადზე. პრობლემის თავიდან ასარიდებლად ვაპირებთ ვაწარმოოთ აგრესიული მარკეტინგული კამპანია ალტერნატიული სეგმენტის მოსაზიდად. 

 

ჩვენი მიზანია

ამ კამპანიის მიზანია რაც შეიძლება მეტი ალტერნატიული ტურისტის მოზიდვა ლიტვიდან, ლატვიიდან, ესტონეთიდან, უკრაინიდან და მიმდებარე ქვეყნებიდან. ჩამოთვლილ ქვეყნებზე აქცენტი გაკეთებულია,რადგან ამ ეტაპისათვის, საქართველოს ბაზარი უფრო მეტად მორგებულია რუსულ ენოვან ტურისტზე. ჩვენი მარკეტინგული კამპანია წარმოებული იქნება სოციალური ქსელების, ფორუმების, ვიდეო რგოლების და სხვა სარეკლამო საშუალებით. აღნიშნული კამპანია გათვილი იქნება უმეტეს წილად 23-35 წლამდე ტურიზმით დაინტერესებულ სეგმენტზე. წარმატებული კამპანიის შემთხვევაში, მოსახლეობა ჩაანაცვლებს რუს ტურისტულ ნაკადს აღნიშნული ქვეყნების ტურისტული სეგმენტით,რაც დაგვეხმარება ავირიდოთ მოსალოდნელი ეკონომიკური ზარალი. 

შეგროვებული თანხით დამზადდება,  ქვევით აღნიშნული ვიდეოს მსგავსი 

სარეკლამო ვიდეო რგოლები, აუდიო რეკლამები, ონლაინ ბანერები და პოსტერები, შეიქმნება ფასიანი რეკლამები სოციალურ ქსელებში და მომზადდება შესაბამისი კონტენტი. ზემოაღნიშული მასალის დამზადებას ვგეგმავთ საუკეთესო ქართულ მარკეტინგულ და სარეკლამო კომპანიებთან თანამშრომლობით. 
 

დაგვიდექით გვერდში

თქვენ გაქვთ საშუალება, რომ აღნიშნული პრობლემის მოგვარებაში შეიტანოთ წვლილი ნებისმიერი ოდენობის თანხის დონაციით. მადლობა გიხდით მხარდაჭერისათვის.

 

Attract alternative tourists in Georgia

As you might be aware, recently Russia has banned direct flights to Georgia. It will highly impact Georgian economy. In order to cope with the situation, we decided to launch aggressive marketing campaign in Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, Poland and Ukraine to attract tourists in Georgia. The process is needed to replace the current Russian tourist segment (due to ban) with the mentioned countries tourists. It will help us to avoid loss to our economy caused by the political situation. 

Support us

You can take a participation in our cause and donate any amount that you might think will be reasonable. Thank you.
story_txt: მოვიზიდოთ ალტერნატიული ტურისტული მასა საქართველოშიროგორც მოგეხსენებათ რუსეთმა აკრძალა პირდაპირი ფრენები საქართველოში და შესაძლოა მინიმუმამდე შეამციროს ტურისტული ნაკადის შემოსვლა ჩვენს ქვეყანაში. ეს ყველაფერი იქონიებს უბრალო მოსახლეობაზე უდიდეს გავლენას,რადგან ეკონომიკაში ტურიზმის წილი (GDP ში პროცენტულად) შეადგენს 9.3%, შესაბამისად აღნიშნული ტურისტული შეზღუდვები იქონიებს მნიშნველოვან გავლენას, როგორც ეკონომიკაზე ასევე უბრალო მოსახლეობაზეც, რომლის ტურიზმიდან მიღებული შემოსავლის უმეტესი ნაწილი დამოკიდებულია რუსეთიდან ტურისტულ ნაკადზე. პრობლემის თავიდან ასარიდებლად ვაპირებთ ვაწარმოოთ აგრესიული მარკეტინგული კამპანია ალტერნატიული სეგმენტის მოსაზიდად.  ჩვენი მიზანიაამ კამპანიის მიზანია რაც შეიძლება მეტი ალტერნატიული ტურისტის მოზიდვა ლიტვიდან, ლატვიიდან, ესტონეთიდან, უკრაინიდან და მიმდებარე ქვეყნებიდან. ჩამოთვლილ ქვეყნებზე აქცენტი გაკეთებულია,რადგან ამ ეტაპისათვის, საქართველოს ბაზარი უფრო მეტად მორგებულია რუსულ ენოვან ტურისტზე. ჩვენი მარკეტინგული კამპანია წარმოებული იქნება სოციალური ქსელების, ფორუმების, ვიდეო რგოლების და სხვა სარეკლამო საშუალებით. აღნიშნული კამპანია გათვილი იქნება უმეტეს წილად 23-35 წლამდე ტურიზმით დაინტერესებულ სეგმენტზე. წარმატებული კამპანიის შემთხვევაში, მოსახლეობა ჩაანაცვლებს რუს ტურისტულ ნაკადს აღნიშნული ქვეყნების ტურისტული სეგმენტით,რაც დაგვეხმარება ავირიდოთ მოსალოდნელი ეკონომიკური ზარალი. შეგროვებული თანხით დამზადდება,  ქვევით აღნიშნული ვიდეოს მსგავსი სარეკლამო ვიდეო რგოლები, აუდიო რეკლამები, ონლაინ ბანერები და პოსტერები, შეიქმნება ფასიანი რეკლამები სოციალურ ქსელებში და მომზადდება შესაბამისი კონტენტი. ზემოაღნიშული მასალის დამზადებას ვგეგმავთ საუკეთესო ქართულ მარკეტინგულ და სარეკლამო კომპანიებთან თანამშრომლობით.  დაგვიდექით გვერდშითქვენ გაქვთ საშუალება, რომ აღნიშნული პრობლემის მოგვარებაში შეიტანოთ წვლილი ნებისმიერი ოდენობის თანხის დონაციით. მადლობა გიხდით მხარდაჭერისათვის. Attract alternative tourists in GeorgiaAs you might be aware, recently Russia has banned direct flights to Georgia. It will highly impact Georgian economy. In order to cope with the situation, we decided to launch aggressive marketing campaign in Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, Poland and Ukraine to attract tourists in Georgia. The process is needed to replace the current Russian tourist segment (due to ban) with the mentioned countries tourists. It will help us to avoid loss to our economy caused by the political situation. Support usYou can take a participation in our cause and donate any amount that you might think will be reasonable. Thank you.

story:
One of the most common and reoccurring maintenance issues cyclists face with bicycles is a flat tire. They are tough to prevent and happen before, during or after a ride. For years traditional tire levers, with just a simple tire scoop, have been used to remove tires and help fix flats. They have remained nearly unchanged for decades. However tire and wheel technology has been changing and evolving. With the invention of tubeless  wheels, and the added benefit and ease of tire sealant to fix and prevent flats, traditional tire levers cannot fully service modern tubeless setups. 

With tubeless systems, the quickest way to fix and prevent a flat is to install tire sealant. The easiest way to do that is through the valve stem, but valve cores need to be removed in order to do so.

Using a traditional tire lever, there is no way to remove a valve core. Trust me, I know, I've spent plenty of time trying unsuccessfully. I find myself searching for my small missing valve core removal tool, needle nose pliers, or anything that would allow me to remove the valve core. That's when it dawned on me. Why not just have this remover as part of the tire lever? That way the tool is always there when a tire needs to be serviced. Whether installing new tires, removing old ones, or fixing a flat with either sealant or a tube, the tools are there.

You will also notice other differences in my lever both aesthetically and structurally. I wanted a lever that looked good, and was tough enough to handle the repeated abuse of tire maintenance and was built to last rather than something that was disposable.

I wanted to it to be slick and neat... something Snēk. (fyi, it's pronounced sneak)
 

MADE IN USA. PATENT PENDING.

The Lifeboat tire lever is an all in one, tire lever, valve core remover and bottle opener. Now you fix a flat, change a tire or install sealant to tubeless wheel systems all while enjoying your beverage of choice.

COMPOSED OF A PLASTIC OUTER AND REINFORCED WITH A METAL INTERIOR, ENSURES FOR A LONG LASTING LEVER THAT WON'T DAMAGE YOUR RIM

Tubeless tires and rims are now common place in cycling and a valve core remover is needed when installing or fixing a tire.

VALVE CORES CAN EASILY BE REMOVED TO ADD SEALANT TO TUBELESS SYSTEMS

INCLUDES A BOTTLE OPENER FOR THE POST RIDE BEVERAGE

The Lifeboat Tire Lever consists of a stainless steel metal core and injection molded plastic outer. The metal strengthens the lever while the plastic keeps your rim safe from damage.

Metal runs the length of the lever, most importantly, to the tip of the scoop, adding strength where many levers fail and break.

Guaranteed for life, the lever is designed to be unbreakable. If you ever do experience a problem, we will make it right and happily replace it. 

LOW PROFILE DESIGN

The lever has a sleek, no bulk, flat profile that allows it to be easily stored in our Snēk Wallets, or tucked inside a saddle bag without taking up much room or snagging on anything.

VALVE CORE REMOVER LOCATIONS

Including two valve hole locations at opposite ends, the lever has them oriented at 90 degrees of each other, for when wheel spokes hinder full rotation.

EASY TIRE REMOVAL

Radiused edges on lever scoop allow for easier entry and tire removal on tubeless tires.

STACKABLE

Designed to stack and lock into place, this system makes it easy to keep your levers together. Whether on the go or in the shop, your levers will stay securely nested. 

SAFEGUARD BOTTLE OPENER

The bottle opener is designed with one purpose in mind; open a lifetime of cold beverages without fail. Slightly exposed metal withstands bottle caps sharp edges while the plastic outer keeps your hands and other elements comfortable.

DEVELOPMENT

Many hours and prototypes have been put into the development of this lever. I've been fortunate to be surrounded by smart people who have provided feedback, tips, knowledge, and insight into my project. With their help, I've addressed many issues and improved the design numerous times to make a product I'm confident in and excited about

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This is not the first product I've brought to market, and I've had years of experience working with a team bringing products to life. I'm confident manufacturing will run smoothly. The product has been tried, tested and is ready for production.

However, as with any project, there is always the risk that an unforeseen issue may arise. Manufacturing can sometimes take longer than expected or materials may not be available when needed. If this is the case I will be transparent and notify pledgers of any issues that may effect the delivery of product

LIMITED EDITION REWARDS

Limited Edition Illustrated Print. (4"x6")

Limited Edition Tee Shirt.

story:
KEA KIT is an outdoor survival kit to help you better prepare for all your adventures. 

Organised into the 5 pillars of outdoor survival and including over 30 items of just the most essential survival gear. You can stay calm when disaster strikes and explore with the confidence that you're prepared for anything.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Included in the KEA KIT is over 30 items of  just the most essential, quality survival gear curated by outdoor adventure experts. The gear you carry with you on your adventures can make all the difference in dire situations. You need gear that you can trust to get the job done and not fail on you at the first use. 

 

 

The KEA KIT can be customised and adapted to any type of adventure. The modular design allows you to simply put the whole kit into your pack, or just remove the internal cases to use on their own for those shorter trips. Each case fitted with an external loop so it can easily be clipped onto any pack and internal organisation compartments help to easily pack your gear to suit any adventure.

 

 

The KEA KIT was designed for both safety and convenience so we made it compact & lightweight. It fits easily into any outdoor backpack or hiking pack, helping you to easily prepare with all your essential survival gear in one easy access case. The compact design size also means it's also great for storing as a backup survival kit in your Car, RV, Home, Boat.

 

 

 

 

The KEA KIT is built tough to suit the rugged demands of the wild. Each case is built from high quality, durable and water-resistant materials. With each featuring strong, long-lasting water-resistant zippers.

 

 

 

Being prepared for the outdoors is an essential part of planning any adventure. From packing the right gear, to knowing how to use it. Taking your safety seriously can literally mean the difference between life and death. 

 

 

 

 

 

We hear you.... Survival kits out there today are poorly designed and mostly full of cheap, flimsy gear that you'll never use, not to mention trust with your life. Leaving you vulnerable and with a false sense of security. 

That's why we created the KEA KIT, because at beREDI Outdoors we believe that preparation is the absolute key to survival and you should never compromise on safety or quality, when your life is at stake.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For this campaign we will only be shipping to USA, Canada, New Zealand & Australia. This is to make sure we can easily deliver to our backers. But we plan to offer the KEA KIT worldwide later in the year!

To ensure we get you the best rate possible, we have decided to charge shipping after the campaign has ended and closer to the time of delivery. This will be managed in our pledge manager post-campaign. We will strive to get the best rates possible at the time and the rates below are current upper estimates and we hope to get them lower. For multiple unit orders, we will attempt to arrange special rates for these but we can not guarantee this

 

 KEA KIT will ship to only the countries listed

Rates are for 1 KEA KIT only (discounts for multiple units is not guaranteed)

Rates are subject to change and are estimate only

If Any, tax and duties will be covered by the backer

Shipping will be charged through the pledge manager close to the shipping date  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The KEA KIT was inspired by the spectacular, native New Zealand Alpine Parrot, the Kea. As the world only alpine parrot, they are cheeky, curious and have adapted to use the tools at their disposal to survive in one of the harshest environments in the world. Sadly they are listed as an endangered species, with only a few thousand Kea living in the wild.

We are passionate about these special birds and that’s why we have partnered with the Kea Conservation Trust to help support them in their mission to protect KEA and improve their future prospects in the wild.

The Kea Conservation Trust was set up in 2006 to assist in conservation of wild Kea in their natural habitat. Their mission is to ensure an enriched and sustainable future for both wild and captive Kea populations for the long-term benefit of all New Zealanders.

 

 

The idea for the KEA KIT was born in early 2020 during the first Covid-19 lockdown in New Zealand. With the international borders closing, Matt's guiding work quickly dried up so he decided it was time to work on a problem that had been bugging him for years. "How can I make it easier to carry everything I need to be prepared for all my outdoor adventures, without compromising on quality".

Like most keen adventurers, Matt was frustrated with the current survival kit options on the market, with no serious options that you can trust. So that's when it began, Matt decided it was time to solve the problem and build a kit that covered all the bases. After a rough hand drawing, we constructed a 3D model to better realise the concept and that's when we knew this could be something good. 

 

 

 

We set off to find a manufacturer and after a bit of trail & error we settled on a factory that also supplies some of the world's top bag manufacturers.  With the case being a work in progress, we were constantly in the process of sourcing the best pieces of gear to go inside. Keeping to the motto of "Everything you need, Nothing you don't" we resisted the urge to add anything but the essentials, ensuring that you have just what you need, when you need it.

Following over a year of development and testing, we now have a finished product that we are excited to be sharing it with all the adventurers around the world.  We are dedicated to continually improving the KEA KIT and look forward to engaging with our Kickstarter community to find more ways we can help make your outdoor adventures better!

 

The Founder/Creator 

Matt Butler is the founder of beREDI Outdoors, and the creator of the KEA KIT. As a Professional Outdoor Adventure and Fly Fishing Guide in New Zealand for the past 6 years, he knows first hand how important it is to be prepared when heading into the great outdoors. Matt is an avid adventurer and traveller, spending the past 10 years exploring and fishing all around the world. His passion for the outdoors is the driving force behind everything he does, and he believes the outdoor industry can be better served by thoughtful and innovative products for all the adventurers out there.

 

 

 

Our Mission: To create and innovate quality outdoor gear so you can adventure with confidence.

beREDI means just that, how can we ‘be ready’ for whatever the wild throws at us. We are dedicated to creating reliable and quality outdoor gear that pushes the boundaries of what is available today. We are a small team of passionate outdoor adventurers that knows how important it is to have gear you can trust. The KEA KIT is our first step in solving this problem and we look forward to working to continue innovating and developing new solutions to help you survive and thrive in the wild.

story:
TOP QUALITY

BIKE AND MOTORBIKE

CARE & MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS

Veco Spray is a real game-changer in the world of bike and motorbike products! All our products are formulated and tested to ensure the best performances.

We provide mainly 4 kinds of products:

  • Lubrication: 3 products to ensure you the best unlocking power and a complete protection against moisture, dirt and rust!
  • Chain Care: transmission on bike and motorbike need to be always in the best shape: it's one of the most exposed part to mud, dust, tarmac and all you can find on your road! Find the best product for your style of riding!
  • Cleaning: a clean bike or motorbike is good to see and most of all ensure durability and long life to all its parts!
  • Gear Care: taking care of what you wear is important as taking care of your bike!

> COMING SOON: Boat Maintenance! <

 

 

Discover our Products:

 

90USE PRO EDITION MULTI OIL

Highest Quality Lube, Extreme Protection

Highest quality formula, with active ingredients and natural vegetable oils. Ideal for industrial and mechanical applications and in general in the presence of oils and greases, even cooked, rust, carbonates and limestone. Excellent on heavy vehicles and for automotive in general, forklifts and boats. Can be used on parts in contact with water, even saline. From the first application it dissolves dirt and rust, protecting and preserving the treated parts.

90USE MULTI OIL

Lubricant and Protective

Perfect to protect from water and humidity thanks to its high water repellent power. It does not contain Silicone. Unlocks nuts, bolts etc. from rust and oxidation. Protects from corrosion, rust, salt, from humidity and atmospheric agents. Great for lubricating gears, cables, chains, gaskets, etc. Ideal for cleaning metal, plastic and rubber

SILICON GLOW

Silicon Oil

Lubricates at low and high temperatures. Excellent anti-crunch effect. Protects and nourishes the rubber, offering water repellent protection; Antioxidant for metals and steels, it is perfect for lubricating metal and rubber parts such as suspension and fork stems. Does not damage O-rings and protects against water and moisture.

 

 

 

HIGH SPEED

High Performance Chain Grease

Synthetic anti-drop grease for motorcycle and bicycle chains. Highly adhesive, penetrates and protects O-rings. Excellent resistance to water and high temperatures. It resists high rotations so it's particularly suitable for any type of motorcycle and in the racing field. Thanks to its special formulation guarantees high performances in any type of weather condition.

PTFE

Chain Lubricant for Dry Conditions

Teflon-based lubricant, has excellent resistance to rubbing and mechanical stress. It forms a very thin layer that protects the chain from dirt and dust, ideal in dusty conditions and dry ground. Specific product designed for motorcycle chains (especially motocross and enduro) and bikes (eg MTB).

WHITE GREASE

Multipurpose White Grease

White grease for Multipurpose: perfect for bike, motorbike and boat applications. Ideal for parts exposed to bad weather and saline environments. Excellent adhesion and excellent resistance to water and washout.

DEGREASER

Dry Chain Cleaner

Cleans and removes dust, grease, oil, tar and deposits from chains and metal components in general. Thanks to its particular formulation, it does not damage rubber, plastic and O-rings, ensuring a deep cleaning before applying a new layer of grease or lubricant.
 

 

 

CLEANER DEGREASER

Extra strong degreaser

Professionally removes dirt and grease. Effectively cleans all types of surfaces and materials. It can be used for wheels, rims, transmissions, motors and work tools. Thanks to its special formula destroys dirt in short time and without leaving residues.

PLASTIC GLOW

Silicone Polish for Plastics and Fairings

Silicone-based formula, cleans and polishes plastics. Thanks to his protective action on surfaces, repels dust, dirt and mud while guaranteeing a long-term shine effect.

METAL SHINE

Polishing Cleaner for Metals and Chrome

Eliminates oxidation, stains and opacity from metal surfaces. Ideal for care and maintenance of steel and chrome parts on motorcycles, boats or cars.

BRAKE SHINE

Brake Disc Cleaner

Dry cleaner specific for cleaning brake discs. Removes residues of grease, dust and oil. It does not attack the metal, seals, O-rings and paint and does not damage the ABS sensors. Quick drying.

 

 

 

WATERPROOFER

Waterproofing for fabrics

Water-repellent and waterproofing protective for fabrics, leather and footwear. Ideal for sportswear (e.g. helmets, suites, bike shoes, motorcycle boots...) but can also be used on boat and camping equipment. Does not damage colors and fabrics.

GERM TERMINATOR

Cleaning and Sanitization

Alcohol-based cleaner ideal for removing organic dirt on every surface. Highly effective formula, which can be used to sanitize helmets and clothing but also on all surfaces. High cleaning and sanitizing power.

 

 

WHO WE ARE

We are in business since 1959, we are the third generation. Everything started with our grandfather Francesco, woodworker, who decided 65 years ago to open a tool shop in our city. Then since the '70 our father started to sell industrial equipments and air systems.

We decided, after college, to remain in our family business. So we started several projects, mainly in IOT and linked machinery.

Then, thanks to our market experience and due to our great passion for Bikes, Motorbikes and Boats we had the idea to start this new business. All the products we used for maintenance and cleaning was lacking of something: so we decided to make them our own!

This project started in January, and now we finally have the first test products and we started the first production in our facility in Italy!

     

     

    WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT?

    • Ensure a good media / advertising / marketing coverage;
    • R&D of other specific products (empower bike & motorbike, boat products range);
    • Reach a good level of sales to give stability to this business;
    • Buy new equipment to ensure a better service;
    • Buy better logistics tools and supplies;

     

     

    OUR NEXT STEPS?

    Support us! We are only a step away from our target!
story_txt:
TOP QUALITY
BIKE AND MOTORBIKE
CARE & MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS

Veco Spray is a real game-changer in the world of bike and motorbike products! All our products are formulated and tested to ensure the best performances.
We provide mainly 4 kinds of products:


Lubrication: 3 products to ensure you the best unlocking power and a complete protection against moisture, dirt and rust!

Chain Care: transmission on bike and motorbike need to be always in the best shape: it's one of the most exposed part to mud, dust, tarmac and all you can find on your road! Find the best product for your style of riding!

Cleaning: a clean bike or motorbike is good to see and most of all ensure durability and long life to all its parts!

Gear Care: taking care of what you wear is important as taking care of your bike!

> COMING SOON: Boat Maintenance! <

Ensure a good media / advertising / marketing coverage;
R&D of other specific products (empower bike & motorbike, boat products range);
Reach a good level of sales to give stability to this business;
Buy new equipment to ensure a better service;
Buy better logistics tools and supplies;

 
 
OUR NEXT STEPS?

Support us! We are only a step away from our target!

story:
Hi All

As you know, we have been in Canada for 6 months now! WOW! Feels like only yesterday we were leaving Australia. This experience has been a one in a lifetime opportunity for us both and came at the most perfect time in our lives and relationship.

As the snow has mostly melted and the ski season is done, we are so excited to about be embarking on a new adventure, a month long roadtrip in the USA, driving the beautiful Pacific Coast Highway all the way down the coast of California, to San Diego. Then up through Grand Canyon, Salt Lake City and Yellowstone National Park, back to Kelowna, in BC, Canada.

As you are well aware, buying fuel can be expensive and our minimum wage jobs have not provided us with a whole lot of cash, so we are attempting to raise a little cash to help us along the way.

Here's how it works; we have set a goal of $800 to be raised in 60 days. If we are able to raise this amount, within the 60 days, we get to keep the money, minus the cut that goes to Indigogo. We have done our research and have estimated that fuel will cost us apporoximately $800. All of the money will be used primarily for fuel for the trip and any other expenses related to the running of the car for the duration of the trip. If we do not raise enough to reach the goal of $800, the money will be refunded by Indigogo.

We do not expect or desire any huge funding but any little bit of change will be of help to us on our adventure (even $1) - OR even just sharing this page will be of help.

We would like to thank our family and friends for your ongoing support. Follow our adventure and creative thank you's on my blog; www.ourlettersbackhome.blogspot.com

story:
Lunchboxes Have Their Limits (at least they used to)

Kasie Johnson pitched her idea to change the way people pack and enjoy their lunches at a local Startup Weekend on November 11, 2017. She and her team designed an on-demand, temperature controlled lunchbox where lunchers can warm and chill their food in one brilliant box. 

THRILL Pack uses thermoelectric and Bluetooth technology allowing you to control the temperature of each lunchbox compartment from your phone or on the side of the THRILL Pack.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are raising $25,000 to fund our first 2,000 units which also covers other startup costs for research, prototyping, testing, and final product and packaging design.
  • Backers get either one (1), two (2), three (3), or four (4) TRILL Packs depending on the amount they give.
  • Estimated delivery is July 2018
  • If we don't reach out goal, you get your money back!
  • Monthly updates from the team

 

 

Features of THRILL Pack 1

  • Neoprene outer skin with dry suit zipper
  • Dual temperature thermoelectric technology
  • Bluetooth compatible
  • No moving parts
  • Aluminum sink plates with padded aluminum insulation
  • Hot side approximately 165*F
  • Cold side approximately 40*F
  • Lithium ion battery powered
  • Peltier heating elements
  • Nontoxic, food safe, phthalate free
  • Refrigerator, freezer, microwave, & dishwasher safe

The Impact

We believe THRILL Packs will literally change the way millions of people eat at work and school. 

Risks & Challenges

The THRILL Pack 1 is still in the prototyping stage and will require months of testing before it will be ready to manufacture and ship to Backers. 

Other Challenges:

  • Selection of suppliers and manufacturer
  • Product Costs
  • FDA Approval for Food-Safe Containers

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out there and share the THRILL Pack with your friends online!
  • Sign up to get our updates at http://thrillpack.co

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Great Bikes Deserve Well Made Parts

As someone who appreciates good design and robust parts, the last thing you want to do is use cheap plastic components. Regular bar plugs are exactly this, they scratch, flex and inevitably fall out. We've redesigned how they are assembled so that they fit great and don't fall out. 

 

These bar ends are made from copper, aluminum or brass and are precisely machined to high accuracy. This results in a universal fit, vibration proof, diamond-cut knurled bar ends, different from anything else out there. 

Custom Monogram

Just send in your initials and we'll create your very own monogram. We can create two or three letter designs. 

Customised Name Emblems

If you want something a bit more complex, we can also help you design your own name & logo. 

Custom Logos

If you'd like to get your bike clubs logo or your brand engraved we can also do that :)

story:
Why is Solarpad Different?

Solarpad Pro is designed to be the highest-quality solar panel with Sunpower cells and ETFE lamination for the best light transmission and lightest weight possible. Solarpad Pro is engineered to squeeze the most energy possible from the sun's rays in to your smart phone. No short-cuts that compromise power or efficiency are taken, which ultra-light backers and thru-hikers demand.

Compatible with Most USB Devices - Charge your phones, cameras, music players, Bluetooth speakers, GPS devices, and more! If it's about the size of a Smart Phone, Solarpad Pro can charge it. Connect the charge cable that came with your smart phone, or other USB device, and plug it in to Solarpad Pro.

Unparalleled performance - In full sun, Solarpad Pro will recharge a dead phone from 0% to 100% in 3 to 4 hours! Other similar sized solar chargers can only charge a Smart Phone from 0% to 70% and take over 4 hours to recharge.

Emergency back up power - Your Solarpad Pro system will provide you with USB power when the power grid goes down after an earthquake, storm, or other natural disaster. When the grid goes down, don’t be left without power!

  • Keeps your phone charged to stay in touch with loved ones, get the latest news, and receive alerts and essential information. 
  •  Keeps the lights on by charging your USB lighting devices such as LED flashlights, headlamps, and lanterns.
  • If the grid is down for days or weeks, the sun will keep charging your devices. 

For your everyday use – Charging your smart phone daily with the power of the sun is not a problem with Solarpad Pro. Experience renewable off-grid power everyday with this fully DC solar power system. Charge a battery during the day and charge your phone overnight so you are ready for the next day!

Entry-level solar solution – Solarpad Pro is a low cost, entry-level solar system for those wanting the independence of solar, without the high costs and space requirements of larger panels, inverters and battery banks.

Tips and Tricks:

  • Keep the solar panel near the top of your backpack facing up toward the sun.
  • Keep your phone and battery out of direct sun and in the shade or in a bag. Excessive heat can damage batteries.
  • Best times to solar charge is from 8am to 4pm in the summer and 10am to 2pm in the winter. Even when it seems bright, atmosphere absorbs considerable sunlight when the sun is at low angles in the sky.
  • Under low power conditions like thick clouds, sunrise, or sunset, try turning on airplane mode to avoid a flashing charge screen and draining your phone battery. 
  • If using Solarpad Pro with a battery bank, allow it to charge about 10 to 15 minutes before charging your phone. 
  • Avoid charging behind a window because glass absorbs some light radiation and lowers solar power output.
  •  Phones don't like power fluctuations in non-ideal conditions, so when in doubt, use Solarpad Pro with a battery bank for best results. 
  • Try using apps like this that can show where to place Solarpad Pro in order to avoid obstructions throughout the day like trees, hills, buildings, or anything that can cast long shadows: http://www.sunsurveyor.com
  • Make sure your battery bank and/or phone are fully charged before any long trip.
  • Take advantage of times when you can rest and solar charge at maximum power like lunch in a clearing or at a picnic table. Solar charging is more difficult while on the move because of shadows and non-optimal angles of the solar panel.

Solarpad Pro Solar Panel Specs:

  • Size: W 6.1 inches X L 10.2 inches X H 0.1 inches
  • Weight: 122g (4.3 oz)
  • Output - Female USB Type A Connector
  • Nominal Output - Current: 1A Max | Voltage: 5 Volts Max
  • Cell Type: Sunpower Monocrystalline 
  • Lamination Type: ETFE
  • Typical Phone Charge Time from 0% to 100%: 3 to 4 hours
  • Mounting Options: 4 Stainless Steel Grommets in Each Corner
  • Includes: 2 Carabiner Clips
  • Solar Cell Life: 20 years
Solarpad Pro Prototype Charging Phones
 

Where Do the Funds Go and How Long Will it Take to Finish?

We've solved the fundamental problems with solar USB charging, but right now only a few Solarpad Pro prototypes exist. In order to build the final production version at a reasonable cost, funds must be raised to purchase a minimum order of hundreds of solar cells, circuits, and plastic components. Other equipment costs include molds for the plastic parts and creating custom assembly fixtures. Solarpad Pro is designed to be as simple to manufacture as possible and it is always being refined for the most efficient assembly. Our suppliers have given us great quality prototype parts and they are ready to manufacture the components in larger quantities. Typical manufacturing lead-times are about 30 days so realistically it should take at least a few months to manufacture, assemble, final test, package, and then ship them.

Other Uses

The original Solarpad was a bit more bulky and fragile, but had a lot of creative uses. Kitty who I met from the Intel booth at Mini Maker Faire in 2017 was interested in using Solarpad for a fashion project and came up with this prototype.

 
Tent lighting using Ellumiglow Laserwire was another use.
 

Risks & Challenges

I have a M.S. in Mechanical Engineering with over 15 years of experience and many successful projects under my belt. I also gained a lot manufacturing experience working at my Dad's sheet metal shop since I was a kid. Unforeseen issues that can delay the shipment of rewards to backers include, but are not limited to:

* Delays in receiving components on time from vendors. 

* Delays from rejected parts during inspection. 

* Delays from the carrier in shipping the product to backers.

As a backer of other projects, I understand the importance of honest communication, even if the news is not so good, so I will make it a priority to answer all backer questions as fast as I can and give updates as soon as possible. We are on this journey together.

story:
Intro

Welcome to my new travel towels.  Created for explorers, backpackers, travellers and nomads.  I hope this can become your new favourite travel companion!

Having spent many of the past few years travelling, I realised travel towels are boring, so I decided to do something about it.  I realise I haven't invented anything overly new or creative, towels have been around for centuries, microfibre travel towels (plain and stripey) have been around for decades.  You can also get travel towels with designs on if you look on certain websites.  However the majority of travel towels seem to be of a lower quality (see below), or if they have a design it's only on one side.  After some research in to costs and production, Wraptor was born (I love dinosaurs and plan to have many dinosaur themed towels!) 

The Story so Far

I have been in contact with over 100 suppliers in China, getting quotes and details on quality and narrowed it down to 4.  I have now chosen the best quality from these samples and will proceed with meeting their minimum order quantities if I am successful on here.  Each towel requires an investment of £2,500 to meet the MOQ, so if I manage to raise £2,000 I will be able to produce one of the towels.  If I am fortunate enough to raise £4,000, I will then get a second towel produced, and so on!

Designs

The next 2 designs in the making are a triceratops and a T-rex!  Photos to come soon!

Material

The options I had were to make a traditional microfibre towel, or a suede microfibre towel.  After testing a few myself and discussions with suppliers, I decided to go with suede.  The main reasons for this are:

  • Lighter than traditional microfibre
  • More absorbent than traditional microfibre
  • Drys faster
  • Easier to print designs

Quality

One of the things I hate about travel towels is that they feel like I'm drying myself with one of those towels you dry a car with.  From my research, the GSM (towel jargon for quality) appeared to be circa 200.  So it was essential I sourced higher quality material than this, which led me to settle on towels with a GSM of 250, a 25% increase on the average.  The higher quality the towel, whilst more absorbent and softer to touch, they are  more expensive, heavier and thicker to carry.  250 GSM seemed like a good middle ground.

Production

I think I must have contacted over 100 towel suppliers via Alibaba, Ali Express and Global Sources.  Many were ruled out due to not being able to provide printing both sides, providing a microfibre towel with a GSM as high as 250, having super high minimum order quantities, or being crazy expensive.  In the end I was able to narrow it down to 4, 3 of which have now provided photos of their samples and these are on their way to me now.  I will review and test extensively to choose the best quality towel, and from there I will ensure a product of the highest quality.  If the target is made, it'll take the manufacturer approximately 30 days to mass produce the design, so hopefully towels will be sent out about 30-40 days after the campaign ends.

Giving Back

I plan to include quite a few dinosaurs in the towel designs.  Dinosaurs are cool, I don't care what anyone says :)  However unfortunately they are now extinct, and there are many other endangered animals out there at risk of joining them.  As a result I plan to give 5% of profits I make to WWF to protect endangered animals.

Technicals

160 x 80 CM - a normal towel size.  None of this tiny towel nonsense that won't even wrap around you!

Material - 80% Polyester+ 20% Polyamide

How I got here

I took the feedback and activities of friends made backpacking and and applied these to making the new bags. The biggest was finding suppliers that could print stripes and an image that aligned both sides, as well as printing a design on to a cotton bag.  I am really happy with the versions shown in the images after months of too'ing and fro'ing with suppliers!, hopefully ready to get funded and bring it to market!

Funding

As I touched on above, these suppliers have minimum order quantities and I cannot afford to take the risk of buying a lot up front if no body likes them!  So I am doing the Indiegogo to see if anybody actually wants them, and if so I will invest in the stock!  I will hopefully have some left over which I can then start to make a website to sell from as well as trying to sell via retailers and distributors.   I will commence with just selling two of the towels, as the minimum order quantities relate to each towel, so need to try and get over 150 of each one!  If it does well I will include the other designs as perks and then people can change if they wish!

Risks & Challenges

This is my first crowd fundraise!  It’s also my first solo business venture.  As a result there are risks involved. To counteract this, I’ve put extensive hours in to researching suppliers to find those able to offer high quality and good customer service.  Hopefully this will result in a strong supply chain, from the suppliers creating the materials, the manufacturers piecing it together, to the shipping and fulfilment partners.  To begin with I will ship the products, but hopefully if things kick off well I can bring on board a fulfilment partner.

As a business idea, the main risk is it easy to copy.  Travel towels have been around for years so are hardly unique and I’m not creating anything new, so very easy for someone to copy this.  I hope to build up a brand around the towels to counter this.

There’s also the risk that you get your towels and hate them!  We are very optimistic this won’t be the case, but just in case,  when you receive your towel, if you’re not 100% satisfied with the design or quality simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price (Shipping and handling fees are non-refundable).

 

If you've got this far, thank you very much for taking the time to read all this! If you make a purchase, I am extremely grateful, and if not, have a super day :)

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
dear Vietnam Veterans 

i born when Vietnam finish the war . I really don't know what happened! 

My father died in the war , I only wish have father in my life . I show old men who are Vietnam Veteran . I really wish they are my daddy . 

Dear 

after the war ! Vietnam trying building new life better , we was forget about the war . We are friendly and hope never have war again . 

I have team to help vietname Veterans come back Vietnam , visit us country one times when you can . 

We have lots of memory about Vietnam when you here . 

We help you visit where you staying before 

we have find your friend , your brother , your father who are died here 

we help you with trip here 

we know your health is not so good , but we will try help anything we can 

if you thing about it , please let we know . 

We find invest for to help Vietnam veterans, we do friendly , not for business.

many many thank for understanding.

best wish to anybody

story:
Let’s cut to the chase, MANHATTAN NEEDS A BEACH. We’ve got everything else, its clearly time and I need YOU to help get there. 

WHY AM I DOING THIS?

I have been going to the beach since I was a little kid in Florida, weekends with family and friends, surfing, picnics and relaxing in the sun next to the surf is what summer is all about. I want to share that experience with NYC and create a public park for everyone to enjoy and take a break from the concrete jungle we exist in everyday.

I’m a creative entrepreneur, experience designer and producer whose mission is to create experiences, environments and content that sparks meaningful connections. The moment this idea popped into mind, I knew I had to do it, it’s a perfect fit for what I’m all about.

My career has been a blend of all these elements.  I’ve been in the design and construction world since 2006 having supervised and renovated over 50,000 square feet of luxury residential and commercial space in NYC, and now I’m developing turnkey luxury properties around the country. Creating fun, dynamic and unique physical environments that have an impact is what I do.  



THE BIG IDEA

The best ideas are derived from necessity.

New York City is an island surrounded by water with no sand, it’s going to take a little vision to make it happen and I’ve got a plan. I want to make your summer time experience awesome and and here’s how I’m going to do it.  

My concept was created with my friends at workshop/apd andCraft Engineering Studio to emulate a relaxed seaside atmosphere and maximize the footprint of the barge we are building on top of. Challenged with the need for restaurants and entertainment space, without sacrificing the relaxed beauty of the dunes, Workshop/APD created what we like to call the “potato chip.” With an elevation of almost 16 feet at the ends of the structure, a natural amphitheater occurs and allows us to provide services underneath the beach without obstructing the amazing views, creating a 360 degree experience of the city and waterway surrounding us. 

City Beach NYC is a community project, a social space, a creative achievement in design, and a platform to create possibility.

CROWDFUNDING AND YOU

The purpose of this campaign is to raise awareness in our community, showing public support of the project to our city officials, investors and brand partners that we have your support. 

The first milestone of the project develops the operational plan and begins the process with the local municipalities. The $35,000 raised during this phase allows us to hire the team we need to move the project to the next level. We’ve started off with donations as low as $10, but you can enter any amount you’d like, even $1. The goal here is showing your support.

The second milestone builds a scaled 3D model that allows the architects to explore the design in three dimensions. It will also be used to help illustrate to the community and city boards the functionality with the site and interaction the public will have once the barge is in place and costs $35,000.

The third milestone of the project invests in design development for architecture and structural engineering. Focusing more on the technical aspects and building materials, this phase allows us to understand the functions and systems further and is estimated at $150,000.

The next milestone moves into construction drawings, documentation, permitting applications, renderings and community outreach $185,000

It’s important for to us to work through each of these stages to get our build costs accurate so we know where we are headed and we reduce the surprises along the way. We’ve broken this down to help you understand that you are driving how fast the project can move, if you get behind us this project can be a reality by the summer of 2016. Now the question is how badly do you want it?

WANT TO GO REALLY BIG?

We’ve been looking high and low, new and old, but we anticipate the purchase to be roughly $1.4M, which includes tugging it from wherever its current home may be back to NY.  If you guys get us this far, I will be blown away.  

New Yorkers like a challenge, so I'm putting it out there, ANYTHING is possible. 

Now on to the fun stuff...


On the main deck, at the east end of the beach, a food court with two different, local restaurants greets beach goers before they head below to the changing rooms and the guest services desk. Complete with sunscreen, luxury lounge chair and towel rentals, we make it easy to travel light and spend the afternoon. Forget your suit? Not a problem, stop by our surf shop and head upstairs without missing a beat. 



The lower deck is also home to our kids history & marine science lab that are great for the whole family. Complete with marine touch tank and interactive kiosks, kids can learn about the history of the Hudson River, water quality and resident marine life in the park. Just around the corner our anchor restaurant, a double height dining room with light flooding in from the west, is the perfect place to enjoy a leisurely lunch or dinner. And their’s no rush, we’re open late, so order a glass of wine at the sunset bar and watch the sun fade into the horizon.

NUTS, BOLTS & DETAILS 

Barge Dimensions 260’ x 72’

Beach Dimensions 220’ x 72’

Cubic Yards of Sand 1,200

Beach Chairs 200

Restaurants 3

Surf Shop 

Kids Science Lab 


LOCATION

The barge will be located on the west side of Manhattan in the Hudson River, there's lots of options and we are working to find the best spot. It will moored during the summer and will have access to get on an off anytime you like. It won't be leaving pier it's attached to. 

CAN WE SWIM?

We’d love to let you, but that’s a decision made by the DEC  and we have more to explore around this area for your health and safety. You’ll be able to learn more about the water quality in the Hudson in our Marine Science exhibit downstairs and learn what we can do to help keep our river clean and improve the water quality. 

Don’t fret! there will be water features aboard to cool down! Outdoor showers to rinse off and water misters for that quick cool down will be integrated into the plan. Depending on where we moor, small personal watercraft such as kayaks and paddle boards may be possible and we’ll keep you posted as things develop.  

WHAT DOES THE WATERFALL DO?

The waterfall is there to help create create that relaxing sound of rushing water and help drown out city noise while you are on the beach. It will circulate the river water and help to aerate and boost the oxygen levels in the surrounding marine habitat. 

HOW DOES IT GET POWER?

We’re in the early phases of development and we’d like this to be as green as possible, exploring ways to take this off the grid are top of our list. Through the use of solar and light tubes we may be able to greatly reduce our reliance on shore power. If you have suggestions about new technologies to help keep us green we'd love to hear about them. Please email us at info@citybeachnyc.com

CAN WE REALLY DO THIS???

The first phase of the project has been underway for quite some time. We've had meetings regarding the mooring location to sitting down with agencies like the Coast Guard, Army Corp and Department of Environmental Conservation, Department of Buildings, FDNY and others involved to make this happen. 

Yes, City Beach is a viable project for our waterway. It is possible and like any project of this size we have more to learn along the way.

ONWARD AND UPWARD

After completing the numbers phase it’s time for us to hit the streets again and raise money to complete our drawings and get ready for construction. With the success of the High Line and the +pool as awesome inspirations, we know the community will help us reach our financial goal and we won’t stop until we get there. 

REWARDS

$10 - Thanks for giving us a shout out! Now it's our turn, we'll put your name on our website 'Thank You' page and let everyone know you made a difference in making this happen

$25 - We'll invite you to our exclusive prelaunch party and we'll put your name in the special thanks section of our website and let everyone know you made a difference in making this happen

$49 - Get your name engraved into our boardwalk forever, showing off you were one of the people that made this happen, plus the above package 

$79 - You'll receive and exclusive early pass for opening day, get your toes in the sand before all of New York does, plus the above package

$99 - You'll receive priority access for the first month of operation! That means no lines people! That's some serious clout if you ask us, plus your name on the boardwalk and invite to the prelaunch party

$125 - You'll receive two months priority access to the beach! Yea no line! Plus a guest, have your name engraved on the boardwalk and get invite to the prelaunch party! 

$250 - You'll get the full summer priority access plus you can bring a guest, have your name engraved on the glass walls, and get an invite to the prelaunch party and a special thank you letter from Blayne

$500  You'll get the full summer priority access plus you can bring two guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls, invite to the prelaunch party and a special thank you letter from Blayne

$1000 - You'll receive two invitations to our opening night gala, special acknowledgement as one of our LIFEGUARDS on our website, full summer priority access for three guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls and a special thank you letter from Blayne

$2,500  You'll receive private catered picnic for you and five others with the Blayne and the City Beach Team, two invitations to our opening night gala, special acknowledgement as one of our LIFEGUARDS on our website, full summer priority access for three guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls and a special thank you letter from Blayne

$5,000 You'll receive a private cocktail reception for you and five others during sunset with Blayne and the City Beach Team, plus two invitations to our opening night gala, special acknowledgement as one of our LIFEGUARDS on our website, full summer priority access for three guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls and a special thank you letter from Blayne


CITY BEACH DESIGN TEAM

workshop/apd

Matthew Berman

Matthew is fascinated by the implications of design at every scale, from the micro to the urban. His passion for good design, through a core belief, goes well beyond the making of things. “Great architecture takes my breath away,” says Matt. “ I believe so fundamentally that design, both interior and exterior, is inextricably linked to our well-being.” Matthew received a Bachelor of Arts from Leigh University and a Master’s of Architecture from Columbia University.

Andrew Kotchen

Early in his career, Andrew discovered his passion for the crafting of things: researching new materials and innovative fabrication methods, all with an eye towards solid modern design. “My love of architecture is found in the act of building,” says Andrew. “I love nothing more than seeing our work realized.” Andrew earned a Bachelor of Arts from Leigh University and a Master’s of Architecture from the University of Michigan. 

Craft Engineering Studio

Nathaniel Stanton

Nathaniel Stanton founded CRAFT  in the spring of 2010 to more effectively address the desire among architects for an engineering consultant that is progressive and forward thinking but operates on a scale that engenders creativity and collaboration between disciplines. This pursuit builds on 17 years of experience in non-standard structural engineering consulting for projects with geometrical, analytical and material complexity.

Are you still reading? Awesome!

Donations aren't the only way you can help, lending us your voice is important too. Take the link http://www.igg.me/at/citybeachnyc and post it to your Facebook page, tweet it out or even email your friends about what we're doing. Your contribution of time and effort means as much to me as the dollars in the door, because you are actively participating in making this project successful. Already I've had over 100 people take action and post to web for us, will you join them?

Restaurants 3
Surf Shop 
Kids Science Lab LOCATIONThe barge will be located on the west side of Manhattan in the Hudson River, there's lots of options and we are working to find the best spot. It will moored during the summer and will have access to get on an off anytime you like. It won't be leaving pier it's attached to. 
CAN WE SWIM?
We’d love to let you, but that’s a decision made by the DEC  and we have more to explore around this area for your health and safety. You’ll be able to learn more about the water quality in the Hudson in our Marine Science exhibit downstairs and learn what we can do to help keep our river clean and improve the water quality. 

Don’t fret! there will be water features aboard to cool down! Outdoor showers to rinse off and water misters for that quick cool down will be integrated into the plan. Depending on where we moor, small personal watercraft such as kayaks and paddle boards may be possible and we’ll keep you posted as things develop.  WHAT DOES THE WATERFALL DO?
The waterfall is there to help create create that relaxing sound of rushing water and help drown out city noise while you are on the beach. It will circulate the river water and help to aerate and boost the oxygen levels in the surrounding marine habitat. HOW DOES IT GET POWER?

We’re in the early phases of development and we’d like this to be as green as possible, exploring ways to take this off the grid are top of our list. Through the use of solar and light tubes we may be able to greatly reduce our reliance on shore power. If you have suggestions about new technologies to help keep us green we'd love to hear about them. Please email us at info@citybeachnyc.com

CAN WE REALLY DO THIS???
The first phase of the project has been underway for quite some time. We've had meetings regarding the mooring location to sitting down with agencies like the Coast Guard, Army Corp and Department of Environmental Conservation, Department of Buildings, FDNY and others involved to make this happen. Yes, City Beach is a viable project for our waterway. It is possible and like any project of this size we have more to learn along the way.

ONWARD AND UPWARD
After completing the numbers phase it’s time for us to hit the streets again and raise money to complete our drawings and get ready for construction. With the success of the High Line and the +pool as awesome inspirations, we know the community will help us reach our financial goal and we won’t stop until we get there. REWARDS$10 - Thanks for giving us a shout out! Now it's our turn, we'll put your name on our website 'Thank You' page and let everyone know you made a difference in making this happen$25 - We'll invite you to our exclusive prelaunch party and we'll put your name in the special thanks section of our website and let everyone know you made a difference in making this happen$49 - Get your name engraved into our boardwalk forever, showing off you were one of the people that made this happen, plus the above package $79 - You'll receive and exclusive early pass for opening day, get your toes in the sand before all of New York does, plus the above package$99 - You'll receive priority access for the first month of operation! That means no lines people! That's some serious clout if you ask us, plus your name on the boardwalk and invite to the prelaunch party$125 - You'll receive two months priority access to the beach! Yea no line! Plus a guest, have your name engraved on the boardwalk and get invite to the prelaunch party! $250 - You'll get the full summer priority access plus you can bring a guest, have your name engraved on the glass walls, and get an invite to the prelaunch party and a special thank you letter from Blayne$500  You'll get the full summer priority access plus you can bring two guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls, invite to the prelaunch party and a special thank you letter from Blayne$1000 - You'll receive two invitations to our opening night gala, special acknowledgement as one of our LIFEGUARDS on our website, full summer priority access for three guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls and a special thank you letter from Blayne$2,500  You'll receive private catered picnic for you and five others with the Blayne and the City Beach Team, two invitations to our opening night gala, special acknowledgement as one of our LIFEGUARDS on our website, full summer priority access for three guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls and a special thank you letter from Blayne$5,000 You'll receive a private cocktail reception for you and five others during sunset with Blayne and the City Beach Team, plus two invitations to our opening night gala, special acknowledgement as one of our LIFEGUARDS on our website, full summer priority access for three guests, have your name engraved on the glass walls and a special thank you letter from BlayneCITY BEACH DESIGN TEAMworkshop/apdMatthew Berman
Matthew is fascinated by
the implications of design at every scale, from the micro to the urban. His
passion for good design, through a core belief, goes well beyond the making of
things. “Great architecture takes my breath away,” says Matt. “ I believe so
fundamentally that design, both interior and exterior, is inextricably linked
to our well-being.” Matthew received a Bachelor of Arts from Leigh University
and a Master’s of Architecture from Columbia University.
Andrew Kotchen
Early in his career,
Andrew discovered his passion for the crafting of things: researching new
materials and innovative fabrication methods, all with an eye towards solid
modern design. “My love of architecture is found in the act of building,” says
Andrew. “I love nothing more than seeing our work realized.” Andrew earned a
Bachelor of Arts from Leigh University and a Master’s of Architecture from the
University of Michigan. Craft Engineering StudioNathaniel Stanton

Nathaniel Stanton founded CRAFT  in the spring of 2010 to more effectively address the desire among architects for an engineering consultant that is progressive and forward thinking but operates on a scale that engenders creativity and collaboration between disciplines. This pursuit builds on 17 years of experience in non-standard structural engineering consulting for projects with geometrical, analytical and material complexity.Are you still reading? Awesome!Donations aren't the only way you can help, lending us your voice is important too. Take the link http://www.igg.me/at/citybeachnyc and post it to your Facebook page, tweet it out or even email your friends about what we're doing. Your contribution of time and effort means as much to me as the dollars in the door, because you are actively participating in making this project successful. Already I've had over 100 people take action and post to web for us, will you join them?

story:
Short Summary

I am a software engineer that loves working in different cafes around where I live. The problem, they ALL require me to enter a code of some sort to get into the bathroom, and I never get the receipt that has the code on it :(


One day I was chatting with some friends and we realized that this is something we could fix!

How many times have you been standing waiting for the bathroom code as the cafe workers are working and not paying attention to you? How many times has someone asked you for the code, or have you heard someone ask: "What is the bathroom code?" and thought, I wish there could be an app for that, Well, We are making it!

What We Need & What You Get

Basically here it is:

  • There is a domain name we want, but Godaddy has listed it as "Premium" and we now need money to get that.
  • We already have a couple franchises working with us, but we would like money to market to more franchises.
  • Some funding to cover development costs (api costs mainly)

What you will get:

  • This app will allow you get basically get into what ever bathroom you want without the need to look at that receipt that you probably threw away or just didn't get.
  • You can look up what bathrooms near you are more clean/dirty.
  • Currently we already have Boston, Chicago, and NYC covered and plan to add many more.
  • We plan to add a LOT of functionality such as if the bathroom has a baby changing station, quality of the paper, if they have warm water, or if you have to wash your hands in cold water as well as a lot more.
 

Risks & Challenges

There are little to no risks involved with this project, however there are some challenges.

  • The first thing we need money for is marketing so we can partner with more restaurants/cafe chains and get agreements for them to be listed in the app.
  • We need to buy a domain name. Now, here is the thing. we know what domain we want, but it is a Godaddy "premium" domain name and they want a large sum of money for it. This is the 2nd thing we will be putting this money towards
  • Finally, Google's map API is not free, it is very affordable, but I will need a little money for starting this to put towards the API after we pass the free request limit.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Ideas to add features to the app would be appreciated. We already have lots of ideas about how to make this tiny problem in people's day to day a little less annoying. But there is always room for more functions that can be packed into this app!
  • and finally! We would LOVE if you could share this with anyone at all!

story:
See who's writing about Invincible:

Bikes die in the city: flat tires, rusty chains, stolen wheels, stolen lights, stolen seats…stolen bikes!

Invincible thrives in the city. It’s designed from the ground up to stop flats, rust and soggy butts and because everything is locked down with custom security hardware, it’s all 100% guaranteed against theft.

And best of all, we jammed it all into a convenient package that costs less than your phone.  

Invincible 1Speed for flat cities...

...and Invincible 8Speed for hilly cities.

 Ride with courage,

 enjoy the night, and

Lock up with confidence with a Best-In-Class Fortified U-Lock 

 We built a team for that...

 And how does FortifiedProtect actually keep your bike from being stolen?

When you buy Invincible, you're registered as the sole owner of your bike. The FortifiedProtect team manages ownership and makes sure that no Invincible bikes are resold without our permission. If an unauthorized bike does pop up for sale online, we make sure it's the last time that thief tries us.

When your FortifiedProtect expires, you can renew with an early backer discount.  

Next, add your accessories (at a discounted price).

 Just add the amount of each add-on to your final pledge.

Big bike companies haven’t figured out how to design bikes for the city. That’s where we come in. . .

Want to test ride it? Come visit our Boston workshop.

Email customerlove(at)fortifiedbike(dot)com and we'll set it up.

And now for the nitty-gritty specs

As serial entrepreneurs who love biking in the city, we started Fortified because our gear was failing us: no matter what we did, our stuff would get stolen, broken, and water damaged - and nobody seemed to care. To this day, big bike companies haven't adapted their products to withstand the realities of harsh urban environments. That's where we come in. We've brought 3 wildly successful crowdfunded projects to the world and look forward to our fourth!


Risks and challenges

Supply Chain Risks

This isn’t our 1st (or 2nd, or 3rd, or 4th) rodeo. We’ve volume manufactured and fulfilled over 18000 bike products. Constructing a full bike is a different challenge, but we hired an elite bike design team that has made over 3.2 million bikes for the biggest brands in the business.

Evil Theft Risks

Thieves will try to steal your bike. With our first 3 products, we have a 0.5% theft rate and replace the few that are stolen. If your bike gets stolen and you have FortifiedProtect, you're covered!

ANTI-THEFT LIGHTS - The Aviator headlight and Afterburner taillight are constructed of lightweight aluminum and feature proprietary security bolts. If they’re ever broken or stolen, we’ll replace them.

RUST-STOPPING FRAME + CHAIN - Leave it outside during a monsoon - Invincible’s 6061- aluminum frame and zinc- coated chain will stop rust.

WEATHERPROOF SADDLE - Don’t let the rain ruin your ride: Invincible’s ergonomically- designed seat fends off water so you stay dry.

PUNCTURE-RESISTANT TIRES - Stop worrying about potholes and run-down roads. Invincible’s 700x32mm puncture-resistant tires devour whatever the road has to offer.

CUSTOM SECURITY HARDWARE - Fortified’s anti-theft bolts guarantee that none of your components will ever be stolen. Just use your proprietary key to adjust or remove them.

story:
Perfect Gloves Solution

Do you find yourself always searching the house for gloves while running to the beach, or going scuba diving? The BEST & EASIEST way is using Glove Gear which will secure the gloves to your wetsuit or wrist.

Design

"Nevermind The Tide"

Glove Gear comes with high quality elastic that is 100% durable doesn’t fray, strong soft finish material. Will never lose its stretch and shape. The clips are made of extra-strength plastic so there is a built-in clamp design that will not rust nor degrade! 

The practical design is essential items for all scuba divers, these clips can keep gloves attached on the wet suit, you will not worry about glove loss! Adjust the length easily with the slide clip.

Want to attach your gloves to your wetsuit? No problem! 

The final packaging includes 2) Glove Gear clips to be able to wrap around the wrist, and also 2) mitten clips for use with wet suits! 

Ensuring your gloves are always secure with or without a wetsuit

 

Benefits

WON’T LOSE GLOVES ANY MORE: These mitten clips will keep your gloves safe and attached on the wet suit or around the wrist firmly, no need to look for gloves everywhere.

EASY USE: Convenient to clip on and off! The strap retains its elasticity after using, ensure your gloves won't be lost in any condition. 

WIDE APPLICATION: Can be applied in many items, gloves, bandanas, hats, or any diving accessory! 

 

Goals

In the anticipated outcomes of raising money with your help, we will be able to provide scuba divers with this one-of-a kind accessory. We hope to expand our customer base from not only divers- but for people who are passionate about all sports - water and land based! Our vision is to provide Glove Gear to everyone for skiing, lobstering, parasailing, and even being used to hold light-up gloves for raves! 

Another goal is to have the product clips made out of recyclable materials, by partnering up with organizations such as 4Ocean.

 

Website: www.glove-gear.com

Follow us on Instagram: @glove.gear

story:
We're two people who met in a hostel, travelling and shared one major interest, travelling and hostels. Soon became best friends after endless chats when we realised we both share the same dream; a perfect hostel, a place that would be the sum of every great thing we ever saw in other hostels and other countries and absent of all the inconvenient undesirable things as well, we are more than aware that it is no easy task, but with our combined hostel life and work experience we are more than certain that we can bring this dream to life.

Location, obviously not a remote spot out of the backpackers trail but also carefully picked after months and months of research and visits, Paraty is a well preserved Portuguese colonial town located between Rio de Janeiro and são Paolo makes is not only one of the main spots on the list of every backpacker during their trip to Brazil and South America but also a main spot for Brazilians during weekends, holidays and that is because the wide variety of experiences it has to offer, 10+ unique waterfalls, unique beautiful beaches and island along with its rich and diverse events calendar, to name few, bourbon jazz festival, cachaça festival, mimo live music festival and flip festival.

The hostel: Paraty’s tourism office’s slogan is “Tourism and ecology” and we very much tend to honour that slogan by committing to lower our carbon footprint as much as possible, that is why we choose shipping containers, quick and easy build while up-cycling one of the largest and most disposed off metal pieces nowadays, implementing solar panels and using earth based adobe mix to insulate the containers will lower our electricity consumption by average 40% comparing to other hostels and buildings with the plan of doubling our panels in the next couple of years and hopefully one day we can be the only off the grid hostel.

Our approach will hopefully inspire and encourage travellers as well as other hostels to follow and hopefully little by little the general impact will be visible We going to build our hostel with our own hands and the invaluable help of friends and family, we intend to use the maximum of upcycled materials and salvaged wood, metal, doors will be made into tables and old beer kegs will be stools, our bunk beds will be custom made (no rocky beds), pretty much all hostels are houses/buildings that have been converted and renovated to be a hostel, this one will be entirely built to be a hostel with all the details and functionality in mind.

story:
Designed by a Pharmacist, Inspired by a Medicine Capsule.

Hi Indiegogo community, I'm Joey, the Pharmacist behind Capsule Bag. I officially launched in 2018 with a dream. I had a crazy idea to see how long I could commute without a vehicle in Texas (of all places). Ride sharing and public transportation are my main modes of travel. Determined to carry all my stuff in one bag, I created the perfect bag to help with yours and my daily routine. As a pharmacist with a love for design, my inspiration was something I use on a daily basis- a medication capsule!

At Capsule, we believe in health and wellness. Through medicine anything is possible. We have discovered so many cures and treatments for different diseases but cancer is one that continues to plague so many people. We want to help our fellow scientists continue the fight to one day hopefully eradicate the disease, so we will be donating proceeds from each bag purchased. 

For Press inquiries, check out our press kit. 

Capsule gives you the versatility to carry how you please. If you find yourself in a situation where a duffel makes life that much easier (i.e. carrying onto a plane), simply grab the handles on the side and you're ready for take off. Don't worry about dangling backpack straps because they detach and slide perfectly into their designated pockets.

 

Life gets messy so protection is key. Capsule comes equipped with a removable waste bag to separate the dirty from clean so your gear stays fresh longer! Hang it in your gym locker or the closet of your hotel room. Once you get back home, open the bag and throw your soiled laundry in the washer.

 

 

External Pocket for All Daily Essentials: The Take Daily Bag's external pockets allow you to easily access your valuables for any daily routine. The bag includes 6 pockets designated for small valuables, shoes, laptop, chargers, water bottle and passport. The side pocket has a smaller internal pocket perfect for keys, cell phone, pen slots and airplane bottles. The main compartment has a clamshell opening to provide maximum access. Stay organized at the airport, gym and work. 

The Take Daily Bag is meant to be compact so you can easily carry it on the plane and have access to in-flight essentials (medicine, electronics, chargers, and toiletries).   

 

Personal Item Bag Sizing: The Take Daily Bag is 20” x 13” x 8” (50cm x 33cm x 20cm) and fits the definition of a "personal item" for U.S. airlines. The bag perfectly slides under a standard economy seat. 

Don't miss an important deadline. With The Take Daily Bag you can stay connected to the office (whether we want to or not) on the go.

The Take Daily Bag comes in two color options: Blue with Black accents (Orange Interior) & Black with White accents (Royal Blue Interior). 

Each removable bag is used to separate dirty laundry and contain odor. 


As a pharmacist with a love for design, I built upon the idea that medicine capsules help us be better, so why couldn’t a bag do the same? After sketching many initial drafts, I designed Capsule with the same approach a scientist takes when they build a capsule. 

 

I researched and surveyed athletes, travelers, friends and family to discover what most people desire in a bag. Function, versatility and daily use were at the top of the list.  ​

The unique, patent pending design beautifully mimic’s medicine capsules by contrasting ballistic nylon and premium vegan suede. The main durable fabrics are separated by two signature stripes. 

Capsule will be manufactured overseas at a highly skilled and experienced factory. We have been in contact with the manufacturer during the entire Capsule ideation and they have created our "top of production" samples.

Our production schedule has been generated based on idealistic deadlines with the factory. We will try our hardest to ensure that we stay as close to the timeline as possible. Our backers will be notified about delays or when important steps in the production process have been met. 

 

I love daily adventures. From the gym to weekend trips, I try to make my routine exciting. While commuting to work I think a lot about solutions to everyday problems I'd like to improve. I learned quickly that I carry more stuff than I originally thought. Naturally having an entrepreneurial spirit, Capsule was formed. 

I have committed countless hours of research, development, and production to get Capsule where it is now but I can not continue without your support. Your help will be used to fund Capsule's first production run. 

My bag adventure has already proven to be such a rewarding experience and I can not wait for you to make your own Capsule memories.

 - Joey, Founder

With any new company there are certain risks associated. However, I have successfully launched other design projects so you can be confident that Capsule will be a high quality bag.

I am currently working with a professional liaison to mitigate any delays with the factory. They have successfully helped other companies navigate the sometimes difficult world of manufacturing. We have prepared for any challenges during the production process and will keep our backers updated through this entire process to remove any fear or hesitation associated with pledging funds.
